17:40:51.065 towards an east that will not know another dawn. But in Avalon the stars
17:40:51.065 are still young and the light of morning lingers; and along the path
17:40:51.065 he once followed, Man is finally able to walk again."

17:40:57.345 You need to initiate your novicehood chapters. Begin the chronicle of experiences by typing "CHAPTER" to signal your readiness.

17:40:57.345 Central Park by pond.
17:40:57.345 Set amidst a waterfall of willow-leaves and a myriad of vibrant blooms is a pond. This watery relief is a perfect beauty spot, the city about you
17:40:57.345 invisible to all but your memory, home to ducks and swans in addition to fleeting insects bouncing about merrily upon the mirror-like surface. A
17:40:57.345 couple of wooden benches and tree-stump seats near the lake offer the weary traveller some resting point, away from the stickiness of urban life. You
17:40:57.345 watch the fervent activity on the water, a small frog leaping from a green and purple lily-pad onto a collection of milling insects, its flashing
17:40:57.345 tongue darting to and fro. The gentle ripples of fish, their thrashing tails breaking the smooth surface startles the hunting frogs back to their
17:40:57.345 resting place, and all about you the air is thick with ladybirds and assorted fauna. A small, ivy-covered milestone at your feet reads "Thakria".
17:40:57.345 The Even-tide has come; darkness will follow soon.


17:40:59.176 Good health gives you a sudden wave of euphoria.


17:41:02.854 A glowing torch appears in your hand, to light your way when the path ahead is dark.


17:41:06.422 You have opened the first chapter of your life. In this prologue, you will learn the essentials of being Avalonian.




17:41:14.521 Type CHAPTER to see the tasks in your first chapter. Chapters assist you throughout your life by exposing you to the unknown and stoking your
17:41:14.521 imagination.
17:41:14.521 Use CHAPTER to progress your current chapter.

17:41:57.050 chapter
17:41:57.159 This chapter needs you to have: (Experience Name)
17:41:57.159 [-] "seen welcome chapter" (WELCOME)
17:41:57.159 [-] "replied if new to a text world" (FIRSTGAME)
17:41:57.159 [-] "said where you found Avalon" (FIRSTWHERE)
17:41:57.159 [-] "ensured your e-mail is valid" (FIRSTEMAIL)
17:41:57.159 [-] "read about Avalon's meta-games" (HELPMETA)
17:41:57.159 [-] "learned about HELP command" (FIRSTHELP)
17:41:57.159 [-] "learned about health and mana" (VITALITY)
17:41:57.159 [-] "looked over the WHO list" (FIRSTWHO)
17:41:57.159 [-] "spoke in your location" (FIRSTSAY)
17:41:57.159 [-] "decided to begin novicehood" (FIRSTNOV)
17:41:57.159 [-] "found the academy tutor" (FOUNDTUTOR)
17:41:57.159 [-] "joined the novice academy" (JOINACADEMY)

17:41:57.159 FIRST CHAPTER progress: NOT A SINGLE experiences done with ALL left to do.

17:41:57.159 Experiences make up chapters; completed chapters bring rewards and each makes up part of a mosaic chronicle - the life story of an Avalon character -
17:41:57.159 the building of your LEGEND. In your case the path to legendary standing ends with the 91st chapter.

17:41:57.159 Need help? CHAPTER HELP gives you what extra info people have added to the experiences listed above.

17:41:57.159 Ready to tackle an experience? Type DO <experience name> to begin in earnest e.g. DO WELCOME.

17:44:11.008 You can always change your address with EMAIL later. This concludes the out of realm matters. Onwards to your life in Avalon!


17:44:16.925 Avalon defines the major aspects of its realm as meta-games. There are five main meta, each involved in the other four.


17:44:23.932 The meta of combat relates mostly to skills and their use in combat against other mortals, the crown jewel and innovation of Avalon since 1989. Its
17:44:23.932 sophistication remains unparalleled.


17:44:34.709 The meta of warfare involves legions with skills and special equipment that occupy territory, plunder and raze villages, and besiege cities. Warfare
17:44:34.709 is presently in an age just before gunpowder.


17:44:45.248 The meta of economics involves the trade of over fifty raw commodities, performing Labours and Farming like milking cows and harvesting fields, and
17:44:45.248 crafting items from these materials.


17:44:55.766 The meta of politics is almost strictly a medium for player government and is driven by the conflicting interests of cities and guilds, and their
17:44:55.766 leaders, ministers, and aides.


17:45:06.325 The meta of adventure involves the chapters and quests dotted about the land.


17:45:10.987 Read an overview in HELP META. Each meta is a lifetime's worth of exploration to master and intersects with the others in every way one might expect.
17:45:10.987 Use HELP META to progress your current chapter.
17:45:10.987 HELP META


17:45:11.065
17:45:11.065 EXCELLENT!
17:45:11.065

17:45:11.065 Your mosaic gains colour as you read about Avalon's meta-games. Your legend grows.
17:45:11.065 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
17:45:11.065 Avalon has FIVE meta-games, each inter-dependant and either developed or in-development to such a point you could play just one and find its diversity
17:45:11.065 and demands on your skill more than is found in the entire design of most other games.

17:45:11.065 ONE: Combat - PvP and PvE
17:45:11.065 TWO: Warfare - Battlefield and Strategy
17:45:11.065 THREE: Politics - Society and Diplomacy
17:45:11.065 FOUR: Wealth - Economics and Trade
17:45:11.065 FIVE: Adventure - Mosaic and Quests

17:45:11.065 Everyone, in reality, is playing multiple meta-games as a character grows and explores and interacts with the world. There is no need for you to think
17:45:11.065 of Avalon in terms of the five meta-games but those interested in its unique design, especially those keen enough and imaginative enough to contribute
17:45:11.065 to its evolution, should think of the place in the meta when making submissions/suggestions. The best submissions may manifest in one meta-game but
17:45:11.065 will spread their roots into all the others.

17:45:11.096 See HELP GAME for more insight on Avalon and its unique meta-gaming design.


17:45:14.711 Each area is driven by player competition and cooperation.


17:45:18.824 You are able to take part in any one or more meta from the start; there are many breeds of Avalonian.


17:45:25.941 The chapters will guide you in these early moments, but not answer every question. For this, the realm has a comprehensive HELP system.


17:45:34.230 Read the table of contents using HELP CONTENTS. Each section contains files, each of which cover a different aspect of the realm in detail.
17:45:34.230 Use HELP CONTENTS to progress your current chapter.
17:45:34.230 HELP CONTENTS

17:45:37.887 You can read sections by number, such as HELP 1, and individual files by name or number, as in HELP GAME or HELP 1.3. It is also available on our
17:45:37.887 website.


17:45:43.941 Now let us look to your character's basics, starting with your health and mana: they inform you how close you are to death (not permanent but quite
17:45:43.941 unpleasant).


17:45:55.454 Your base maximum health and mana are determined by your level, shown in your SCORE.
17:45:55.454 Use SCORE to progress your current chapter.

17:45:59.172 Your level falls whenever you die. To avoid dying, it is wise to keep your health and mana close to their maximum.


17:46:06.193 Health will decrease with damage or strenuous activity. It can be healed with potions or herbs, or restored with SLEEP.


17:46:13.312 Mana will be used with magic and special defences. It can be healed with potions or herbs, or restored when you MEDITATE.


17:46:24.832 Both are affected by your overall well-being, whether in combat or otherwise.


17:46:24.863 Well-being consists of five aspects: breathing, tiredness, hunger, thirst, and bleeding. These are shown in STATUS.
17:46:24.863 Use STATUS to progress your current chapter.
17:46:24.863 STATUS

17:46:24.988 You have NOVICE standing in the realm.
17:46:24.988 You are partially clothed. The weather is too warm.
17:46:24.988 To buy clothing, find a shop or a market stall and type CLOTHING to check if any such items are for sale. Haberdashers and weavers are good shop types
17:46:24.988 to seek out.
17:46:24.988 Your moving modus operandi is "brisk-walking" at 4 yards per second.
17:46:24.988 No mentor despite "junior" LW status.
17:46:24.988 You can learn 19 lessons before reaching saturation point.
17:46:24.988 You are 1% of the way through junior "LW" status.
17:46:24.988 You are blessed with ten safe encounters with Death.


17:46:28.717 Hunger, thirst, tiredness, bleeding, and breathlessness inflict damage regularly. Breathlessness restricts movement and only hurts when very severe,
17:46:28.717 whereas bleeding saps health quickly unless healed or clotted.


17:46:38.990 Your well-being is especially important in combat. Beware ignoring signs of illness as you get older.


17:46:46.643 At any given time, there are mortals like yourself visible and active. Some malevolent, some divine, some courteous and gentle.

17:46:54.700 Use WHO to progress your current chapter.

17:46:58.884 If you are using colour, names in bright cyan are the deities (think natural disaster, not administrative), normal red names are fighters, and dark
17:46:58.884 blue names are auras of recently passing souls.


17:47:09.008 There are other types of who listings: QW (quickwho), CITIZENS (your fellow citymates), GMW (guildmate who).


17:47:14.363 Rising above the heavens, the ship of the Moon sparks the night sky into life.


17:47:17.272 There are many ways to speak to other players: SAY, TELL, MSG, and channels.


17:47:19.377 You look up and notice the moon in the early night sky. It is in its last quarter; a waning half moon, large and low.


17:47:21.041 To speak to someone in the same room, use SAY followed by what you wish to say. Give it a try.
17:47:21.041 Use SAY HELLO to progress your current chapter.
17:47:21.041 SAY HELLO


17:47:21.260
17:47:21.260 EXCELLENT!
17:47:21.260

17:47:21.260 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
17:47:21.260 You say, "HELLO."


17:47:24.796 If want to speak to someone privately, you use TELL <name> <message>. If they are offline, you would use MSG <name> <message>. More is explained in
17:47:24.796 HELP COMMUNICATION.


17:47:30.852 Channels allow you to speak privately to many people at once.


17:47:34.529 The most common calling channels are novice (NN or NOV), public (PUB), city (CCC), and guild channels (CCG). Read HELP CALLING for the full list.


17:47:42.567 For now, let everyone know you are here by saying hello on the novice channel. Ask questions on this channel if you are ever in need. Try to
17:47:42.567 personalise what you say rather than just sending everyone yet another HELLO like many do. You'll find folks friendly.
17:47:42.567 Use NN HELLO! to progress your current chapter.
17:47:42.567 NN HELLO!

17:47:42.730 Your mosaic gains colour as you decided to begin novicehood. Your legend grows.
17:47:42.730 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
17:47:42.730 You novice-call from Thakria: "HELLO!"


17:47:46.313 Now you need to begin your novicehood proper. The first stage is to join the academy, where you will gain a clutch of general skills and commence the
17:47:46.313 novice chapters.


17:47:57.891 Go directly to the academy using this simple command: ACADEMY.
17:47:57.891 Use ACADEMY to progress your current chapter.
17:47:57.891 ACADEMY


17:47:57.964
17:47:57.964 EXCELLENT!
17:47:57.964

17:47:57.964 Your mosaic gains colour as you found the academy tutor. Your legend grows.
17:47:57.964 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
17:47:57.964 You call upon a guide to take you to the Institute of Thakria.
17:47:57.964 Meeting chamber of the Institute of Thakria.
17:47:57.985 This opulent chamber has been expressly laid out for the collections of peoples, either in assembly of the Institute students or more intimate
17:47:57.985 meetings. The domed ceiling above is painted in beautiful oils, depicting nymphs and other spirits smiling down upon the proceedings. Marbled pillars
17:47:57.985 inlaid with silver and onyx support the vaulted roof, quadrangles of cushioned chairs set into each the alcove formed by the columns. Carpets from the
17:47:57.985 western isles grace the tiled floor, their vibrant hues mingling with the plush seating arranged about the central lectern which is set upon a balcony
17:47:57.985 above. The western wall of the chamber opens into an atrium, its glazed walls bursting with all manner of proliferate shrubbery. There is a distinct
17:47:57.985 feeling of privacy here. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. There are (two) Hylas of the Northwoods here. Pandion, the Master of the
17:47:57.985 Institute is here.
17:47:57.986 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:47:57.986 You notice exits east, south and west.


17:48:01.518 The academy is a meeting point for the young and confers general skills you need in your adulthood.


17:48:09.641 Accept enrollment using OK to receive your general skills. Using OK and AGREE are common in confirming important choices such as guild, city, and
17:48:09.641 profession.
17:48:09.641 Use OK to progress your current chapter.
17:48:09.641 OK


17:48:10.048
17:48:10.048 EXCELLENT!
17:48:10.048

17:48:10.048 Your mosaic gains colour as you joined the novice academy. Your legend grows.
17:48:10.048 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
17:48:10.048 You breathe a sigh of relief as you are accepted into the illustrious Institute of Thakria.
17:48:10.048 Avalon has over three thousand distinct abilities and a high-level character will have 1000 to 1250 depending on profession class.
17:48:10.048 Type SKILLS for a list of the new skills gained and AB <skill> to get a list of abilities within each skill.
17:48:10.048 You have gained the skill of Itemlore at Apprentice.
17:48:10.048 You have gained the skill of Riding at Apprentice.
17:48:10.048 You have gained the skill of Swordplay at Apprentice.
17:48:10.048 You have gained the skill of Survival at Apprentice.
17:48:10.048 It would be wise to place your e-mail with Avalon. It is simple and you will never receive any junk from us - not ever. This is NOT mandatory but we
17:48:10.048 appreciate the gesture. The e-mail is private and no other player is able to see it.

17:48:10.048 To set your e-mail address type EMAIL followed by a working address. We will send a welcome / validation mail which you just need to click on to
17:48:10.048 verify.


17:48:12.155
17:48:12.155 COMPLETE NOVICE BUILDING YOUR LEGEND
17:48:12.155
17:48:12.155 This chapter needs you to have: (Experience Name)
17:48:12.155 [-] "reviewed your skills list" (SKILLSED)
17:48:12.155 [-] "learned about the professions" (PROFESSIONS)
17:48:12.156 [-] "carved Chivalry defences" (CHIVALRY)
17:48:12.156 [-] "chanted for equilibrium" (CHANTED)
17:48:12.156 [-] "looked at your own inventory" (INVENTORYED)
17:48:12.156 [-] "killed and offered bandit body" (BANDITSLAY)
17:48:12.156 [-] "seen MAP in a city location" (MAPPED)
17:48:12.156 [-] "met the kinswoman of Eleusis" (IORWENN)
17:48:12.157 [-] "ritual summoned a dragon" (DRAGONSUMMON)
17:48:12.157 [-] "hurled a Charming fireball" (FLAMEFOREST)
17:48:12.157 [-] "recovered mana by meditating" (MEDITATED)
17:48:12.157 [-] "evoked rain using Spiritualism" (DRUIDRAIN)

17:48:12.158 SECOND CHAPTER progress: NOT A SINGLE experiences done with ALL left to do.

17:48:12.158 Experiences make up chapters; completed chapters bring rewards and each makes up part of a mosaic chronicle - the life story of an Avalon character -
17:48:12.158 the building of your LEGEND. In your case the path to legendary standing ends with the 91st chapter.

17:48:12.158 Need help? CHAPTER HELP gives you what extra info people have added to the experiences listed above.

17:48:12.176 Ready to tackle an experience? Type DO <experience name> to begin in earnest e.g. DO SKILLSED.


17:48:15.799 Skills are Avalon's term for a group of abilities. Each skill, professional or general, begins at a low level of development.


17:48:22.810 They are quickly advanced each time you take a lesson in a particular skill.


17:48:27.327 Try looking over your all-important SKILLS list.
17:48:27.327 Use SKILLS to progress your current chapter.
17:48:27.327 SKILLS

17:48:27.483 Survival: Apprentice
17:48:27.483 You can learn 31 lessons before reaching saturation point.

17:48:31.144 At present, you have only the general skills everyone possesses, since you have no profession yet.


17:48:38.229 General skills enhance your diversity of actions or provide key defences and information to survive. For example, AB FISTICUFFS cover hand to hand
17:48:38.229 abilities.


17:48:45.271 You will gain the profession skills as soon as you join a guild. These define your future powers and are full of fabulous abilities.


17:48:52.366 There are actually over 60 different skills and each one has 40 or more abilities to master. Most are specific to a profession.


17:48:59.925 Profession is one of the two most defining aspects of your character and determines your "style" of interaction.


17:49:07.056 Professions and their skills are obtained permanently after completing an apprenticeship in a guild which teaches it.


17:49:15.436 Check which professions are available using PROFESSIONS.
17:49:15.436 Use PROFESSIONS to progress your current chapter.
17:49:15.436 PROFESSIONS

17:49:15.811 Good!
17:49:15.811 Most citizens of the civilised cities, of which you will probably become one, chose a profession. A profession is not binding on you, but simply
17:49:15.811 indicates which area of personal development you will tend towards. It affects the skills you possess and their advancement. Type HELP followed by the
17:49:15.811 profession to gain help on specific professions:

17:49:15.811 KNIGHT MAGE LOREMASTER SORCERER
17:49:15.811 BARD THIEF SEER RANGER
17:49:15.811 DRUID


17:49:19.550 List professions you can test using SELECTIONS. You can use SELECT <profession> to sample its skills at Grand-Master, which is roughly equal to two
17:49:19.550 real months of advancement.
17:49:19.551 Use SELECTIONS to progress your current chapter.
17:49:19.551 SELECTIONS

17:49:19.708 The Druid profession is available for selection.

17:49:19.708 unique skill-set.


17:49:23.504 Each profession has its own set of abilities, with nearly every ability unique to its profession.

17:49:30.509 Using SELECTIONS is freely available until you choose a guild, to help in making a strong choice. Read HELP SELECTIONS for more about the process.


17:49:37.539 During the tour of each profession, you are encouraged to test its abilities freely.


17:49:41.567 Take up the challenge of exploring the Knight profession a little. Time to get a little more interactive!


17:49:49.615 The Knight is a city's greatest defender and invader, a voice bellicose and brave, and a terror to all enemies.


17:49:56.638 The profession has guilds in all major cities: Knights Guild of Mercinae, Cavaliers of Thakria, Warriors of Parrius, and Templars of Silverfalls.

17:50:07.733 The Knight guild skills are Chivalry, Endurance, Trapping, and Weaponry, with the specialisation of Martialism.


17:50:14.731 The skill of Chivalry covers most of the Knight's basic attacking abilities.
17:50:14.731 Use AB CHIVALRY to progress your current chapter.
17:50:14.731 AB CHIVALRY

17:50:14.841 Good!
17:50:14.841 You make use of the Knight junior-apprenticeship.
17:50:14.841 Your current proficiency in Chivalry is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
17:50:14.841 "Frenzy" Whipping yourself into a potent frenzy [Beginner+50%]
17:50:14.841 "Calming" Calming oneself from fear or frenzy [Beginner+50%]
17:50:14.841 "Armoury" Looking after pieces of armour in one's care [Poor]
17:50:14.841 "Daggers" The throwing of daggers [Poor+50%]
17:50:14.841 "Weaponry" Looking after weapons in one's care [Apprentice]
17:50:14.841 "Autoleap" Leaping up and about over pits and earthquakes [Apprentice+50%]
17:50:14.841 "Javelins" The throwing of the Olympian javelin [Apprentice+75%]
17:50:14.841 "Whirlblade" Whirling your blade to carve defences about yourself [Practitioner]
17:50:14.841 "Slicing" Slicing your weapon into an enemy, causing much bleeding [Practitioner+50%]
17:50:14.841 "Jousting" The most honourable art of knightly jousting [Competent]
17:50:14.856 "Holding" Firmly gripping your offensive weapon or wielded items [Competent]
17:50:14.856 "Scythe" Scything through your enemy's spiritual defences [Competent+25%]
17:50:14.856 "Intimidate" Intimidates weaker opponents with your bulk [Competent+62%]
17:50:14.856 "Flight" Fleeing from fights at certain health [Respected]
17:50:14.856 "Berserk" Going berserk and flaying your enemies [Respected+25%]
17:50:14.856 "Roar" Roars aloud a challenge to menace nearby animals and mounts [Respected+75%]
17:50:14.856 "Jabjab" The ability to strike instantly with two blades [Renowned]
17:50:14.856 "Scythejab" The ability to scythe and jab at the same time [Renowned+33%]
17:50:14.856 "Power" Control of your body when stunned or paralysed [Renowned+66%]
17:50:14.856 "Devotions" Devoting your next kill to a deity [Master]
17:50:14.856 "Poisonfeel" Feeling your weapons for poison distribution [Master]
17:50:14.856 "Block" Allows you to block specific directions [Master+37%]
17:50:14.856 "Truesense" Truesense: active use of the extra sensory perceptions [Master+50%]
17:50:14.856 "Equilibrium" Calming instantly your frenzy [Master+62%]
17:50:14.856 "Cleave" Cleaving up an enemy with your weapon [Master+75%]
17:50:14.856 "Greatroar" The greater Chivalric roar; greater panic and range [Master+87%]
17:50:14.856 "Whistling" Summons your loyal mount from across the land [Master+93%]
17:50:14.856 "Speed" Purging slothfulness, speed in the face of constriction [Grand-Master]
17:50:14.856 "Regeneration" Regenerating lost health through will alone [Grand-Master]
17:50:14.856 "Push" Pushes somebody in a specific direction [Grand-Master]
17:50:14.856 the following abilities will be attained next:
17:50:14.856 "Dualslice" Slicing an enemy using duality (with both wielded weapons) [+60 lessons]
17:50:14.856 "Restriking" Unconscious restrike against your opponent [as above]
17:50:14.856 "Calling" Calling loyal CCCs (not steeds) to your side [+61 lessons]
17:50:14.856 "Vorpalblade" Vorpal blade to shred away defences and ghostly mana [+152 lessons]
17:50:14.856 Type AB CHIVALRY with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB CHIVALRY FRENZY.
17:50:14.856 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.


17:50:18.973 Each ability listed is a separate power or command. To master any profession, you must master their matrix of abilities. It is recognised as one of
17:50:18.973 the most challenging combat systems in the gaming world.


17:50:29.268 Learn how to command your blade to draw upon your physical prowess.
17:50:29.268 Use AB CHIVALRY WHIRLBLADE to progress your current chapter.
17:50:29.268 AB CHIVALRY WHIRLBLADE

17:50:29.590 Good!
17:50:29.590 You make use of the Knight junior-apprenticeship.
17:50:29.590 HELP for the "WHIRLBLADE" ability:

17:50:29.590 The "whirlblade" ability is rated Practitioner in the guild skill of Chivalry. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

17:50:29.590 Syntax: WHIRL BLADE or WB.
17:50:29.590 Whirling your weapon about your shape evokes some ancient remnant of the power of Tyranis, god of war. It affords you a shield of arrow-deflection and
17:50:29.590 an aura of protection. The rapid whirling of your blade is also able to rip apart any restrictive webbing or nets.


17:50:33.101 You need to wield weapons in order to use them and you can wield in both your right and left hands as a knight. You will have been given a copper
17:50:33.101 shortsword and a golden sabre while you are still a novice.


17:50:43.902 Check out what you are wielding now with the WIELDING command. Use WIELD RIGHT <weapon> and WIELD LEFT <weapon> to change what you are wielding.
17:50:43.902 Use WIELDING to progress your current chapter.
17:50:43.902 WIELDING

17:50:44.090 Good!
17:50:44.090 You are wielding a copper shortsword in your right hand, and a golden sabre in your left.

17:50:47.795 deflection shield.


17:50:51.183 You have equilibrium.


17:50:51.517 It is important to keep up your equilibrium as you play Avalon. You may have noticed its use when experimenting with abilities.


17:50:59.556 If you ever lose equilibrium use CHANT EQUILIBRIUM to force its regain. Most abilities where you use equilibrium also automatically regain it. But
17:50:59.556 some do not, or some opponents may try to break your equilibrium and disable you in combat.
17:50:59.556 Use CHANT EQUILIBRIUM to progress your current chapter.
17:50:59.556 CHANT EQUILIBRIUM


17:50:59.951
17:50:59.951 EXCELLENT!
17:50:59.951

17:50:59.967 Your mosaic gains colour as you chanted for equilibrium. Your legend grows.
17:50:59.967 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
17:50:59.967 You chant the noiseless litany of equilibrium.


17:51:03.854 Equilibrium is by other terms a cooldown on all abilities that require it. It is the mental equivalent of left and right handed balance.


17:51:05.683 You have equilibrium.


17:51:10.892 Physical and mental balance are usually exclusive to each other: you cannot use a sword straight after casting a spell.


17:51:18.037 Equilibrium and balance are the core of Avalonian combat and skills. Be sure you regain and use them quickly.


17:51:22.147 You are able to carry a large number of objects, wielding two by choice in your left and right hands (if necessary) and wearing more e.g. clothing and
17:51:22.147 armour.

17:51:56.278 You are now going to gain a little experience in the simplest form of fighting: using your wielded weapons against a CCC or computer-controlled
17:51:56.278 character. In this case: a river bandit.


17:52:07.107 Think you're ready to take on a bandit? Exercise your powers as a Knight junior apprentice and don't forget you need to offer its dead body (if you
17:52:07.107 win) to the Gods.
17:52:07.107 Use DO BANDITSLAY to progress your current chapter.
17:52:07.107 DO BANDITSLAY

17:52:07.731 Good!
17:52:07.731 The "BANDITSLAY" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
17:52:07.731 North/Northeast of Path Entrance is a river house full of bandits, with their leader Jaskar. You are required to slay one of these bandits (try and
17:52:07.731 JAB them!), and find a nearby location to OFFER BANDIT -- SURVEY shows a location which has been marked by a diety. At any of these locations, you may
17:52:07.731 OFFER BANDIT to the Diety of your desire.
17:52:07.731 You elect to do the "BANDITSLAY experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.


17:52:11.058 Now that you are ready for a fight, find Jaskar, scourge to the elderly and the unwary, in the lair of the River Bandits.
17:52:11.058 Use ZOOM JASKAR to progress your current chapter.
17:52:11.058 ZOOM JASKAR

17:52:11.261 Good!
17:52:11.261 Jaskar, chief of the river-bandits is at "Forge" and this location must become your goal.
17:52:11.261 It is 37 locations from "Meeting chamber of the Institute of Thakria" to "Forge": 107.30 seconds away.
17:52:11.261 You muster your energy to amble to: Jaskar, chief of the river-bandits.


17:52:11.595 "EAST"
17:52:11.595 A kindly passer-by hands you a cup of atigax brew. You drink it down and lo! you are able, temporarily, to walk on water.
17:52:11.595 Entrance hall to the Institute.
17:52:11.720 You stand within a hall of magnificent proportions and spectacular decoration, your feet planted upon a translucent bridge of crystal that runs
17:52:11.720 through the centre of the vaulted chamber. The bridge is cut from great slabs of tinted quartz supported by cast iron supports over a set pool below
17:52:11.720 floor level. Circular in shape, the pool reaches both ends of the hallway and is fed by figurine-shaped fountains in either wall, its turbulent waters
17:52:11.720 illuminated from beneath to assume shimmering patterns. The vaulted ceiling above you is emblazoned with intricate designs, each aspect of its six
17:52:11.720 sections coloured with a different precious metal or gem. Upon the eastern wall is a magnificent mural depicting the city of Thakria shining in the
17:52:11.720 glory of dawn, a similar fresco of Thakria illuminated by the setting ocean sun on the western wall. On one of the walls has been set a burnished oak
17:52:11.720 noticeboard holding the names of the most recent graduates. There is a distinct feeling of privacy here. The remains of festooning linger about the
17:52:11.720 locale. Attached to the wall is a large noticeboard. Beside the noticeboard is a sign upon which has been written useful information.
17:52:11.720 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:52:11.720 You notice exits east (an open exit door) and west.


17:52:11.986 "EAST"
17:52:11.986 West end of Moon-stone crescent.
17:52:11.986 Moon crescent is residential area to the most affluent members of Thakrian society, including the Emperor and his family and the captains of the
17:52:11.986 legions which protect the city. Behind sturdy walls of stone are the dwellings of these great people, houses carrying towers of white marble from
17:52:11.986 which fly the flags of many traders and rich citizens able to live in comfort and luxury. To the southeast lies the central park, a little bronze gate
17:52:11.986 always open swings across a narrow path into the wilderness open to all citizens of Thakria. The crescent continues to the northwest.
17:52:11.986 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:52:11.986 You notice exits north, northeast, south, southwest and west (an open entrance door).


17:52:12.502 "NORTHEAST"
17:52:12.502 Moon-stone crescent.
17:52:12.502 This is the farthest north point of Thakria accessible to the general public without entering one of the beautiful dwellings which make the crescent
17:52:12.502 so desirable. Here the homes are slightly more modest than those to the southwest, and yet you feel that they must be home to some King such is their
17:52:12.502 splendour. Northwards is a golden gate leading into one of the properties, a placard on the wall bearing the name "Mansion of Princess Herabia". The
17:52:12.502 daughter of the Emperor himself dwells here. You become excited despite yourself. Back to reality, the crescent continues southwest and east.
17:52:12.502 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:52:12.502 You notice exits northeast, south and southwest.


17:52:12.908 "NORTHEAST"
17:52:12.908 Moon-stone crescent.
17:52:12.908 Here is surely the grandest dwelling in the city of Thakria, home of the Emperor himself. Three towers spear up against the sky surrounding the domed
17:52:12.908 roof of the hundred-room home of the mightiest leader of the City of Miracles. A golden gate dwarfs you to the north, citadels on either side housing
17:52:12.908 guards to protect their emperor from nosey Thakrians and possible offenders. South is a less-imposing, but equally desirable property. It is much
17:52:12.908 smaller in size and yet tastefully set at the centre of a sprawling wilderness of trees and ivy. At the centre of a metropolis it may be, but within
17:52:12.908 you guess this would have little meaning in this miniature Eden. The crescent continues west and southeast. The remains of festooning linger about the
17:52:12.908 locale.
17:52:12.908 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:52:12.908 You notice exits east, southeast and southwest.

17:52:47.646 Review how to use both swords in an attack, a staple of the Knight's potent attacks: two damaging strikes in a single melee round.
17:52:47.646 Use AB CHIVALRY JABJAB to progress your current chapter.
17:52:47.646 AB CHIVALRY JABJAB

17:52:47.865 Good!
17:52:47.865 You make use of the Knight junior-apprenticeship.
17:52:47.881 HELP for the "JABJAB" ability:

17:52:47.881 The "jabjab" ability is rated Renowned in the guild skill of Chivalry. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

17:52:47.881 Syntax: JJ <target> or JBJB <target> or JABJAB <target>.
17:52:47.881 This is the signature ability of the Knight professional: the ability to jab with both hands concurrently. Naturally, you need a blade in each hand,
17:52:47.881 and you can perform a double jab (left hand, then right hand) instantly against an opponent. The extent of the damage dealt by your jab-jab is defined
17:52:47.881 in part by your 'attack' round facing off against the 'defence' round of your opponent. It would behoove all knightly professionals to thoroughly
17:52:47.881 investigate the nuances of defence and attack to ensure the maximum power of your jabjab in combat.

17:52:51.487 Use JJ BANDIT to progress your current chapter.
17:52:51.487 JJ BANDIT

17:53:35.091
17:53:35.091 EXCELLENT!
17:53:35.091

17:53:35.091 Your mosaic gains colour as you killed and offered bandit body. Your legend grows.
17:53:35.091 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.


17:53:39.058 The Knight profession offers the best combatative introduction to Avalon. They have sufficient complexity at higher levels and a simple management of
17:53:39.058 defences in Endurance.


17:53:49.397 However, the Knight is often underestimated as basic for the same reason and many wallow in this phase.


17:53:56.563 They have far greater complexity than many realise and few are counted in Avalonian history as legendary knights.


17:54:04.132 Check out the Avalon MAP command and understand how it works. It is explained in HELP MAP. You can make an automatic map each time you move by typing
17:54:04.132 MOVING MAP, with MOVING NORMAL disabling this feature.


17:54:15.787 It is worth quickly checking out what the MAP looks like. It is optimised for efficient accuracy. Don't worry if you don't understand all the symbols
17:54:15.787 yet.
17:54:15.787 Use MAP to progress your current chapter.
17:54:15.787 MAP


17:54:15.896
17:54:15.912 EXCELLENT!
17:54:15.912

17:54:15.912 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.

17:54:15.943 Wildland territory around "Meeting place" location.


17:54:19.563 Move quickly to a rendez-vous with Iorwenn, the kinswoman of Eleusis, a river village in the centre of the Greenwood forest.


17:54:26.617 Find your own way using the MOVING MAP and compass directions or, for the sake of speed, you can ZOOM directly to the venerable lady.
17:54:26.617 Use ZOOM IORWENN to progress your current chapter.
17:54:26.617 ZOOM IORWENN

17:54:26.805 Good!
17:54:26.805 Iorwenn, the kinswoman is at "Kinswoman's office" and this location must become your goal.
17:54:26.805 It is 18 locations from "Meeting place" to "Kinswoman's office": 3.96 seconds away.
17:54:26.805 You muster your energy to run to: Iorwenn, the kinswoman.


17:54:27.041 "NORTH"
17:54:27.041 Woodland path.
17:54:27.041 In this narrow corridor between trees a carpet of leaf-mould underfoot deadens all sound, but the silence is reassuring rather than foreboding.
17:54:27.041 Through overhanging branches to the north you can see the main track that runs east-west, disappearing into the depths of the wood. High overhead, to
17:54:27.041 the south, a patch of clear blue is visible above an apparent clearing amongst the trees. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth
17:54:27.041 here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. A pair of cracked spectacles lies on the ground nearby.
17:54:27.041 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:54:27.041 You notice exits north and south.


17:54:27.322 "NORTH"
17:54:27.322 Path entrance.
17:54:27.322 Under a canopy of trees the track continues westward into the gloom of the wood; as far as you can make out, the track curves round to the left. To
17:54:27.322 the south, almost concealed under low branches, lies the entrance to a narrow path going deeper into the wood. Although the entrance is dark and
17:54:27.322 uninviting, all you can detect is an intangible presence of peace. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly
17:54:27.322 soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. An opaque pod sits here, the surface of its impervious skin pulsing with a
17:54:27.322 strange ethereal hum. A large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Cornelius, the all-consuming. An
17:54:27.322 great old oak tree stands here. The remnants of an enormous statue have fallen here.
17:54:27.322 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:54:27.322 You notice exits north, east, south and west.


17:54:27.556 "WEST"
17:54:27.556 Wood track.
17:54:27.556 The soft sounds of the wood surround you along the rutted track, and occasionally you see a pair of eyes regarding you steadily from behind some bush.
17:54:27.556 Whilst confident that there is nothing harmful here, you still hope for a more open way: you cannot see more than a few dim yards into the
17:54:27.556 impenetrable undergrowth beside the track, and even the sky is only visible from time to time. Peering along to the east the track disappears deeper
17:54:27.556 into the wood, but where the track curves to the southwest the wood appears to thin out somewhat and, right on the threshold of hearing, you can
17:54:27.556 detect the sound of running water. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy
17:54:27.556 garden. The soil has yet to be turned. An great old oak tree stands here.
17:54:27.556 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:54:27.556 You notice exits east and southwest.


17:54:28.281 "SOUTHWEST"
17:54:28.281 Edge of the wood.
17:54:28.281 At this point a small path branches off the main track, winding through the trees to the northwest. Looking down the path you can catch glimpses of
17:54:28.281 some sort of building through the trees. The main track, however, continues northeast into the dim depths of the wood. In that direction, tall trees
17:54:28.281 loom up over the track, meeting high overhead and rendering it so dark that you can see only a few yards further. The other way along the track the
17:54:28.281 trees are thankfully much more open and you can hear the quiet murmur of a stream. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here
17:54:28.281 is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned.
17:54:28.281 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:54:28.281 You notice exits northeast, southwest and northwest.

17:54:28.546 turned.
17:54:28.546 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.

17:54:31.546 slender birch grows here. An great old oak tree stands here. Another grows alongside it. A tree looms here, its branches turned purposefully upward to
17:54:31.546 twine thickly into the dense, complex canopy of the tenebrous woodland eaves.

17:54:37.519 It is possible to get quests or missions from most of the named CCCs (computer-controlled characters) in Avalon. Iorwenn is one such CCC and if you
17:54:37.519 greet her, you will hear about one of the earliest quests in Avalon.


17:54:43.595 Now to learn a little about the Mage.


17:54:48.280 The Mage profession commands the most powerful forces in the realm, given the time to prepare. He or she is relied upon by citymates and friends to
17:54:48.280 contain and destroy enemies across wide areas.


17:54:59.173 The profession has guilds in all major cities: Mages Guild of Mercinae, Warlocks of Thakria, Enchanters of Parrius, Wizards of Silverfalls.


17:55:05.810 To sample this class, you will need to use SELECT and, in this instance, choose MAGE to temporarily gain access to Grand-Master level Mage profession
17:55:05.810 skills.
17:55:05.810 Use SELECT MAGE to progress your current chapter.
17:55:05.810 SELECT MAGE

17:55:06.122 Good!
17:55:06.122 You discard the Knight profession skill-set.
17:55:06.122 You take on the Mage profession and gain its skill-set.
17:55:06.122 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:55:06.122 You gain the skill of Charming at Grand-Master.
17:55:06.122 You gain the skill of Rituals at Grand-Master.
17:55:06.122 You gain the skill of Candescence at Grand-Master.
17:55:06.122 You gain the skill of Music at Grand-Master.


17:55:09.706 The Mage guild skills are Charming, Rituals, Candescence, and Music, and the specialisation of raw Elementalism.


17:55:16.792 Let's see if you can summon a great dragon using Rituals. First look over the short help on how to dance up Rituals.
17:55:16.792 Use HELP RITUALS to progress your current chapter.
17:55:16.792 HELP RITUALS

17:55:16.870 Good!
17:55:16.870 NOTE: if you were looking for information on rituals relating to godly festivals, icons, holy locations and divine realms, you should read HELP
17:55:16.870 FESTIVALS.
17:55:16.870 Rituals is a skill practised by those skilled in the Magical arts. To cast rituals you must SKETCH shapes in the air (or SKETCH ALL to sketch all the
17:55:16.870 shapes you know at once), then CHANT EQUILIBRIUM, and then DANCE the appropriate ritual which is built up from the shapes. Ritual shapes can be
17:55:16.870 sketched in most locations although protected environments (such as interior barracks, commodity sheds, inner sanctums of temples, etc) are restricted.
17:55:16.870 Sketching technique is more subtle than first imagined; take heed!

17:55:16.870 Mages may type SKETCH for a list of shapes known to you. After the name of the ritual as specified in DANCE, you can name a city, a guild, or a
17:55:16.870 specific individual that you wish the ritual to target. You can specify ENEMIES which would attack those who are not your friends. Mages can combine
17:55:16.870 their might by sketching more shapes and dancing the rituals together. Thus together rituals of enormous power could be brought into being. Type
17:55:16.870 UNDANCE (or UNDANCE followed by a specific ritual) to remove rituals of your creation or SENSE to sense rituals nearby.
17:55:16.870 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.

17:55:16.870 You have the RITUALS skill at Grand-Master level.
17:55:16.901 Type AB RITUALS for a list of abilities according to your skill level.


17:55:20.562 Next look over the Rituals abilities you have gained because you selected the Mage profession to sample.
17:55:20.562 Use AB RITUALS to progress your current chapter.
17:55:20.562 AB RITUALS

17:55:20.788 Good!
17:55:20.788 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:55:20.788 Your current proficiency in Rituals is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
17:55:20.788 "Sketch" Sketching the ritual shapes [Innate]
17:55:20.788 "Dance" Dancing rituals into a location [Innate]
17:55:20.788 "Undance" Banishing ritual presence from a location [Innate]
17:55:20.804 "Sensing" Sensing ritual presence in your environs [Innate]
17:55:20.804 "Deepheat" Ritual of Intense Heat (Requires: Di) [Innate]
17:55:20.804 "Sedation" Ritual of Calming (Requires: Cr) [Poor]
17:55:20.804 "Rainbow" Ritual of Rainbows (Requires: Ci) [Apprentice]
17:55:20.804 "Longnight" Magical Darkness (Requires: Crescent) [Practitioner]
17:55:20.804 "Peace" Peace (Requires: Ci/Pe) [Competent]
17:55:20.804 "Stormcloud" Rain of Headache (Requires: St/Di) [Competent+50%]
17:55:20.804 "Warding" Total Warding (Requires: Pe/Ci/Di) [Respected]
17:55:20.804 "Hellflames" Underworld Flame (Requires: St/Cr/Di) [Respected+37%]
17:55:20.804 "Girdling" Protective Girdling (Requires: Di/Cr/Ci/St/Pe) [Respected+75%]
17:55:20.804 "Earthquake" Earth Destruction (Requires: St/Di/Pe) [Renowned]
17:55:20.804 "Chameleon" Changing potion colours (Requires: St/Ci) [Renowned+33%]
17:55:20.804 "Mortal" Mortality and Turning (Requires: Pe/Di) [Renowned+66%]
17:55:20.804 "Gravity" Ritual of Gravity (Requires: Ci/Pe) [Master]
17:55:20.804 "Mistdome" Ritual of Coagulation (Requires Di/Pe/Ci) [Master]
17:55:20.804 "Magestaff" Magestaff summoning (Requires: Di/Ci/Pe/St) [Master]
17:55:20.804 "Blackheart" Sadism (Requires: Di/Cr/Pe/St) [Master+25%]
17:55:20.804 "Summon" Mage Dragon Summoning (Requires: Cr/Ci/Pe/Di) [Master+62%]
17:55:20.804 "Portal" Long portal (Requires: St/Ci/Cr/Di) [Grand-Master]
17:55:20.804 the following abilities will be attained next:
17:55:20.804 "Flame" Ritual of flame (Requires: Pe/St/Ma) [+75 lessons]
17:55:20.804 "Leech" Cube leeching (Requires: All+Tree) [as above]
17:55:20.804 "Life" Ritual of Life (Requires: 2xMan 2xSun) [+92 lessons]
17:55:20.804 "Echo" Ritual of Musical Echo (Requires: Man/Tree/Sun) [+92 lessons]
17:55:20.804 Type AB RITUALS with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB RITUALS SKETCH.
17:55:20.804 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.


17:55:24.370 You can find out detailed info on any of the individual Rituals abilities listed but for now, check out the "summon" ritual.
17:55:24.370 Use AB RITUALS SUMMON to progress your current chapter.
17:55:24.370 AB RITUALS SUMMON

17:55:24.495 Good!
17:55:24.495 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:55:24.495 HELP for the "SUMMON" ability:

17:55:24.495 The "summon" ability is rated Master+62% in the guild skill of Rituals. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

17:55:24.495 Syntax: DANCE SUMMON (Sketch: Crescent, Circle, Pentagram, Diamond).

17:55:24.495 Summons a mythical dragon from the wells of the moon to be your steed. Dragons are the greatest of magesteeds and will attack with great ferocity on
17:55:24.495 your behalf. The basic mage dragons are historically wingless, and it falls solely to sufficiently developed elementalists to bring forth the "dragon-
17:55:24.495 wings" and rear the mage-steed to flight.



17:55:28.077 Rituals are danced using magical shapes you sketch in the air, then enliven into the particular power. Use SKETCH ALL to quickly sketch all the
17:55:28.077 relevant shapes in a single action.
17:55:28.077 Use SKETCH ALL to progress your current chapter.
17:55:28.077 SKETCH ALL

17:55:28.218 Good!
17:55:28.218 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:55:28.218 You sketch the eight ritual shapes.
17:55:28.218 The "sketch" uses 25 mana.


17:55:29.784 You have equilibrium.


17:55:31.743 See how the sketching uses some of your mana? And soft equilibrium needs to be regained. Equilibrium is the fundamental well-spring of all magical
17:55:31.743 abilities.


17:55:39.005 Dance up the SUMMON Ritual and you will quickly see what happens once its magic comes together.
17:55:39.005 Use DANCE SUMMON to progress your current chapter.
17:55:39.005 DANCE SUMMON

17:55:41.066 Good!
17:55:41.066 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:55:41.066 You dance forth the Ritual of Summon which melts into your surroundings. The ritual which you dance will not be instilled with a particular animosity.
17:55:41.066 The "summon" uses 75 mana.


17:55:41.696 You open your eyes having established equilibrium.


17:55:42.902 Be quick before the shapes are blown away by the wind. They do not last long.


17:55:43.758 A thick mist drifts in to herald the entrance of a majestic dragon. Plumes of smoke rise from its nostrils and its back arches menacingly.
17:55:43.758 You mount the dragon.



17:55:44.008
17:55:44.008 EXCELLENT!
17:55:44.008

17:55:44.008 Your mosaic gains colour as you ritual summoned a dragon. Your legend grows.
17:55:44.008 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.


17:55:47.589 All guilds in the Mage profession can summon the dragon as a mount and as skills rise, the dragon can be imbued with greater powers like flying (with
17:55:47.589 you on its back) into the skies and breathing rivers of flame.


17:55:48.264 You grow a little more calm.


17:55:58.162 You might want to check out the mighty dragon you've summoned using EXAMINE DRAGON or let it know you appreciate with PET DRAGON. You can use any of
17:55:58.162 the sample Mage abilities for as long as you have this profession selected into your SKILLS list.


17:56:05.689 Time to get to know some of the frontline magical charms.


17:56:09.327 Prepare a fireball in the forests as a Mage and learn about the dangers of fire.
17:56:09.327 Use DO FLAMEFOREST to progress your current chapter.
17:56:09.327 DO FLAMEFOREST

17:56:09.545 Good!
17:56:09.545 The "FLAMEFOREST" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
17:56:09.545 You elect to do the "FLAMEFOREST experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.


17:56:13.129 While Rituals affect entire rooms for set periods, such as hellflames and mists of sedation, the Mage uses targeted Charming spells for special
17:56:13.129 effects.


17:56:20.107 Take a look at the wide range of spells you are able to CHANT and CAST. HELP CHARMING explains the process of casting charms in more detail.
17:56:20.107 Use AB CHARMING to progress your current chapter.
17:56:20.107 AB CHARMING

17:56:20.200 Good!
17:56:20.200 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:56:20.200 Your current proficiency in Charming is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
17:56:20.200 "Werelight" Summons a sprite of light to illuminate your way [Innate]
17:56:20.200 "Handburn" Primary charming attack, burning your enemy [Poor]
17:56:20.200 "Invisible" Cloaking yourself in invisibility [Poor]
17:56:20.200 "Healhand" Healing health depending on your skill [Poor]
17:56:20.200 "Levitate" To levitate a few feet into the air [Apprentice]
17:56:20.200 "Icewall" Creates a wall of ice to hinder enemies [Practitioner]
17:56:20.200 "Aura" To wreathe yourself in an aura of protection [Practitioner]
17:56:20.200 "Spy" Cast in a direction to spy through doors [Competent]
17:56:20.200 "Hearing" Removing the curse of deafness [Competent+25%]
17:56:20.200 "Deaf" To deafen a target, or yourself [Competent+50%]
17:56:20.200 "Feeble" Weakens your enemies, making them drop possessions [Competent+75%]
17:56:20.200 "Locate" Locating players, items and creatures about Avalon [Respected]
17:56:20.200 "Shield" Conjurs a shield of arrow deflection about you [Respected]
17:56:20.200 "Pentacle" Charms a pentacle of protection about your person [Respected]
17:56:20.200 "Firebolt" Shoot a magical firebolt at your enemy [Respected]
17:56:20.200 "Sight" To give sight to a target, or yourself [Respected+25%]
17:56:20.200 "Blind" Blinding a target, or yourself [Respected+50%]
17:56:20.200 "Cloak" Shrouding yourself or another in invisibility [Respected+75%]
17:56:20.200 "Nullify" Nullifies magical defences about an enemy [Renowned]
17:56:20.200 "Fireball" Sprays enemies or adjacent locations with fire [Renowned]
17:56:20.200 "Teleportlist" Examining teleport pills for their destination [Renowned]
17:56:20.200 "Diagnosis" Performing a self-diagnosis of your afflictions [Renowned+33%]
17:56:20.200 "Coldcone" Cone of cold to freeze all in location [Renowned+66%]
17:56:20.200 "Web" Smothers a foe in a magical web of constraint [Master]
17:56:20.200 "Essencing" Passing magical essence into artifacts [Master]
17:56:20.200 "Freezing" Freezing an opponent in an icy aura [Master]
17:56:20.200 "Revelation" To reveal astral, demonic and ethereal presences [Master+25%]
17:56:20.200 "Sleep" Sending a target into a deep slumber [Master+43%]
17:56:20.200 "Antidote" Antidote to many afflictions and poisons [Master+62%]
17:56:20.200 "Firewall" Raises a wall of fire to harm all who pass [Master+81%]
17:56:20.200 "Teleport" Creating a teleport pill of your current location [Grand-Master]
17:56:20.200 "Bugbanish" Banishes rune bugs that hold your loyalty [Grand-Master]
17:56:20.200 "Deflection" Deflects the attention of sensors and seeing stones [Grand-Master]
17:56:20.200 the following abilities will be attained next:
17:56:20.200 "Sparkle" Cascades sparkling Stars onto you to cure webbing [+75 lessons]
17:56:20.200 "Brand" Branding a target with the mark of the Dark Lord [as above]
17:56:20.200 "Disguise" To wreath yourself in an illusionary disguise [+77 lessons]
17:56:20.200 "Physical" Charm of physical restoration and resurrection [+153 lessons]
17:56:20.200 Type AB CHARMING with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB CHARMING WERELIGHT.
17:56:20.200 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.


17:56:23.757 The fireball spell is a common room-wide attack that can be directed locally or from another location, to crash into everything indiscrimately.
17:56:23.757 Use AB CHARMING FIREBALL to progress your current chapter.
17:56:23.757 AB CHARMING FIREBALL

17:56:23.898 Good!
17:56:23.898 You make use of the Mage junior-apprenticeship.
17:56:23.898 HELP for the "FIREBALL" ability:

17:56:23.898 The "fireball" ability is rated Renowned in the guild skill of Charming. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

17:56:23.898 Spell: FIREBALL
17:56:23.898 Effect: Sprays enemies or adjacent locations with fire.
17:56:23.898 Skill: Renowned
17:56:23.898 Cost: 40 mana
17:56:23.898 Equilibrium: standard at 210cs (210cs)
17:56:23.898 insomniac adds 31cs (15%)
17:56:23.898 confused adds 42cs (20%)
17:56:23.898 fatigued adds 105cs (50%)
17:56:23.898 silent environs adds 8cs (4%)
17:56:23.898 ditty/upset adds 52cs (25%)
17:56:23.898 Charm: "ar sindanoriello caita mornie"
17:56:23.898 Help:
17:56:23.898 Blasts a single target or a whole location with your might. It will hurt everybody including you.
17:56:23.898 You can also hit those hiding in trees.

17:56:28.152 "NORTHWEST"
17:56:28.152 Town Hall.
17:56:28.152 This hall is wide, running north-south and built from fine timber. Two large paintings on each wall depict scenes of hardy river-folk building the
17:56:28.152 town from scratch, battling against the waters until finally gaining the acceptance of the water-spirits. A platform stands at the southern end, and a
17:56:28.152 low exit off to the southeast. Various torn and crumpled pieces of paper, many reading "Help revive Eleusis" leave evidence of past unsuccessful
17:56:28.152 meetings. The remains of festooning linger about the locale.
17:56:28.152 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:56:28.152 You notice exits north and southeast.


17:56:28.931 "NORTH"
17:56:28.931 Main street of Eleusis.
17:56:28.931 This is the eastern end of the main street, the gateway east leading onto the eastern bridge and the gate-house beyond. West there is a crossroads,
17:56:28.931 and low wood buildings line the street to the north, the largest of which is labelled "Bar". South stands a larger building, the town hall, flying a
17:56:28.931 colourful flag and echoing times when Eleusis was a grander, more populous place. Now, the weeds grow up through dirt on the road, and the people grow
17:56:28.931 tired and complacent. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The
17:56:28.931 soil has yet to be turned. A rune fashioned in the shape of a pyramid lies here. A small seedling grows from the earth nearby, a green shoot, from
17:56:28.931 which grow two leaves. A signpost is stuck into the ground here.
17:56:28.946 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:56:28.946 You notice exits north (an open entrance door), east, south and west.


17:56:28.946 "WEST"
17:56:28.946 Crossroads of the Main street.
17:56:28.977 This is the centre of Eleusis, the main street leading away to your west and east, and two other roads running north and south from here. Few people
17:56:28.977 are around, and the only sound is that of the river burbling on its way around the island town. The buildings are low and made of wood, although a
17:56:28.977 large building to the southeast (a short way east, then south) catches your eye, especially the bright flag of Eleusis flying from its roof. There is
17:56:28.977 a special feeling in the air here. A huge granite milestone stands here. Its jet-black surface is engraved with letters: "Eleusis". The remains of
17:56:28.977 festooning linger about the locale. A rune fashioned in the shape of a pyramid lies here. A great metal bell hangs impressively from above. A crowd of
17:56:28.977 affluent villagers have assembled here, some watching passers-by, others engaged in conversation. Merrily engaged in drunken conversation are many
17:56:28.977 villagers, their noisy revelry surrounding you.
17:56:28.977 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:56:28.977 You notice exits north, east, south and west.


17:56:29.290 "WEST"
17:56:29.290 Main street of Eleusis.
17:56:29.290 You are standing at the western end of the Eleusis main street. The ground is earthy dirt, replaced by wood platforms that lead to the bridge to the
17:56:29.290 west through a gateway. The buildings along the street are single story, most built from the wood used throughout Eleusis. Few people are about on the
17:56:29.290 streets, and most of the buildings look under-used, if not empty. North a weather-beaten sign advertises "Armoury" and south lies a shop labelled
17:56:29.290 "Provisions". The street continues east. The remains of festooning linger about the locale.
17:56:29.290 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
17:56:29.290 You notice exits north, east, west and northwest.

17:56:31.044 "SOUTH"
17:56:31.044 Deep in the Greenwood.
17:56:31.044 The remains of festooning linger about the locale. Arthritic with age, an ancient rowan towers over you. Rising from the ground is a street lantern: a
17:56:31.044 tall wrought iron pole bearing a latticework glass cube filled with candles. Standing on reinforced metal stilts thrust deep into the ground, a
17:56:31.044 siegetower rises above you nearby, menacing slits cut into all four of its well-armoured walls. The earth here is frozen from the winter months,
17:56:31.044 awaiting the thaw of the springtime. The soil has yet to be turned. A snow-white moon owl rests here, its wings folded at its side. It regards you
17:56:31.044 cautiously with its luminous eyes. An oak tree large and broad, grows here. Another grows alongside it.
17:56:31.044 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.

17:56:42.840 As you might expect, fire is anathema to anything with fur or made of wood. Bears will burn uncontrollable and trees nearby will be set ablaze.


17:56:49.825 It is good habit to not burn the forests. Only the most evil of Mages go out of their way to terrorise the woodlands thus.


17:56:57.374 Your mental reserves are represented by your MANA. Your physical state by your HEALTH. Mana is used in all magical and mentally challenging acts, e.g.
17:56:57.374 casting a fireball charm will cost some mana to do and if you lack the necessary mana, you won't be able to do it.

17:57:49.677 Good!
17:57:49.677 You make use of the Druid junior-apprenticeship.
17:57:49.677 Your current proficiency in Spiritualism is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
17:57:49.677 "Invoke" Invoke one (or all) spirits ready to EVOKE the Spiritualism powers [Innate]
17:57:49.677 "Reveal" Reveals concealed presences [Innate]
17:57:49.677 "Cancelling" Cancelling focal points of spiritual power [Beginner+50%]
17:57:49.677 "Dispell" Dispelling your own spiritual retinue in current location [Poor]
17:57:49.677 "Sense" Sensing players all over Avalon [Apprentice]
17:57:49.677 "Walkwater" Walking on water [Apprentice]
17:57:49.677 "Resist" No magical fire/cold damage [Practitioner]
17:57:49.677 "Light" Lights up location [Practitioner+50%]
17:57:49.677 "Cloak" No locate, summon, Farsight [Competent]
17:57:49.677 "Bladebar" Prevents weapon wielding [Competent+50%]
17:57:49.677 "Fear" Enemies run away and cannot enter [Respected]
17:57:49.677 "Lead" Forces following [Respected+25%]
17:57:49.677 "Stun" Stuns target (no actions) [Respected+50%]
17:57:49.677 "Gate" Opens a gate from target to you [Respected+75%]
17:57:49.677 "Herb" Conjures up a new herb [Renowned]
17:57:49.677 "Return" All blows are reversed to attacker [Renowned+33%]
17:57:49.677 "Bless" Blessing water with holy properties [Renowned+66%]
17:57:49.677 "Burning" Creating a momentary heat-surge [Master]
17:57:49.677 "Tremor" Causing a temporary earth-tremor in a locale [Master]
17:57:49.677 "Rain" Rains cleansing water on the location [Master]
17:57:49.677 "Cocoon" Seals target in protective cocoon [Master]
17:57:49.693 "Bonding" Bonding your spirits to you [Master+37%]
17:57:49.693 "Restoration" Brings the dead to life [Master+62%]
17:57:49.693 "Raising" Raising felled trees to live and grow again [Grand-Master]
17:57:49.693 "Portal" Projects a portal to save an ally [Grand-Master]
17:57:49.693 the following abilities will be attained next:
17:57:49.693 "Peace" Bringing peace to a location [+90 lessons]
17:57:49.693 "Summoning" Summons the willing [as above]
17:57:49.693 "Truesense" Sensing of all Avalonians [+62 lessons]
17:57:49.693 "Chariot" Chariot to the clouds [+123 lessons]
17:57:49.693 Type AB SPIRITUALISM with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB SPIRITUALISM INVOKE.
17:57:49.693 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.

17:57:53.468 HELP for the "RAIN" ability:

17:57:53.468 The "rain" ability is rated Master in the guild skill of Spiritualism. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

17:57:53.468 Syntax: EVOKE RAIN.
17:57:53.468 Spirits: Water and Forest.
17:57:53.468 Mana: 175.
17:57:53.468 Douses the entire location and everything in it with cleansing waters, putting out fires and flames (unless they are too powerful) and drenching
17:57:53.468 everyone nearby. The RAIN spiritualism can also be used in conjunction with forestry symbols, replenishing the power of the cloud-shaped carving as
17:57:53.468 its potency becomes spent over time.

17:58:19.423 the building of your LEGEND. In your case the path to legendary standing ends with the 91st chapter.

18:03:54.506 "Eject" To eject an unruly intruder from the forest [Practitioner]
18:03:54.506 "Gather" To gather firewood from the forest [Practitioner]
18:03:54.506 "Enemy" To declare someone an enemy to one of the ancient woodlands [Practitioner]
18:03:54.506 "Friend" To remove the enemy stigma for one of the ancient forests [Practitioner]
18:03:54.522 "Fires" Casts your naturalist eye over the forest to assess fires [Practitioner+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Command" To caress a command into the mind of one in the forest [Competent]
18:03:54.522 "Block" Animates the surrounding vegetation to block an exit [Competent+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Unblock" Commands vegetation to cease its blockage of an exit [Competent+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Trimming" Trimming suitable branches from mature trees [Competent+75%]
18:03:54.522 "Smooth" Smoothing away blocking branches of small trees/bushes [Respected]
18:03:54.522 "Flow" To flow directionally, or to players and CCCs [Respected+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Hold" Calls the foliage to hold a specific person [Respected+75%]
18:03:54.522 "Release" Calls the foliage to release your captive [Respected+75%]
18:03:54.522 "Forestal" To call a forestal creature into being [Respected+87%]
18:03:54.522 "Seedshift" Shifting seeds from one type to another [Renowned]
18:03:54.522 "Earthfill" Spreading the earth to fill holes in a locale [Renowned+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Watch" The forest will tell you of somebody's movements [Renowned+66%]
18:03:54.522 "Unwatch" Orders the forests to give unwatched passage [Renowned+66%]
18:03:54.522 "Send" Calls upon a bird to safely deliver a message [Renowned+83%]
18:03:54.522 "Leaflist" Listing all your plucked leaves [Master]
18:03:54.522 "Birdsage" Using your birdkin to pass useful info to you [Master]
18:03:54.522 "Leaves" Plucking leaves and merging into them [Master]
18:03:54.522 "Starving" To review starving livestock in your region [Master]
18:03:54.522 "Herbalism" To assess herb growth in the local area [Master]
18:03:54.522 "Flora" Overview of the flora designations for forests [Master]
18:03:54.522 "View" To look through the eyes of a forestal [Master+25%]
18:03:54.522 "Undisguise" To lose a forestal disguise [Master+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Disguise" To disguise yourself as a forestal [Master+50%]
18:03:54.522 "Unmagic" To clear out ritual and enchantment from the forest [Master+62%]
18:03:54.522 "Compost" Building, maintaining and using the compost-heap [Master+75%]
18:03:54.522 "Shepherd" Review and define the shepherd safeguard specifics [Grand-Master]
18:03:54.522 "Form" Assumes the form of the forest, its health and senses [Grand-Master]
18:03:54.522 "Fruit" Growing fruit from the forest [Grand-Master]
18:03:54.522 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:03:54.522 "Satyrmusic" Spreads divine, humanising satyr music about you [+30 lessons]
18:03:54.522 "Elm" Bringing forth the growth of the mighty elm tree [as above]
18:03:54.522 "Moot" Calls up a moot of your loyal forestals [+61 lessons]
18:03:54.522 "Seal" Seals the forest from non-naturalists [+182 lessons]
18:03:54.522 Type AB NATURALISM with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB NATURALISM FORESTWHO.
18:03:54.522 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:03:54.522 -

18:03:58.057 Take a look at the benefits of merging with the forests.
18:03:58.057 Use AB NATURALISM MERGE to progress your current chapter.
18:03:58.057 AB NATURALISM MERGE
18:03:58.057 -
18:03:58.135 Good!
18:03:58.135 You make use of the Druid junior-apprenticeship.
18:03:58.135 HELP for the "MERGE" ability:

18:03:58.135 The "merge" ability is rated Apprentice in the guild skill of Naturalism. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:03:58.135 Syntax: FOREST MERGE or FOREST MERGE <direction>.

18:03:58.135 Mana: None.
18:03:58.135 Allows you to merge into the forest, to become as one with the wilderness. While in the forest you will be invisible to all of those in the outside
18:03:58.135 world. Mana draining abilities will reduce your mana at a slower rate and you will, concurrently, be gradually healed by the forests. Type FLOW to
18:03:58.135 return to the outside world. You may either merge in your current location or into an adjacent one. You may also omit the 'FOREST' so just type MERGE
18:03:58.135 on its own to merge into the forest. Merging into the forest a
18:03:58.135 nd flowing is one of the only ways to move around after a plant metamorphosis (the ultimate consequence of forest tagging).

18:03:58.150 While your Naturalism skill is under "Master" level you will find the act of merging rather draconian insofar as retaining your inventory goes: it is
18:03:58.150 difficult to merge into the trees with possessions-in-hand. When you reach "Master" level in Naturalism, however, you will find merging does not cause
18:03:58.150 you to shed items to nearly the same extent and when you overmatch "Grand Master" Naturalism you will retain all your inventory and most close
18:03:58.150 spiritual sympaticos.

18:03:58.150 When you are merged you will have access to the PATHWAYS command. Type this to gain a feel for your location and woodland pathways (routes) in
18:03:58.150 direction-exits in which you can flow and remain in the protective forest womb. MERGE will shed any independent, moveabout forest form since instead
18:03:58.150 you are taking on the diverse persona of the forest itself rather than any single albeit physically powerful tree-form.

18:03:58.150 NOTE: you will need to apply - on occasion - a modified way of thinking when it comes to your health and mana while you are merged, since the
18:03:58.150 forestland admits of no real distinction between physical and mental health. It has no mind and body and thus external influences affecting health and
18:03:58.150 mana (on you as an individual) will sometimes act unusually over changes to their expected values. You will not gain much from positive forest
18:03:58.150 affinity activity while merged since you exist within rather than indep
18:03:58.150 endent of the woodland organism.
18:03:58.150 -

18:04:01.855 Draw together your naturalist powers and become one with the plant-life.
18:04:01.855 Use FOREST MERGE to progress your current chapter.
18:04:01.855 FOREST MERGE
18:04:01.855 -

18:04:02.089 You make use of the Druid junior-apprenticeship.
18:04:02.089 You blend into the background, experiencing the odd sensation of melting into the lifeforms about you. Speedily you merge yourself, breathe the deep
18:04:02.089 fresh air of the plant and drink the nectar of the trees.
18:04:02.089 {-forest-}

18:04:05.601 As a merged entity, you are no longer visible to other human beings and thus safe from the hunt by Sorcerers and sadistic Warlocks.
18:04:05.601 {-forest-}

18:04:06.273 {-forest-}

18:04:12.828 instead the form of a human as you step into the world of Man and Beast once again...

18:04:22.669 Explore the world of flora cultivation as a Druid.

18:04:22.685 DO DRUIDHERBS
18:04:22.685 -
18:04:22.841 Good!
18:04:22.841 The "DRUIDHERBS" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.

18:04:26.430 The Druid is an expert in flora and herbalism.
18:04:26.430 -

18:04:29.939 Herbs grow in different environments and methods of use.
18:04:29.939 Use HELP HERBS to progress your current chapter.
18:04:29.939 HELP HERBS
18:04:29.954 -
18:04:30.095 Good!
18:04:30.095 Herbs and Poisons are found all over Avalon, and can be located by those with the Herbs or Poisons skill by typing HERBS or POISONS in a location. Any
18:04:30.095 layman may also purchase herbs or poisons from the many herbalists or market stalls dotted about the land.

18:04:30.095 Herbs have various beneficial effects while poisons are harmful. Methods of applying the herbs vary. Some can be eaten (e. G. EAT ATHILLIAS), some
18:04:30.095 applied (e. G. APPLY HARFY). Some can only benefit you, without outside aid, when put into a glass - or suitable container - filled with water. It
18:04:30.095 must then taken using DRINK <container>. Other herbs are imbibed by filling a pipe with the herb and using SMOKE after having lit the pipe. It is
18:04:30.095 worth noting that ALL herbs and poisons can be taken when drunk from a water - since they infuse the liquid no matter their preparation.

18:04:30.095 It is possible to poison weapons - and this is the mainstay of much physical combat - and also to use poisoned arrows to shoot distant opponents and
18:04:30.095 augment the arrow's damage with the poison's effects. You can APPLY a poison to a sleeping, unconscious or meditating enemy.

18:04:30.095 See HELP HERBLIST and HELP POISONLIST for a list of the common herbs and poisons in Avalon, their preparation standards and a brief description of the
18:04:30.095 effects. Below are examples of how one might use herbs via the four preparation methods: applied, eaten/ingested, drunk and smoked in a pipe.

18:04:30.095 NOTE: While the Herbs skill is traditionally the domain of the Druid and Ranger, it is possible for the everyman to become familiar with its use and
18:04:30.095 even develop the skill to a similarly high point as the original professionals - details on this can be found in HELP HERBALISM or by seeking a member
18:04:30.095 of the Druid profession directly.

18:04:30.095 - apply harfy
18:04:30.095 You apply a yellow leaf of harfy. You feel invigorated, your wounds clotting before your very eyes.

18:04:30.095 - eat gylvir
18:04:30.095 You ingest a gylvir clump.
18:04:30.095 You lick your lips tenderly and shiver with a sudden chill.

18:04:30.095 - fill tankard with water
18:04:30.095 You fill your tankard with water.
18:04:30.095 - put iorthir in tankard
18:04:30.095 You place a leaf of iorthir into the tankard.
18:04:30.095 - drink tankard [can also DRINK WATER but this may be ambiguous if you hold multiple containers with water in]
18:04:30.095 You drink some water from the tankard. The iorthir leaf makes your eyes water.

18:04:30.095 - fill pipe with megillos
18:04:30.095 You put a megillos slice into an ebony pipe.
18:04:30.095 - light pipe [while holding a tinderbox or means of fire]
18:04:30.095 You light a megillos slice in your pipe.
18:04:30.095 - smoke megillos
18:04:30.095 You suck deeply on the pipe, basking in the aroma of megillos. You bask in the tangy aroma of the red lichen.

18:04:30.095 See also HELP HERBALISM, HELP HERBLIST, HELP POISONS and HELP POISONLIST.
18:04:30.095 You make use of the Druid junior-apprenticeship.

18:04:30.095 You have the HERBS skill at Grand-Master level.
18:04:30.095 Type AB HERBS for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:04:30.095 -

18:04:33.860 "Siriena" Siriena is a cure for the Black Death [Poor]
18:04:33.860 "Furglewort" Furglewort is hallucinogenic. Very uncertain results [Poor]
18:04:33.860 "Febfendu" It restores hearing [Poor+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Aldaka" It restores sight [Apprentice]
18:04:33.860 "Attanar" It gives the applicant resistance to extreme cold [Apprentice+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Atigax" It gives the consumer limited ability to breathe in the water [Apprentice+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Yavethalion" It is a healing infusion, restoring between 100 and 300 health [Practitioner]
18:04:33.860 "Witan" It relieves the effects of stunning and holding [Competent]
18:04:33.860 "Breldiar" It makes the ingester physically weaker, but mentally stronger [Competent+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Harfy" It is a clotting enhancer to be used in the heat of battle [Competent+75%]
18:04:33.860 "Kathkusa" It enhances strength including carrying potential and offensive power [Respected]
18:04:33.860 "Iorthir" It bestows basic innersight and extra-sensory perception [Respected+25%]
18:04:33.860 "Megillos" It cures many afflictions of the mind and relaxes you [Respected+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Wirren" It provides a sparkling celerity in one's extremities [Respected+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Madabril" It is the only mortal cure for the plague and vampyric touch [Renowned]
18:04:33.860 "Arkasu" It enhances strength, resistance to fatalism, and the mind [Renowned+25%]
18:04:33.860 "Tyrlar" It is a healing herb, restoring between 200 and 250 health [Renowned+33%]
18:04:33.860 "Dargwirith" It aids Naturalism, purifies blood and retards pollenation and blackening [Renowned+50%]
18:04:33.860 "Gylvir" Gylvir gives some resistance to natural and magical fires [Renowned+75%]
18:04:33.860 "Kelventari" It allows you to call up divine splendour [Master]
18:04:33.876 "Brewing" Brewing herbs or poisons to affect a location with vapours [Master]
18:04:33.876 "Alethe" The alethe berry is the only known natural cure for yarl [Master]
18:04:33.876 "Darsurion" It acts to enhance the ability to absorb lessons [Master+50%]
18:04:33.876 "Rellick" It is a physical purge, centering one's senses [Master+50%]
18:04:33.876 "Ucklice" Ucklice bestows the gift of fortune telling and sixth sense [Grand-Master]
18:04:33.876 "Lestagii" Lestagii heals a large proportion of health and mana [Grand-Master]
18:04:33.876 "Sata" Sata is a delicious fruit with an enormous effect [Grand-Master]
18:04:33.876 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:04:33.876 "Malloran" Malloran creates an aura of weapon returning [+113 lessons]
18:04:33.876 "Semmory" It induces a physically and mentally affecting hyper-empathy [as above]
18:04:33.876 "Echianta" It heals afflictions of the body such as clumsiness and confusion [+16 lessons]
18:04:33.876 "Olvar" It acts as a temporary resistance to the onset of Death [+77 lessons]
18:04:33.876 Type AB HERBS with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB HERBS SIRIENA.
18:04:33.876 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.

18:04:37.454 You can use your Naturalism as a Druid to track down local herbs and determine their growth.
18:04:37.454 Use AB NATURALISM HERBALISM to progress your current chapter.
18:04:37.454 AB NATURALISM HERBALISM
18:04:37.454 -
18:04:37.605 Good!
18:04:37.605 You make use of the Druid junior-apprenticeship.
18:04:37.605 HELP for the "HERBALISM" ability:

18:04:37.605 The "herbalism" ability is rated Master in the guild skill of Naturalism. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:04:37.605 Syntax: FOREST HERBALISM <herb>/<poison>.
18:04:37.605 Mana: 80.
18:04:37.605 Seeks out all herb growth of a specific herb or poison in the local area. It will search the entire Greenwood, or the Northwood forests for instance,
18:04:37.605 making the task of foraging for herbs or poisons much easier.
18:04:37.605 -

18:05:00.308 The Ranger profession is the forest defender and a specialist of trapping and tracking intruders. While they may carry city allegiances, their home is
18:05:00.308 the woodland.
18:05:00.308 -

18:05:10.600 The profession has two guilds: Rangers Guild just outside Mercinae and Brigands Guild in Thakria.
18:05:10.600 -

18:05:17.699 Select the Ranger profession and receive some provisional equipment.
18:05:17.699 Use SELECT RANGER to progress your current chapter.
18:05:17.699 - `echo Use SELECT RANGER to progress your current chapter.

18:05:51.406 Use SELECT RANGER to progress your current chapter.

18:05:51.653 Good!
18:05:51.653 You discard the Druid profession skill-set.

18:05:51.653 You make use of the Ranger junior-apprenticeship.
18:05:51.653 You gain the skill of Trapping at Grand-Master.
18:05:51.653 You gain the skill of Herbs at Grand-Master.
18:05:51.653 You gain the skill of Stealth at Grand-Master.
18:05:51.653 You gain the skill of Poisons at Grand-Master.
18:05:51.653 You gain the skill of Forestry at Grand-Master.
18:05:51.653 -

18:05:55.210 The Ranger guild skills are Forestry, Stealth, Trapping, and Poisons, with the specialisations of Falconry and Sylvan Lore.
18:05:55.210 -

18:06:02.373 The Forestry skill contains a disparate collection of abilities devoted to protecting and fighting in forested locations.
18:06:02.373 Use AB FORESTRY to progress your current chapter.
18:06:02.373 AB FORESTRY
18:06:02.373 -
18:06:02.498 Good!
18:06:02.498 You make use of the Ranger junior-apprenticeship.
18:06:02.498 Your current proficiency in Forestry is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:06:02.498 "Marksmanship" Shooting players/CCCs (computer-controlled characters) [Poor]
18:06:02.498 "Swinging" To swing rapidly through the forest [Apprentice]
18:06:02.498 "Smokescreen" Puffing up a smoke-screen with your pipe [Practitioner]
18:06:02.498 "Improvising" To improvise forest weapons [Practitioner+50%]
18:06:02.498 "Balms" Foraging for healing balms in the foliage [Practitioner+50%]
18:06:02.498 "Spitting" Chewing up a poison and spitting it at an enemy [Competent]

18:06:02.498 "Trimming" Cutting away branches from suitably mature trees [Competent+75%]

18:06:02.514 "Directswing" Swinging directly to individuals in the forest [Grand-Master]
18:06:02.514 "Poisons" To find the whereabouts of local poison growth [Grand-Master]

18:06:02.514 "Whistling" Calling yourself a steed from the forest [+90 lessons]
18:06:02.514 "Pipemaking" Crafting the blowpipe from wood and iron commodities [as above]
18:06:02.514 "Herbalism" To find the whereabouts of local herb growth [as above]
18:06:02.514 "Smokerings" Puffing a poison at an enemy with your pipe [+183 lessons]
18:06:02.514 "Dawndance" Dancing to summon the Sun at night [Advanced-Inherit]
18:06:02.514 Type AB FORESTRY with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB FORESTRY MARKSMANSHIP.
18:06:02.514 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:06:02.514 -

18:06:06.137 The Ranger is without peer in the forested environment and at higher levels able to assume the form of a bear or feral wolf, with poisoned claws and
18:06:06.137 thick skin.
18:06:06.137 -

18:06:16.669 Use AB POISONS to progress your current chapter.
