18:06:53.778 AB POISONS
18:06:53.997 Good!
18:06:53.997 You make use of the Ranger junior-apprenticeship.
18:06:53.997 Your current proficiency in Poisons is Grand-Master. This is a INHERITED skill-set.
18:06:53.997 "Wyg" It causes rapid hair loss [Poor]
18:06:53.997 "Phoroz" It causes paralysis in its victims [Poor]
18:06:53.997 "Poisoning" Poisoning weapons, traps and other items [Apprentice]
18:06:53.997 "Jitsu" It is a poison that causes 50-250 damage [Apprentice]
18:06:53.997 "Grelixar" It is a heavy hallucinogen, with random harmful effects [Practitioner]
18:06:53.997 "Yake" It rots away the victim's tongue [Competent]
18:06:54.013 "Surnamen" It is the only natural source of the Black Death [Competent+50%]
18:06:54.013 "Karfar" It kills unless an antidote is found within approximately ten minutes [Respected]
18:06:54.013 "Vaxvarna" It causes great weakness in the recipient [Respected+25%]
18:06:54.013 "Yavin" It causes memory loss and amnesia [Respected+50%]
18:06:54.013 "Resik" It is a poison which attacks the forearms and hands [Respected+75%]
18:06:54.013 "Quirrog" It is a poison which attacks the lower legs [Renowned]
18:06:54.013 "Kly" Kly is a potent berry poison of short lifespan. It gives between 300 and 500 health damage but cannot be used on arrows [Renowned+33%]
18:06:54.013 "Dynallca" It destroys hearing after a few seconds [Renowned+66%]
18:06:54.013 "Brewing" Brewing herbs or poisons to affect a location with vapours [Master]
18:06:54.013 "Marsillas" It causes a sluggishness of the mind and memory [Master]
18:06:54.044 "Kural" Kural sticks to targets, marking them with a luminosity and strong scent [Master+12%]
18:06:54.044 "Kaskamak" It causes a slow, painful and difficult to cure demise [Master+25%]
18:06:54.044 "Athanzar" It weakens magical resistance by giving the Evil Eye [Master+37%]
18:06:54.044 "Shirolos" It leaves its victim open to being ordered around shortly after administration [Master+62%]
18:06:54.044 "Jegga" It gives the applicant death in four to five seconds [Grand-Master]
18:06:54.044 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:06:54.044 "Ambiarn" It is a physical retardant [+30 lessons]
18:06:54.044 "Exaar" Exaar makes friends enemies and loyal followers into traitors [as above]
18:06:54.044 "Zaganzar" It causes blindness after a few seconds [+30 lessons]
18:06:54.044 "Mouurark" It causes intense fear and paranoia [+91 lessons]
18:06:54.044 Type AB POISONS with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB POISONS WYG.
18:06:54.044 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.

18:07:00.743 Good!
18:07:00.743 You make use of the Ranger junior-apprenticeship.
18:07:00.743 HELP for the "POISONS" ability:

18:07:00.743 The "poisons" ability is rated Grand-Master in the guild skill of Forestry. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:07:00.743 Syntax: DISCERN POISONS <poison type>.

18:07:00.743 Such is your memory of the woodland you have travelled, you are able to keep a mental record of all poison growth in the local area. Type DISCERN
18:07:00.743 POISONS followed by the poison type and you will remember those poisons growing nearby.
18:07:00.743 -

18:07:46.640 "NORTH"
18:07:46.640 Deep in the Greenwood.
18:07:46.640 A snake slides through the undergrowth nearby, and your feet squelch in the soft grassy ground. Leaves rustle and branches moan in the forest canopy
18:07:46.640 above, the wind that glide through the forest causing endlessly changing beams of light to fall through the foliage and a endless dance of shadows on
18:07:46.640 the trees around you. You feel that this place is nature left to itself, fierce and beautiful. To the west, however, the forest appears to grow sparse
18:07:46.640 and more arid. A healer clad in white and forest green stands nearby. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil
18:07:46.640 has yet to be turned. There are (two) rangers here. A vibrant, mature rowan tree blazes in full fruit on the path side. Another grows alongside it.
18:07:46.640 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:07:46.640 You notice exits north and south.
18:07:46.640 -

18:07:47.535 "NORTH"
18:07:47.535 Deep in the Greenwood.
18:07:47.535 You look around you, stopping for a moment in your questing, and become conscious of the whole spectra of life that encompasses you. Beneath your feet
18:07:47.535 leaves and weeds slowly rot into the green, slightly wet ground, providing food for the great trees that surround you. The air is humid, and the rains
18:07:47.535 here are regular making the earth soft and fertile. Insects buzz around you, and small animals move in the forest around you and in the canopy above.
18:07:47.535 You feel both very small, and integrated into a system vaster an more ancient than you can comprehend. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and
18:07:47.535 would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. A muscular Uruk-hai stands guard here.
18:07:47.535 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:07:47.551 You notice exits northeast, southeast, south and west.
18:07:47.551 -

18:07:47.685 "NORTHEAST"
18:07:47.685 Deep in the Greenwood.
18:07:47.701 A plethora of tree trunks disappear into infinity all around you, merging into the green of bushes, leaves and grass in the distance. Little light
18:07:47.701 comes through the forest canopy above, and shadows move across the ground with the swaying of branches above. The air is thick and ancient, the wind
18:07:47.701 unable to penetrate through the dense forest, and you wonder what ancient creatures live here in the depths of the wood. You stand before the grace of
18:07:47.701 emergent rowan. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned.
18:07:47.701 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:07:47.701 You notice exits north, southeast and southwest.
18:07:47.701 -

18:07:47.857 "SOUTHEAST"
18:07:47.857 Old forest road.
18:07:47.857 You stand on the last remnants of the old forest road that used to run west from the river-folk village of Eleusis. Clearly out of use for many
18:07:47.857 centuries, the road disappears here to the southwest into the thick vegetation of the green wood. Vines and weeds spring up through the stones, and
18:07:47.857 then great trees have grown, reclaiming the road for the forest. To the northeast lie the west gates of Eleusis, protecting the town from the horrors
18:07:47.857 that lies within the forest, and in all other directions is the endless mosaic of green that is the greenwood.
18:07:47.857 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:07:47.857 You notice exits northeast, southwest and northwest.

18:08:07.319 Review the treetops ability in Forestry on how to use it.
18:08:07.319 Use AB FORESTRY TREETOPS to progress your current chapter.
18:08:07.319 - AB FORESTRY TREETOPS
18:08:10.541 Good!
18:08:10.541 You make use of the Ranger junior-apprenticeship.
18:08:10.541 HELP for the "TREETOPS" ability:

18:08:10.556 The "treetops" ability is rated Master+75% in the guild skill of Forestry. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:08:10.556 Syntax: SWING TO TREETOPS.

18:08:10.556 First, you must ascend to the treetops. You will find a tree high enough for climbing besides the Stone Cross in the Greenwood forest; swinging around
18:08:10.556 from there will reveal additional places at which you may swing to the treetops.

18:08:10.556 Syntax: SWING <direction>.
18:08:10.556 Once in the treetops, you may SWING in a specific direction to swing on the vines that have been placed in the forests.

18:08:10.556 Syntax: DOWN.
18:08:10.556 To descend from the treetops.
18:08:10.556 -

18:08:14.063 You can reach the treetops of the forests at their centre. Zoom to the ancient Greenwood Forest.
18:08:14.063 Use ZOOM GREENWOOD to progress your current chapter.
18:08:14.063 - ZOOM GREENWOOD
18:08:17.181 Good!
18:08:17.181 You will now instinctively seek Greenwood.
18:08:17.181 -

18:08:17.603 "NORTH"
18:08:17.603 Path entrance.
18:08:17.603 The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be
18:08:17.603 turned. An opaque pod sits here, the surface of its impervious skin pulsing with a strange ethereal hum. A large statue stands here, its pedestal
18:08:17.603 adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Cornelius, the all-consuming. An great old oak tree stands here. The remnants of an enormous statue
18:08:17.603 have fallen here.

18:08:25.525 "SOUTH"
18:08:25.525 Deep in the Greenwood.
18:08:25.525 The remains of festooning linger about the locale. Arthritic with age, an ancient rowan towers over you. Rising from the ground is a street lantern: a
18:08:25.525 tall wrought iron pole bearing a latticework glass cube filled with candles. Standing on reinforced metal stilts thrust deep into the ground, a
18:08:25.525 siegetower rises above you nearby, menacing slits cut into all four of its well-armoured walls. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make
18:08:25.525 a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. A snow-white moon owl rests here, its wings folded at its side. It regards you cautiously with its
18:08:25.525 luminous eyes. An oak tree large and broad, grows here. Another grows alongside it. Hylas the ancient sage of the Northwood leans upon his crooked
18:08:25.525 staff nearby.
18:08:25.525 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.

18:08:31.184 Good!

18:08:31.184 Sitting in a tree above Deep in the Greenwood.
18:08:31.200 You are comfortably positioned in the eaves of the forest, surveying the landscape below as if it were all your domain. Quick assessment judges
18:08:31.200 swinging potential: NORTHEAST through "Path through the old forest" and "Deep in the Greenwood" leading back into the canopy at "Overgrown track
18:08:31.200 through the Greenwood". EAST through "West bank of the river" and "Deep in the Greenwood" leading back into the canopy at "Greenwood treetops above:
18:08:31.200 Woodland path". SOUTHEAST through "Left bank of the river" and "Western bank of the forest island" leading back into the canopy at "The enchanted
18:08:31.200 forest". SOUTHWEST through "The Greenwood forest" and "By cliff face in the Greenwood" leading back into the canopy at "Before the Wolf gate". WEST
18:08:31.200 through "The darkened forest" and "The Uruk road" leading back into the canopy at "The dark forest". NORTHWEST through "Dark forest" and "The darkened
18:08:31.200 forest" leading back into the canopy at "Giant pine tree canopy on forest edge". It would be possible to go down to the forest floor should you wish
18:08:31.200 to leave the safety of the treetops. You gasp as you spot the body of a small hedgehog lying dead on the ground nearby.
18:08:31.200 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.

18:08:41.521 Good!
18:08:41.521 You make use of the Ranger junior-apprenticeship.
18:08:41.521 You jump up and catch a hanging branch. After a short shout and a beating of your chest, you swing off into the distance.
18:08:41.521 Path entrance.
18:08:41.521 Under a canopy of trees the track continues westward into the gloom of the wood; as far as you can make out, the track curves round to the left. To
18:08:41.521 the south, almost concealed under low branches, lies the entrance to a narrow path going deeper into the wood. Although the entrance is dark and
18:08:41.521 uninviting, all you can detect is an intangible presence of peace. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly
18:08:41.521 soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. An opaque pod sits here, the surface of its impervious skin pulsing with a
18:08:41.521 strange ethereal hum. A large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Cornelius, the all-consuming. An
18:08:41.521 great old oak tree stands here. The remnants of an enormous statue have fallen here.

18:09:19.585 -

18:09:22.607 You are presented with the thick velvet robes of lore. Wear them with pride.
18:09:22.607 You receive your lore-staff by command of the Lorecouncil. Wield it with care.
18:09:22.607 Type HELP LORECOUNCIL to know more about the Council of Lore, the governing body of this illustrious profession.
18:09:22.607 -

18:09:23.124 The Loremaster guild skills are Alchemy, Elixirs, Runes, and Forging, with the specialisations of Opalescence and Skymastery.
18:09:23.124 -

18:09:30.346 Runes are made from silver the Loremaster then tinkers into shape by use of a runekit or worktable.
18:09:30.346 Use HELP RUNES to progress your current chapter.
18:09:30.346 - HELP RUNES
18:09:33.417 Good!
18:09:33.417 Runes are also fashioned by members of the Alchemists, Artisans, Craftmasters or Loremasters Guild. They are usually attached to items to give them
18:09:33.417 protection or extra powers. They can be left on the ground to effect passers-by or, most effectively, attached to a rune stave or totem and form
18:09:33.417 cumulative effects. Runes are activated by being seen, or touched. Harmful runes will only affect those designated as targets for the rune by its
18:09:33.417 owner; and even then will also be restricted by the status of the owner (e.g. a pacifist creator cannot easily make harmful runes to affect enemies).
18:09:33.417 Harmful runes ought never to harm their creator, unless deliberately activated.

18:09:33.417 You could also deliberately activate a rune by typing ACTIVATE <rune>. You can cause others to be affected by your runes by showing them - type SHOW
18:09:33.417 followed by the rune, followed by the player you wish to show it too. It is possible to avoid seeing most runes by being blind - though you would need
18:09:33.417 a potion of innersight of the herb of ucklice to enhance your senses sufficiently to overcome the obvious perils of wandering around blind. Members of
18:09:33.417 the Loremaster profession can affect the sequence of prominence of a rune - the number of prominence is shown in RUNELIST or PROBE (with enough
18:09:33.417 Itemlore). This number determines the priority of execution of runes, as one might use in an order of revelation on a rune stave.

18:09:33.417 Anchor Protective rune for helping to keep your items safe.
18:09:33.417 Flower Rune to aid your gardens and herbs/poison growth.
18:09:33.417 Hook Rune to attach to items to allow you to retrieve them from afar.
18:09:33.417 Anvil Attach this rune to an item and it will appear incredibly heavy.
18:09:33.417 Padlock Place this rune on an item and its lock is hugely enhanced.
18:09:33.417 Bell Sets off an alarm when activated, informs owner.
18:09:33.417 Skull Emits a strobe of light, revealing all present.
18:09:33.417 Snowflake Protects an item by making it too cold to take.
18:09:33.417 Oval Protects items from being dropped in most cases.
18:09:33.417 Ankh Destroys spiritual activity and defences when activated.
18:09:33.417 Crescent Destroys candescence activity and defences when activated.
18:09:33.417 Ear Induces deafness soon after it is looked upon.
18:09:33.417 Eye Causes its target to become blind after several seconds.
18:09:33.417 Spear When placed on an item or arrow, ensures it always strikes.
18:09:33.417 Fish Rune of buoyancy preventing items sinking into the sea.
18:09:33.417 Charm Augments the effects of magical offensive acts.
18:09:33.417 Talisman Increases your Constitution skill which defends against magic.
18:09:33.417 Fist Creates a silver sentinel to protect and guard your item.
18:09:33.417 Key When activated it locks all doors magically, stopping thieves.
18:09:33.417 Bug For listening in on conversations, whether in Avalon or not.
18:09:33.417 Pyramid When placed on the ground it protects from summoning and gates.
18:09:33.417 Quarrel A rune in the form of a silver arrow which can banish demons/undead.
18:09:33.417 Spiral When activated it fascinates the onlooker so that they cannot move.
18:09:33.417 Leaf Causes explosions when attached to an item and examined.
18:09:33.417 Octagon Protects an item by rendering it invisible.
18:09:33.417 Flame Restores sight to one who has blinded himself.
18:09:33.417 Knife When activated it causes fear in the onlooker making them flee.
18:09:33.417 Owl Rune of tracking for use by members of the Seer profession.
18:09:33.417 Star Sends out a dire warning to any who should activate it.
18:09:33.417 Cloud Causes its target to fall into a deep slumber.
18:09:33.417 Snake Disrupts steeds, causing them to panic and dismount their rider.
18:09:33.417 Hand Deals health damage to any who look upon it.
18:09:33.417 Face Drains mana from those it affects.
18:09:33.417 Heart Rune of haemophilia, preventing those affected from clotting their bleeding.
18:09:33.417 Circle The disease rune, delivering numerous harmful afflictions.
18:09:33.417 Sphere Rune of warding against ghosts, undead, spirits and mists.
18:09:33.417 Pear Causes insouciance and indifference in any who see it.
18:09:33.417 Cross Paralyses anyone who catches sight of it.
18:09:33.417 Pentagram When activated it renders its location temporarily private.

18:09:33.417 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.

18:09:33.417 You have the RUNES skill at Grand-Master level.
18:09:33.417 Type AB RUNES for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:09:33.417 -

18:09:36.998 All Avalonians have need of the basic protective runes and some make use of the attacking runes and potions made by the Loremaster.
18:09:36.998 -

18:09:44.011 Discover the range of runes by looking at those available to you now.
18:09:44.011 Use AB RUNES to progress your current chapter.
18:09:44.011 - AB RUNES
18:09:47.082 Good!
18:09:47.082 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.
18:09:47.082 Your current proficiency in Runes is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:09:47.082 "Attach" Attaching runes to other objects; a fundamental benefit [Beginner+40%]
18:09:47.082 "Fashion" Fashioning runes to specific uses [Beginner+40%]
18:09:47.082 "Bottle" Fashioning the delicate potion bottle [Beginner+40%]
18:09:47.082 "Unfashion" Unfashion to unravel runes into silver [Beginner+50%]
18:09:47.082 "Alarm" Sets off an alarm of warning. [Poor]
18:09:47.082 "Warning" Sends out a dire warning. [Poor]
18:09:47.082 "Tracker" Location tracking rune. [Apprentice]
18:09:47.082 "Sleep" Engulfs the target in sleep. [Practitioner]
18:09:47.082 "Adjust" Adjusting runic priority or rune stave revelation order [Practitioner+50%]
18:09:47.082 "Steedbane" Causes steeds to panic [Competent]
18:09:47.082 "Weaken" Drains health from enemy. [Competent+25%]
18:09:47.082 "Drain" Weakens mana from enemy. [Competent+50%]
18:09:47.082 "Frostbite" Protects items from thieves. [Competent+50%]
18:09:47.082 "Deaf" Deafens the viewer [Competent+75%]
18:09:47.082 "Blind" Blinds the viewer [Respected]
18:09:47.082 "Hook" Retrieve equipment [Respected]
18:09:47.082 "Areas" Fashioning your runes for cities/areas [Respected]
18:09:47.082 "Haemophilia" Gives haemophilia to viewer. [Respected+25%]
18:09:47.082 "Invisible" Makes an item invisible. [Respected+37%]
18:09:47.082 "Disease" Gives the Black Death [Respected+50%]
18:09:47.082 "Fear" Makes viewer run in fear. [Respected+75%]
18:09:47.082 "Charm" Charm of magical enhancing. [Respected+87%]
18:09:47.082 "Grip" Binds an item to its owner. [Renowned]
18:09:47.082 "Explode" Explodes violently upon contact. [Renowned]
18:09:47.082 "Ship" Rune of possession safety. [Renowned+33%]
18:09:47.082 "Warding" Wards ghosts, undead mists and spirits. [Renowned+33%]
18:09:47.082 "Paralysis" Paralyses the viewer. [Renowned+66%]
18:09:47.082 "Guardian" Creates sentinels to guard for you. [Master]
18:09:47.082 "Guilds" Fashioning runes loyal/for use by an entire guild [Master]
18:09:47.082 "Gardener" Protects organic material when planted. [Master]
18:09:47.082 "Clasp" Renders strong box and such secure. [Master]
18:09:47.082 "Accuracy" Guides projectiles to their target. [Master+37%]
18:09:47.082 "Flash" Gives back sight to the blind. [Master+62%]
18:09:47.082 "Privacy" Making locations private. [Grand-Master]
18:09:47.082 "Insouciance" Insouciance or carelessness [Grand-Master]
18:09:47.082 "Stave" The art of the Rune Stave. [Grand-Master]
18:09:47.082 "Unhook" Removing hook-runes from items [Grand-Master]
18:09:47.082 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:09:47.082 "Talisman" Talisman of magic warding. [+60 lessons]
18:09:47.082 "Tomb" Locks all inside doors. [as above]
18:09:47.082 "Dispersal" Disperses spiritual presences. [+122 lessons]
18:09:47.082 "Diffusion" Affords gate/summon protection. [+273 lessons]
18:09:47.113 Type AB RUNES with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB RUNES ATTACH.
18:09:47.113 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:09:47.113 -

18:09:57.275 Runes are fashioned from the silver and Grip runes are responsible for preventing open theft and potion shattering.

18:09:57.275 - FASHION GRIP
18:10:00.473 Good!
18:10:00.473 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.
18:10:00.473 Normally you would need to be by a rune-fashioning workbench or to have your own runekit. This latter you would doubtless be acquired were you to join
18:10:00.473 the Loremaster profession long-term.
18:10:00.473 This will be a transient creation.
18:10:00.473 You fashion an oval shaped rune out of the silver ore.
18:10:00.473 The rune will not affect you, or your friends.
18:10:00.473 -

18:10:04.018 When you fashion a rune, it must take on a loyalty. If one is not provided, it defaults to yourself.
18:10:04.018 -

18:10:11.093 The loyalty of a rune determines who it will protect or treat as a friend when used offensively.
18:10:11.093 -

18:10:18.091 Now attach the grip rune to your sword, to protect it from theft and destruction.
18:10:18.091 Use ATTACH RUNE TO SWORD to progress your current chapter.
18:10:18.091 - ATTACH RUNE TO SWORD
18:10:21.289 Good!
18:10:21.289 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.
18:10:21.289 You attach an oval-shaped rune to a copper shortsword.
18:10:21.289 -

18:10:24.813 You can attach runes by their shape name and many mortals refer to runes by their shape, instead of their AB RUNES name, so a grip rune would also be
18:10:24.813 called an oval rune.
18:10:24.813 -

18:10:35.396 Now take out a piece of silver to create an offensive rune.
18:10:35.396 Use OUTBELT SILVER to progress your current chapter.
18:10:35.396 - OUTBELT SILVER
18:10:38.736 Good!
18:10:38.736 You take some silver ore from your utility belt.
18:10:38.736 -

18:10:42.247 The weaken rune is a common life-draining rune best used on runestaves, which are placed in rooms to hit enemies who pass by, or on your blade.
18:10:42.247 Use FASHION WEAKEN to progress your current chapter.
18:10:42.247 - FASHION WEAKEN
18:10:45.361 Good!
18:10:45.361 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.
18:10:45.361 Normally you would need to be by a rune-fashioning workbench or to have your own runekit. This latter you would doubtless be acquired were you to join
18:10:45.361 the Loremaster profession long-term.
18:10:45.361 This will be a transient creation.
18:10:45.361 You fashion a hand shaped rune out of the silver ore.
18:10:45.361 The rune will not affect you, or your friends.
18:10:45.361 -

18:10:48.870 When a Loremaster attaches an offensive rune to their sword, they will automatically use runeblades.
18:10:48.870 Use ATTACH RUNE TO SWORD to progress your current chapter.
18:10:48.870 - ATTACH RUNE TO SWORD

18:10:52.082
18:10:52.082 EXCELLENT!
18:10:52.082

18:10:52.082 Your mosaic gains colour as you crafted a grip and weaken rune. Your legend grows.
18:10:52.082 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:10:52.082 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.
18:10:52.098 You attach a hand-shaped rune to a copper shortsword.
18:10:52.098 -

18:10:55.589 Runeblades is an ability to add these runic effects to your attack. There are very few defenses against the rune taking effect against the flesh.
18:10:55.589 -

18:11:02.655 Each hit on another player will rotate to the next offensive rune on your blade. Only one can take effect each hit.
18:11:02.655 -

18:11:09.735 There is no limit to how many you have in a sequence. Careful adjustment of their order can reap many benefits.
18:11:09.735 -

18:11:16.744 Other professions can also use runed swords through the ability in Scholarship, but it requires an intense upkeep of mana.
18:11:16.744 -

18:11:24.293 Learn about using stores and markets.
18:11:24.293 Use DO GOODSED to progress your current chapter.
18:11:24.293 - DO GOODSED
18:11:27.408 Good!
18:11:27.408 The "GOODSED" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
18:11:27.408 Type GOODS while in a shop to complete this experience. HELP SHOPS for more information about using shops.
18:11:27.408 You elect to do the "GOODSED experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.
18:11:27.408 -

18:11:30.967 Head to your city's centre square.
18:11:30.967 Use ZOOM HOME to progress your current chapter.
18:11:30.983 - ZOOM HOME
18:11:34.197 Good!
18:11:34.197 You will now instinctively seek Thakria.
18:11:34.197 -

18:11:34.463 "NORTH"
18:11:34.463 Deep in the forest.
18:11:34.463 Wandering about amongst the shadows of the forest, you are able to pick your way onward. A shaft of light spears down from between two thick fir trees
18:11:34.463 on either side of you, illuminating the mossy forest floor in minutest detail. Southwards, you notice that the trees become less dense and judging by
18:11:34.463 the excess of light, there is a busy trail there. Northwards, however you spot a strange sight - a large metallic structure, covered in most places by
18:11:34.463 tight hugging lichen, but visible nevertheless. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would
18:11:34.463 make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned.
18:11:34.463 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:11:34.463 You notice exits north and south.
18:11:34.463 -

18:11:34.713 "NORTH"
18:11:34.713 Ruined gateway.
18:11:34.713 You are filled with a great sadness as you stand in this place, surrounded by the ruins of what you guess might have been a mighty gateway many
18:11:34.713 centuries ago. Great pieces of smooth white rock have crumbled nearby and are now being absorbed into the forest, covered in thick layers of lichen
18:11:34.713 and vine. The arch of the gate has totally collapsed, although you make out the intricate pattern of geometric shapes that once adorned the arch on
18:11:34.713 pieces of stone lying scattered across the old road which continues north and south. All around you the forest sighs softly in the wind, ominous and
18:11:34.713 powerful. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A tall slender birch grows here. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a
18:11:34.713 worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. Here grows an oak tree, its thick trunk roots reaching wide. A large stone piece of the gate lies
18:11:34.713 embedded in the ground near your feet.
18:11:34.713 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:11:34.713 You notice exits north and south.
18:11:34.713 -

18:11:34.900 "NORTH"
18:11:34.900 Overgrown road.
18:11:34.900 The flagstones of this pathway are long since covered by the thick wild grass and weeds of the forest, although you guess it ran from the ruined
18:11:34.900 gateway to the south, northwards through this ancient settlement. Various crumbled buildings are in evidence on either side of the road, but of many
18:11:34.900 all that remains is a heap of white stone covered in thick vegetation. One building to your east catches your eye, apparently fairly intact although
18:11:34.900 it seems to have a large tree growing straight through its domed roof. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The earth here is incredibly
18:11:34.900 soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned.
18:11:34.900 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.

18:11:43.604 all directions. City barrier fortifications are RAISED with combined strength of 299976. The city barrier forts face ALL defending incursion through
18:11:43.604 the NORTH point. City barrier fortifications are RAISED with combined strength of 293228. The city barrier forts face ALL defending incursion through
18:11:43.604 the SOUTH point. A man wearing a cloak with pictures of the stars on stands here. There are (two) siegetowers here. A wild looking, long nosed man

18:11:47.505 "WEST"
18:11:47.505 Emperors Walk.
18:11:47.505 Balliol the Ruiner is here. A demonic steed proudly bears him. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A young boar stands nearby, peering
18:11:47.505 intently about as it searches for food. A starving boar mopes here. There are (two) loremasters here. A large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned
18:11:47.505 with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Cornelius, the all-consuming. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The
18:11:47.505 soil has yet to be turned. There are (four) sorcerers here. There are (two) piebald hogs here. There are (two) thieves here. A large statue stands
18:11:47.505 here, its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Xanthe, the goddess of vengeance. A large metal tank rests here. Its capacity
18:11:47.505 can be judged at five thousand gallons, safely contained once it is closed and locked tight. It is empty of liquid. A new, wrought-marble milestone
18:11:47.505 stands here. You cringe with fear, as a great barrow-wight rises before you, shrouded in dark mists. A rotting zombie lurches towards you, arms
18:11:47.505 outstretched. The sickly form of a haunting demon greets you, its sallow eyes blinking placidly. A spider demon boasting four tentacles tipped with
18:11:47.505 needle-like claws is here. A bulbous leech demon slops about nearby. A globular sphere of pulsing green liquid rolls about here, two red eyes visible
18:11:47.505 on its exterior. A lesser servitor of darkness lurks here.
18:11:47.505 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:11:47.505 -

18:11:47.887 You have arrived in the centre of Thakria, your home city, and breathe a sigh of relief. Your surroundings feel at once familiar and safe.
18:11:47.887 -

18:11:48.434 In the centre square of each city, there are government-run shops.
18:11:48.434 -

18:11:51.957 You can see locations with shops in the room description.
18:11:51.957 Use LOOK to progress your current chapter.
18:11:51.957 - LOOK
18:11:55.250 Good!
18:11:55.250 Emperors Walk.
18:11:55.297 Thus named after the Thakrian tradition of naming their rulers Emperors, for indeed do they not rule over half the Western Ocean in addition to the
18:11:55.297 City of Miracles? Paved with black obsidian, the Walk is home to many famous guild-halls and bustling activity. Hanging signs depicting the symbol and
18:11:55.297 guildmaster of the Thakrian guilds swing obliviously from highly polished ornate metal awnings. The buildings here are tall, some even reaching four
18:11:55.297 storeys high, and equally grand in addition, such is the affluence of the city and the prominence of its world-renowned guild-halls. Type GOODS for a
18:11:55.297 list of goods sold here. A huge granite milestone stands here. Its jet-black surface is engraved with proud deep-scored letters: "Thakria". Balliol
18:11:55.297 the Ruiner is here. A demonic steed proudly bears him. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A young boar stands nearby, peering intently
18:11:55.297 about as it searches for food. A starving boar mopes here. There are (two) loremasters here. A large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned with
18:11:55.297 offerings. It depicts the likeness of Cornelius, the all-consuming. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil
18:11:55.297 has yet to be turned. There are (four) sorcerers here. There are (two) piebald hogs here. There are (two) thieves here. A large statue stands here,
18:11:55.297 its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Xanthe, the goddess of vengeance. A large metal tank rests here. Its capacity can be
18:11:55.297 judged at five thousand gallons, safely contained once it is closed and locked tight. It is empty of liquid. A new, wrought-marble milestone stands
18:11:55.297 here. You cringe with fear, as a great barrow-wight rises before you, shrouded in dark mists. A rotting zombie lurches towards you, arms outstretched.
18:11:55.297 The sickly form of a haunting demon greets you, its sallow eyes blinking placidly. A spider demon boasting four tentacles tipped with needle-like
18:11:55.297 claws is here. A bulbous leech demon slops about nearby. A globular sphere of pulsing green liquid rolls about here, two red eyes visible on its
18:11:55.297 exterior. A lesser servitor of darkness lurks here.
18:11:55.297 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:11:55.297 You notice exits north (a closed entrance door), east, south (an open reinforced entrance door) and west.
18:11:55.297 -

18:11:58.916 Find a room with a market stall and check the wares sold in your current location.
18:11:58.916 Use GOODS to progress your current chapter.
18:11:58.916 - GOODS

18:12:05.591 All shops, city and private, are run by players. They are a key source of revenue.
18:12:05.591 -

18:12:12.607 With gold in hand, you can BUY by item type (BUY POTION) or with a number (BUY POTION2345).
18:12:12.607 -

18:12:17.883 A word to the wise: Type ADVICE to receive sage counsel appropriate to your course and scholarly status.
18:12:17.883 -

18:12:19.665 You can also check a specific item's information using GOODS <item>, such as GOODS POTION2345.
18:12:19.665 -

18:12:23.625 Explore the powers of the lorerobes and lorestave, unique to the Loremaster.
18:12:23.625 Use DO SKYROBES to progress your current chapter.
18:12:23.625 - DO SKYROBES
18:12:26.770 Good!
18:12:26.770 The "SKYROBES" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
18:12:26.770 You elect to do the "SKYROBES experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.
18:12:26.770 -

18:12:30.335 Although the Loremaster has skills deeply involved in craftsmanship, they are no worse than any other profession in combat.
18:12:30.335 -

18:12:37.400 All other professions must concern themselves with using up their equipment in combat, but the Loremaster has no such concern.
18:12:37.400 -

18:12:44.506 Similarly, the full power of their creations become apparent in the hands of their creator: charmed items are faster, runestaves can only be planted
18:12:44.506 and chopped down by Loremasters, and only Loremasters are able to efficiently splash others with their elixirs.
18:12:44.506 -

18:12:58.516 As a beginning profession, Loremaster is an historic favourite.
18:12:58.516 -

18:13:02.030 Fly to the skies!
18:13:02.030 Use LOREROBES FLIGHT to progress your current chapter.
18:13:02.030 - LOREROBES FLIGHT

18:13:05.110
18:13:05.110 EXCELLENT!
18:13:05.110

18:13:05.110 Your mosaic gains colour as you flown up into the skies. Your legend grows.
18:13:05.110 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:13:05.110 You make use of the Loremaster junior-apprenticeship.
18:13:05.110 Diamonds along your lore-robes are directed towards: the lower skies.
18:13:05.110 You begin to flap your robes furiously and nod knowingly as you shoot up into the skies.
18:13:05.110 In the skies above Thakria.
18:13:05.141 You are in the skies, but a few hundred feet above the confusion of buildings of the bustling metropolis that is Thakria, the City of Miracles. All
18:13:05.141 around you large stone towers reach upwards towards the heavens but three great turrets dominate the city skyline above all others; each emanating
18:13:05.141 serpents of smoke that twine together and tussle for supremacy. The street-map of Thakria is perceptible from such a height: the densely populated,
18:13:05.141 old constructions of the east bank around the square of the Emperor pitted against the more grand, proud buildings of the obsidian west of which
18:13:05.141 Thakria Square and the Central Park are the centrepieces. Through the smokeclouds you perceive the Moonstone Lake to the east and the sea to the west,
18:13:05.141 while mountains rise higher than your present elevation to hem-in the entire northern horizon. Southwest, a doughty fortress of arcane origin has been
18:13:05.141 built on the very edge of the continent before cliffs fall to ocean-lashed rocks; and all about southwest, south, east, and southeast is a forest
18:13:05.141 landscape spanning a diverse but tenebrous spectrum.
18:13:05.141 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:05.141 You notice exits northeast, east, southeast, southwest, west and below.
18:13:05.141 -

18:13:07.528 You have equilibrium.
18:13:07.528 -

18:13:08.779 Although the Loremaster has skills deeply involved in craftsmanship, they are no worse than any other profession in combat.
18:13:08.779 -

18:13:15.888 All other professions must concern themselves with using up their equipment in combat, but the Loremaster has no such concern.
18:13:15.888 -

18:13:22.890 and chopped down by Loremasters, and only Loremasters are able to efficiently splash others with their elixirs.

18:13:54.721 Good!

18:13:54.721 -

18:13:55.331 "DOWN"
18:13:55.331 Northern end of the Avenue of Kings.
18:13:55.331 Here the Avenue of Kings comes to an end, with two subsidiary streets forking to the northeast and northwest into central Thakria. The city proper
18:13:55.331 begins here, the structures are dwelt in by living beings rather than housing the remains of dead souls and the whole atmosphere is one of lively
18:13:55.331 banter and chatter as opposed to quiet meditation and sober reflection. A signpost is stuck in the ground at the exact point at which the road forks,
18:13:55.331 its northeast prong reading "Central Park" while the northwestern prong reads "Docklands" and the third prong pointing south reads "Avenue of Kings".
18:13:55.331 A small, ivy-covered milestone at your feet reads "Thakria". The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A man wearing a cloak with pictures of
18:13:55.331 the stars on stands here. A magical rune stave stands here, an unseen force holding it in place. A loutish brute of a man flexes his muscles at you.
18:13:55.331 A glowing runic stave here is the first thing to catch your attention.
18:13:55.331 The rune stave is unable to affect you; your status as a junior makes you immune.
18:13:55.331 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:55.331 You notice exits north, northeast, southeast, south and northwest.
18:13:55.331 -

18:13:56.081 "NORTHEAST"
18:13:56.081 A glowing rune staff is the last thing to catch your attention.
18:13:56.081 The rune stave is unable to affect you; your status as a junior makes you immune.
18:13:56.081 Junction of Temple Parade and Kings Avenue.
18:13:56.112 Dominating the southern end of Temple Parade is the great temple of The Diabolus. The Black One is revered in Thakria for his might and vision. It is
18:13:56.112 said that the Thakrian's truly see the good points of The Diabolus's prophecy for an Avalon dominated by the strong and bountiful. The Temple is domed,
18:13:56.112 surrounded by a bluish haze which as you squint closer is revealed as swarms of buzzing moths attracted to something unseen within the temple itself.
18:13:56.112 Looking under the archway entrance you are able to see a pulsating light, a light beckoning you to enter and seek your own answers. To the northwest,
18:13:56.112 a temple of newer construction is far larger in size than the evil one's holy ground. Domed too, but in black, and reached by following a pathway some
18:13:56.112 distance so that the temple itself is set back, away from the hurly burly of the citizens, religious or otherwise; this is the temple of Xanthe, the
18:13:56.112 goddess of vengeance. From here you see clearly the pathway end abruptly, turning north beyond northwest, at an ornate, giant gateway - the Vengeance
18:13:56.112 Gate - renowned in these parts and much admired by pilgrims from abroad. Temple Parade runs east and southwest from here, while a small weaponsmith
18:13:56.112 has the gall to intrude on holy precedent and tout its wares to the north. The remains of festooning linger about the locale.
18:13:56.112 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:56.112 You notice exits north, east, south, southwest and northwest (a closed entrance door).
18:13:56.112 -

18:13:56.913 "EAST"
18:13:56.913 Temple Parade.
18:13:56.913 It is the temple of Elmaethor, god of the stars which dominates your view here. As with all the temples devoted to the god of stars, it possesses a
18:13:56.913 great translucent dome for which to view the deities creation. Bejewelled gargoyles guard the entrance to the outer atrium, a fitting tribute to the
18:13:56.913 exalted god of stars. A small yew tree grows at the centre of Temple Parade here, a sapling sprung from some seeds imported from across the sea. Its
18:13:56.913 tender bark exudes a bold corona, affected by the temple no doubt. The Parade continues eastwards and to the south. The remains of festooning linger
18:13:56.913 about the locale. Standing upright and giving out a red-hued light from the orb mounted at its tip is a globestave, its darkwood trunk rooted
18:13:56.913 inviolate to the ground here.
18:13:56.913 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:56.913 You notice exits north, southeast and west.
18:13:56.913 -

18:13:57.523 "NORTH"
18:13:57.523 Temple Parade.
18:13:57.523 Here among a cornucopia of makeshift shrines and rusticated carven images dumped adhoc, like slanting tombstones, along the roadside rise two greater
18:13:57.523 temples. To the southeast is a wide black-ebony stairwell, leading up a short distance from street level, away from the spontaneous local religious
18:13:57.523 outpourings. The stairwell is flanked by two watchdog statues, carved of the same black-ebony material, curious mostly for their eyes. For these eyes
18:13:57.523 are of an opaque crystal, shifting with captured mists; an unusual ambiguity for the templeholder for stairs lead to the lightless interior of the
18:13:57.523 temple of Nostradamus, god of darkness. Northward is a modest temple, decked out by the fledgling priesthood of Loki, god of fire in tapestries
18:13:57.523 depicting the volcano Sapience - a storyboard in fine-weaving wherein the fire-god is seen emerging, in explosive splendour, from the crater. His arms
18:13:57.523 aloft, his fists a-clenched, his threat most clear. The tapestry is clearly also a teaser for the story continues inside the temple. The Parade itself
18:13:57.523 continues northeast and south, while to the west the temples and holy offerings surrender to city proper, grander buildings: guildhouses, government
18:13:57.523 offices and the direction of the centre of Thakria. The remains of festooning linger about the locale.
18:13:57.555 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:57.555 You notice exits north (an open entrance door), northeast, east, southeast, south, west and northwest.
18:13:57.555 -

18:13:58.248 "WEST"
18:13:58.248 East end of Emperors Walk.
18:13:58.248 The Walk ends here, a final flourish of closely packed buildings clinging to the end persistently. Finally conceding its end, the Walk gives way to
18:13:58.248 the central square of Thakria, wherein are a multitude of respectable establishments vending all manner of exotic and necessary items for every-day
18:13:58.248 urban life. North of you is a particularly large guild-hall, while to the south is a single-storey building with tiny barred windows. Inside what is
18:13:58.248 obviously the city gaol you can see a spacious cell, ill-lit but without the typical rodent infestation so commonplace during these hard times.
18:13:58.248 Thakria, as always, manages to overcome the stereotypes of the Age. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. An opaque pod sits here, the
18:13:58.248 surface of its impervious skin pulsing with a strange ethereal hum. A magical rune stave stands here, an unseen force holding it in place. A doughty
18:13:58.248 watchman patrols his beat here.
18:13:58.248 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:58.248 You notice exits north (a closed reinforced entrance door), east, south (a closed entrance door) and west.
18:13:58.248 -

18:13:58.634 "WEST"
18:13:58.634 Emperors Walk.
18:13:58.634 Thus named after the Thakrian tradition of naming their rulers Emperors, for indeed do they not rule over half the Western Ocean in addition to the
18:13:58.634 City of Miracles? Paved with black obsidian, the Walk is home to many famous guild-halls and bustling activity. Hanging signs depicting the symbol and
18:13:58.634 guildmaster of the Thakrian guilds swing obliviously from highly polished ornate metal awnings. The buildings here are tall, some even reaching four
18:13:58.634 storeys high, and equally grand in addition, such is the affluence of the city and the prominence of its world-renowned guild-halls. Type GOODS for a
18:13:58.634 list of goods sold here. A huge granite milestone stands here. Its jet-black surface is engraved with proud deep-scored letters: "Thakria". The
18:13:58.634 remains of festooning linger about the locale. A young boar stands nearby, peering intently about as it searches for food. A starving boar mopes here.
18:13:58.634 There are (two) loremasters here. A large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Cornelius, the all-
18:13:58.634 consuming. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden. The soil has yet to be turned. There are (four) sorcerers here.
18:13:58.634 There are (two) piebald hogs here. There are (two) thieves here. A large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the
18:13:58.634 likeness of Xanthe, the goddess of vengeance. A large metal tank rests here. Its capacity can be judged at five thousand gallons, safely contained
18:13:58.634 once it is closed and locked tight. It is empty of liquid. A new, wrought-marble milestone stands here. You cringe with fear, as a great barrow-wight
18:13:58.634 rises before you, shrouded in dark mists. A rotting zombie lurches towards you, arms outstretched.
18:13:58.634 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:13:58.634 You notice exits north (a closed entrance door), east, south (an open reinforced entrance door) and west.
18:13:58.634 -

18:13:59.647 You have arrived in the centre of Thakria, your home city, and breathe a sigh of relief. Your surroundings feel at once familiar and safe.
18:13:59.647 -

18:14:02.044 From within a city, you can zoom to the local BANK and MARKET.
18:14:02.044 -

18:14:08.792 -

18:14:09.573 "WEST"
18:14:09.573 West end of Emperors Walk.
18:14:09.579 Connecting the central square of Thakria with the holy sanctuaries of Temple Parade, the Emperors Walk is a fine example of Thakrian craftsmanship. It
18:14:09.579 is paved in obsidian, as are all the roads of the City of Miracles, and on either side are the guild-halls of the city. Vaulted roofs and double doors
18:14:09.579 displaying the emblems and names of various guildmasters stand both north and south of you, while The Walk leads west towards the city centre and east
18:14:09.579 back on to Temple Parade. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A wizened hermit rests upon a stone nearby, gleaming eyes regarding you
18:14:09.579 steadily. A magical rune stave stands here, an unseen force holding it in place. A large red pillar box stands on the side of the street here.
18:14:09.580 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:14:09.580 You notice exits north (a closed reinforced entrance door), east, south and west.
18:14:09.581 -

18:14:09.863 "WEST"
18:14:09.863 East of Thakria Square.
18:14:09.926 Over the squat shops and occasional house here can be seen the tremulous spires of one of the great temples to the southeast, stabbing up at the sky
18:14:09.926 like jagged peaks of bluish adamant. The distorted hubbub of voices subsides to a distant murmur here, though you are surrounded by signs of business.
18:14:09.926 Stalls both empty and filled with produce greet your eyes, while signs revealing the hidden secrets of those shops facing you to the northeast and
18:14:09.926 southeast swing gently in the breeze. Eastwards you notice a gap in the houses which surround the square, through which a paved road cuts a swathe. An
18:14:09.926 ornately decorated sign tacked to a protruding wooden beam identifies this as The Emperor's Walk. The remains of festooning linger about the locale.
18:14:09.926 There is a globe-stave here, its crystal orb emanating a soft lambent whiteness. The earth here is incredibly soil-rich and would make a worthy garden.
18:14:09.926 The soil has yet to be turned. A sparkling mix of elements dances about the locale, tightly packed like a fist and showering iridescent motes of proto-
18:14:09.926 dust on all it touches. A brazier wrought of iron and smoke-blackened tin stands in the corner. An opaque pod sits here, the surface of its impervious
18:14:09.926 skin pulsing with a strange ethereal hum.
18:14:09.926 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:14:09.926 You notice exits north (an open gate), east, south, southwest, west and northwest.
18:14:09.926 -

18:14:10.426 "NORTHWEST"
18:14:10.426 North of Thakria Square.
18:14:10.426 The noise of the crowds, and the fragrance of the fruits and produce from the far flung islands of the Thakrian Western Ocean greet you as you wend
18:14:10.426 your way through the milling people. Stalls covered by colourful awnings surrounded by animated waving hagglers and the relatively sedate shops to the
18:14:10.426 north invite perusal of their wares. Your feet are twisted by the untrustworthy cobblestones which have been moulded out of place by the sheer weight
18:14:10.426 of the crowds, the closeness of the atmosphere and the frenzy of the trader's shouts lend a strange oppression to the scene. The remains of festooning
18:14:10.426 linger about the locale. A brazier wrought of iron and smoke-blackened tin stands in the corner.
18:14:10.426 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:14:10.426 You notice exits north, east, southeast, south, southwest, west and northwest.
18:14:10.426 -

18:14:10.676 Aislynn of Thakria has just arrived.
18:14:10.676 -

18:14:10.972 "NORTH"
18:14:10.972 Thakria traders market.
18:14:10.972 From the relative calm of the Avenue of Kings you have emerged into a scene of unmitigated chaos. Crowds swarm around you, arms aloft and voices
18:14:10.972 raised in busy bartering. Barkers should prices from wooden pedestals which echo about the cavernous roof. Thakrian commodities are piled high against
18:14:10.972 the back walls, guarded by stern bemuscled men while all around you people from the far flung corners of Avalon bustle each other for a closer look
18:14:10.972 and a better price. There is a distinct feeling of privacy here. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. There is a globe-stave here, its
18:14:10.972 crystal orb emanating a soft lambent whiteness.
18:14:10.972 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:14:10.972 You notice a single exit south.
18:14:10.972 -

18:14:11.519 You have reached your city's trading market.
18:14:11.519 -

18:14:12.634 The traders market buys and sells to you using government funds. It also accepts DONATE'd commodities.
18:14:12.634 -

18:14:19.778 Check the prices of commodities bought and sold here.
18:14:19.778 Use GOODS to progress your current chapter.
18:14:19.778 - GOODS

18:14:22.942
18:14:22.942 EXCELLENT!
18:14:22.942

18:14:22.942 Your mosaic gains colour as you learned about traders markets. Your legend grows.
18:14:22.942 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:14:22.942 This is a commodity trading market. You are, as yet, too young in your Avalon life to be able to purchase and trade in commodities; though as soon as
18:14:22.942 you have begun your guild apprentice in earnest you will be allowed access.
18:14:22.942 -

18:14:26.490 Each commodity has significance in crafting items, using professional abilities, constructing new buildings, and commissioning legion equipment.
18:14:26.490 -

18:14:29.793 A word to the wise: Type ADVICE to receive sage counsel appropriate to your course and scholarly status.
18:14:29.793 -

18:14:33.467 Raw commodities are created in only two ways: villages or using Farming and Labours.
18:14:33.467 -

18:14:40.484 Villages each have a regular output of specific commodities, with prices accordingly. Trading between them and cities can reveal a profitable margin.
18:14:40.484 -

18:14:47.587 Farming and Labours are skills gained naturally as you mature and improve through regular use. Their abilities cover every commodity available.
18:14:47.587 -

18:14:54.620 The third method of obtaining commodities is occupation of villages by city legions. These must pay tribute in gold coin and a portion of their
18:14:54.620 commodities.
18:14:54.620 -

18:15:02.585 Experience life as a Thief, the most versatile of professions.
18:15:02.585 Use DO SHADOWBLEND to progress your current chapter.
18:15:02.585 - DO SHADOWBLEND
18:15:05.713 Good!
18:15:05.713 The "SHADOWBLEND" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
18:15:05.713 You elect to do the "SHADOWBLEND experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.
18:15:05.713 -

18:15:10.482 Thieves are the undisputed masters of evasion, theft, poison, disguise, lock and key, traps, ambush, and shadow. They are perhaps the most diversely
18:15:10.482 capable profession with legendary figures spanning great merchants to ruthless killers and everything in between.
18:15:10.482 -

18:15:24.560 The profession has two guilds: the Nightblades Guild of Thakria and the Assassins Guild of Silverfalls.
18:15:24.560 -

18:15:31.584 The Thief is a regular favourite throughout history, with evasion, theft, traps, and secretive powers all within their unique skillset.
18:15:31.584 Use SELECT THIEF to progress your current chapter.
18:15:31.584 - SELECT THIEF
18:15:34.741 Good!
18:15:34.741 You discard the Loremaster profession skill-set.
18:15:34.741 You take on the Thief profession and gain its skill-set.
18:15:34.741 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:15:34.741 You gain the skill of Stealth at Grand-Master.
18:15:34.741 You gain the skill of Thievery at Grand-Master.
18:15:34.741 You gain the skill of Poisons at Grand-Master.
18:15:34.741 You gain the skill of Trapping at Grand-Master.
18:15:34.741 -

18:15:38.444 The Thief guild skills are Thievery, Stealth, Trapping, and Poisons, and the specialisations of Burglary, Assassination, and Shadows.
18:15:38.444 -

18:15:45.494 Review the abilities in Stealth which allows you to creep unseen and become an untraceable shadow.
18:15:45.494 Use AB STEALTH to progress your current chapter.
18:15:45.494 - AB STEALTH
18:15:48.558 Good!
18:15:48.558 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:15:48.558 Your current proficiency in Stealth is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:15:48.558 "Hide" Ability to hide yourself from view [Innate]
18:15:48.558 "Knives" Throwing knives and edged weapons at enemies [Beginner+47%]
18:15:48.558 "Scent" Scenting the trails left by others [Poor]
18:15:48.558 "Tracking" Ability to track others without being seen [Poor]
18:15:48.558 "Dead" Playing dead and appearing as a ghost [Apprentice]
18:15:48.558 "Faking" Faking your visible entry or departure [Practitioner]
18:15:48.558 "Whisking" Giving the impression of entry and leaving [Competent]
18:15:48.558 "Blend" Blending into the shadows, unseen [Competent]
18:15:48.558 "Block" Allows you to block specific directions [Competent+50%]
18:15:48.558 "Squeezing" Squeezing past walls of ice and items blocking [Respected]
18:15:48.558 "Running" Running around without looking or glancing [Respected+25%]
18:15:48.558 "Dodging" Gives you limited dodging ability of projectiles [Respected+50%]
18:15:48.558 "Dragging" Forcibly dragging your enemies with you [Respected+75%]
18:15:48.558 "Slink" Slinking about without being noticed [Renowned]
18:15:48.558 "Autoblend" Automatically blending into the shadows [Renowned+33%]
18:15:48.558 "Trueblend" Blending inside even if there is light [Renowned+66%]
18:15:48.558 "Stab" Knife throwing, distribution of poisons [Master]
18:15:48.558 "Ropes" Unfurling ropes in your wake to make connections between covert mechanisms [Master+12%]
18:15:48.594 "Sprinting" To sprint rapidly in a given direction [Master+37%]
18:15:48.594 "Disguise" Assuming the semblance of a CCC [Master+62%]
18:15:48.594 "Hijacking" Holding up the stagecoach [Grand-Master]
18:15:48.594 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:15:48.594 "Silence" Walking around in total silence [+90 lessons]
18:15:48.594 "Trees" Hiding up in the boughs of a tree [as above]
18:15:48.594 "Push" Pushes somebody in a specific direction [+62 lessons]
18:15:48.594 "Yoking" The ability to tame beasts and ride them [+153 lessons]
18:15:48.594 Type AB STEALTH with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB STEALTH HIDE.
18:15:48.594 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:15:48.594 -

18:15:52.233 Stealth is also known by Rangers, and to a limited degree by Sorcerers and Seers. All four professions are experts in secrecy and surprise.
18:15:52.233 -

18:16:00.374 Review the syntax required for blending into the shadows, regardless of the LIGHT levels in the location.
18:16:00.374 Use AB STEALTH TRUEBLEND to progress your current chapter.
18:16:00.374 - AB STEALTH TRUEBLEND
18:16:03.573 Good!
18:16:03.573 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:16:03.573 HELP for the "TRUEBLEND" ability:

18:16:03.573 The "trueblend" ability is rated Renowned+66% in the guild skill of Stealth. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:16:03.573 Syntax: TRUEBLEND.
18:16:03.573 Trueblend is a potent Stealth ability. It allows you to blend into the background of your surroundings even when they are bathed in natural light to .
18:16:03.573 Type TRUEBLEND to effect a blending. Blending augments many of your offensive abilities, and if the enemy is without light and the herb ucklice, they
18:16:03.573 will be very vulnerable to your attacks.
18:16:03.573 -

18:16:07.532 Enact the trueblend ability and enter life in the shadows. You can REVEAL yourself at any time.
18:16:07.532 Use TRUEBLEND to progress your current chapter.
18:16:07.532 - TRUEBLEND

18:16:10.666
18:16:10.666 EXCELLENT!
18:16:10.666

18:16:10.666 Your mosaic gains colour as you blended into the shadows. Your legend grows.
18:16:10.666 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:16:10.666 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:16:10.666 You blend into the shadows and peer out unseen.
18:16:10.666 -

18:16:53.932 Good!
18:16:53.932 You lean forth, readying to ZOOM to Ferdinand at "Amphitheatre ring".

18:16:54.276 "SOUTH"
18:16:54.276 You can no longer sustain your concealment in the shadows. There is too much light. North of Thakria Square.
18:16:54.276 The noise of the crowds, and the fragrance of the fruits and produce from the far flung islands of the Thakrian Western Ocean greet you as you wend
18:16:54.276 your way through the milling people. Stalls covered by colourful awnings surrounded by animated waving hagglers and the relatively sedate shops to the
18:16:54.276 north invite perusal of their wares. Your feet are twisted by the untrustworthy cobblestones which have been moulded out of place by the sheer weight
18:16:54.276 of the crowds, the closeness of the atmosphere and the frenzy of the trader's shouts lend a strange oppression to the scene. The remains of festooning
18:16:54.276 linger about the locale. A brazier wrought of iron and smoke-blackened tin stands in the corner.
18:16:54.276 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:16:54.276 You notice exits north, east, southeast, south, southwest, west and northwest.
18:16:54.276 -

18:16:54.542 "SOUTHWEST"
18:16:54.542 West of Thakria Square.
18:16:54.573 A somewhat darker aspect surrounds the western Thakrian square, those shop-fronts and buildings which are open for business in this quarter displaying
18:16:54.573 rather a conspicuous absence of produce. Westwards between two buildings is a dark alleyway, overhung by upper storeys as one would find in a forest
18:16:54.573 tunnel. It leads, judging by the salty smell, towards the seafront and meanders a gentle syncline. The distinctive sound of silence hangs in the air,
18:16:54.573 and by some sense other than sight you conclude that business in this area is done behind closed doors; which indeed most of the entrances to the
18:16:54.573 surrounding houses are. Eastwards the square is more lively, and the nature of the business more open as market stalls and the noisy hubbub of a
18:16:54.573 haggling crowd lend the comfort of routineness. There is a distinct feeling of privacy here. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A
18:16:54.573 large statue stands here, its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Elmaethor, god of the stars. There are (two) elixir vapours
18:16:54.573 here. A sparkling mix of elements dances about the locale, tightly packed like a fist and showering iridescent motes of proto-dust on all it touches.
18:16:54.573 There is a globe-stave here, its crystal orb emanating a soft lambent whiteness. A sparkling mix of elements dances about the locale, tightly packed
18:16:54.573 like a fist and showering iridescent motes of proto-dust on all it touches. A milestone is set here, smashed by some accidental collision. A magical
18:16:54.573 rune stave stands here, an unseen force holding it in place. There is a fire arranged nearby, its wood stacked ready for lighting. There are five logs
18:16:54.573 on the fire. A brazier wrought of iron and smoke-blackened tin stands in the corner.
18:16:54.573 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:16:54.573 You notice exits north, northeast, east, southeast, south and west.
18:16:54.573 -

18:16:54.870 "WEST"
18:16:54.870 Alleyway west of the square.
18:16:54.870 Away from the hustle and bustle of the central square of Thakria, this short alleyway passes uncomfortably through the narrow gap between two rows of
18:16:54.870 buildings connecting the square with the Docklands. The pavement beneath your feet is cobbled, a poor job as your feet are constantly being sent
18:16:54.870 crooked by the uneven surface. Unfortunately the houses on either side of you have shuttered their windows from the passers-by, black paint peeling
18:16:54.870 from the protective shafts. Upon many of the closely collected roofs are brick chimneys, from which smoke pours and forms a silent shroud about the
18:16:54.870 alleyway which leads east on to the Thakria Square and west through to the Docklands. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. The remnants
18:16:54.870 of an enormous statue have fallen here. A large pile of ash lies here. A milestone is set here, broken in places and blackened by some deadly wrath. A
18:16:54.870 new, wrought-marble milestone stands here. A large net of thin, intertwined strips lies here. A covert figure lurks about nearby. His face is obscured.
18:16:54.870 Dawn has lit the sky with her streamers of rosy red.
18:16:54.901 You notice exits north (a closed entrance door), northeast (a closed entrance door), east, south and west.
18:16:54.901 -

18:17:18.403 "NORTHEAST"
18:17:18.403 Grassy knoll by city market-square.
18:17:18.403 The remains of festooning linger about the locale. Driven into the rocky ground rise lamp-posts swinging with great luminous globes - lanterns
18:17:18.403 illuminating the underground street. The remnants of an enormous statue have fallen here. A mage potters around aimlessly nearby. A small iron-bound
18:17:18.403 chest with a ministerial crest on its lid rests here. The earth here is frozen from the winter months, awaiting the thaw of the springtime. The soil
18:17:18.403 has yet to be turned. There is a globe-stave here, its crystal orb emanating a soft lambent whiteness. The most potent of all the globestaves is
18:17:18.403 rooted into the ground here, its darkwood trunk married to a cupola housing a violet-hued orb. Its light is curiously understated, more phosphorescent
18:17:18.403 than brilliant. The most potent of all the globestaves is rooted into the ground here, its darkwood trunk married to a cupola housing a violet-hued
18:17:18.403 orb. Its light is curiously understated, more phosphorescent than brilliant. A Knight stands on guard here, confidently surveying his surroundings.
18:17:18.403 The sky is alive with the day-time.

18:17:30.215 you can move or check out the MAP.

18:20:45.227 Good!
18:20:45.227 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:20:45.227 Your current proficiency in Thievery is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:20:45.227 "Disarm" Disarming an enemy of his or her weapon [Beginner+40%]
18:20:45.227 "Stun" Striking a quick, sharp blow to stun an opponent [Poor]
18:20:45.227 "Bola" Deadly spinning weapon strike with singular retrieval qualities [Poor]
18:20:45.227 "Steal" Stealing items from folk. Easier when they cannot see you [Poor]
18:20:45.227 "Archery" You can shoot players and CCCs [Apprentice]
18:20:45.227 "Fletching" Fletching arrows from wood [Apprentice+20%]
18:20:45.227 "Thiefambush" Ambushing players or CCCs from the shadows [Practitioner]
18:20:45.227 "Assessing" Assessment of locks on doors and items [Practitioner]
18:20:45.227 "Lockpicking" The ability to open and close non-magical locks [Practitioner]
18:20:45.227 "Secreting" To secret something on somebody [Practitioner+50%]
18:20:45.227 "Keymaking" Making new permanent keys from existing masters [Competent+50%]
18:20:45.227 "Snipe" To shoot folk from within a tree or a stagecoach [Competent+75%]
18:20:45.227 "Interrogate" Interrogating CCCs for player whereabouts [Respected]
18:20:45.227 "Shortbows" Fashioning the shortbow for basic archery [Respected]
18:20:45.227 "Jump" Jumping clear of pits [Respected]
18:20:45.227 "Locks" Fashioning a new lock where no existed before [Respected+12%]
18:20:45.227 "Slings" Loosing a stone to stun and injure from afar [Respected+25%]
18:20:45.227 "Improvising" Hasty search for crude weapons [Respected+50%]
18:20:45.227 "Pilfer" Pilfering gold from unsuspecting rich-folk [Respected+75%]
18:20:45.227 "Snooping" Listening to the conversations of others [Respected+87%]
18:20:45.227 "Yanking" Yanking people into your location using rope [Renowned]
18:20:45.227 "Daubing" Daubing opponent to track their movements [Renowned+16%]
18:20:45.227 "Summarize" Quick glance to assess a victim's inventory [Renowned+33%]
18:20:45.227 "Palming" Manipulating items without being seen to do so [Renowned+33%]
18:20:45.227 "Keyworking" Creation of temporary keys from lock impressions [Renowned+66%]
18:20:45.227 "Spitting" Spitting poisons at your enemies [Renowned+83%]
18:20:45.227 "Whiffing" Sniffing out large stashes of gold in the distance [Master]
18:20:45.227 "Honing" Honing a lockpicking kit with your unique skills [Master]
18:20:45.227 "Skeletons" Accumulating and using the multipurpose skeleton keys [Master]
18:20:45.227 "Throttle" Strangulation. Drastic health loss [Master]
18:20:45.227 "Arrowing" Shooting accurate arrow-strikes at inventory items [Master+12%]
18:20:45.227 "Luck" Calling upon Lady Luck to bestow singular good-fortune [Master+37%]
18:20:45.227 "Scream" Changing the pitch and depth of your voice in shout [Master+75%]
18:20:45.227 "Unhook" Removing hook-runes from items thusly marked [Master+87%]
18:20:45.227 "Longbows" Fashioning longbows from wood and furs [Grand-Master]
18:20:45.227 "Peeking" Peeking into the contents of people's backpacks and sacks [Grand-Master]
18:20:45.227 "Secrecy" Performing various actions in secrecy [Grand-Master]
18:20:45.258 the following abilities will be attained next:

18:20:52.041 Good!
18:20:52.057 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:20:52.057 HELP for the "SUMMARIZE" ability:

18:20:52.057 The "summarize" ability is rated Renowned+33% in the guild skill of Thievery. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:20:52.057 Syntax: SUMMARISE <target>.
18:20:52.057 To carry out quick, successful robbery, it helps to establish what choice items your target carries. By simply peering at them, you will assess the
18:20:52.057 full details of their inventory.
18:20:52.057 -

18:21:00.628 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:21:00.628 -

18:21:02.332 Review how to steal from another player.
18:21:02.347 Use AB THIEVERY STEAL to progress your current chapter.
18:21:02.347 - AB THIEVERY STEAL
18:21:05.520 Good!
18:21:05.520 You make use of the Thief junior-apprenticeship.
18:21:05.520 HELP for the "STEAL" ability:

18:21:05.520 The "steal" ability is rated Poor in the guild skill of Thievery. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:21:05.520 Syntax: STEAL <item> FROM <player/CCC>.

18:21:05.520 Stealing from players or CCCs is dependant on your Stealing skill as compared with the Perception of your target. If the person holding the item you
18:21:05.520 propose to steal is sleeping, unconscious, blind or otherwise visually impaired then your thievery will be much easier. The STEAL command
18:21:05.520 automatically uses your most advanced form of stealing and pre-specialisation this will be the "basic" stealing: instant and, when used on suitable
18:21:05.520 targets, delightfully anonymous.

18:21:05.520 NOTE: progression to specialised burglary provides more than one method of stealing and you should remember BASICSTEAL can be used after
18:21:05.520 specialisation to use the fast-but-imperfect "instant" method of stealing. The syntax is the same as STEAL above.
18:21:05.520 -

18:21:09.491 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:21:09.491 -

18:21:09.491 If you provide an item with a number, it will attempt to steal that specific item. Without a number, it will attempt the first in the list of that
18:21:09.491 type. Herbs like witan are never protected and make a perfect target.
18:21:09.491 Use STEAL WITAN FROM FERDINAND to progress your current chapter.
18:21:09.491 - STEAL WITAN FROM FERDINAND

18:21:30.733 life: from use of abilities and everyday experiences to deeds of historical importance and defining moments of heroism or villainy. The evolves to
18:21:30.733 symbolise the unique coalescion of experiences of your Avalon legend.

18:21:35.842 FOURTH CHAPTER progress: NOT A SINGLE experiences done with ALL left to do.

18:21:35.842 Experiences make up chapters; completed chapters bring rewards and each makes up part of a mosaic chronicle - the life story of an Avalon character -
18:21:35.842 the building of your LEGEND. In your case the path to legendary standing ends with the 91st chapter.

18:21:35.842 Need help? CHAPTER HELP gives you what extra info people have added to the experiences listed above.

18:24:20.922 Good!
18:24:20.922 You discard the Thief profession skill-set.

18:24:20.938 You gain the skill of Voice at Grand-Master.
18:24:20.938 You gain the skill of Songs at Grand-Master.
18:24:20.938 You gain the skill of Music at Grand-Master.
18:24:20.938 You gain the skill of Dramatics at Grand-Master.
18:24:20.938 -

18:24:24.439 The Bard guild skills are Voice, Songs, Dramatics, and Music, and it has no specialisation at this time.
18:24:24.439 -

18:24:26.120 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:24:26.120 -

18:24:31.498 Voice is by far the most versatile skill, with one central ability: compelling others to perform an action against their will.
18:24:31.498 -

18:24:34.555 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:24:34.555 -

18:24:38.577 The power of this ability is up to the wielder, who often must know their enemy's range of commands to be most effective.
18:24:38.577 Use HELP VOICE to progress your current chapter.
18:24:38.577 - HELP VOICE
18:24:41.659 Good!
18:24:41.659 The Voice is one of the mightiest abilities in Avalon, allowing you to extend your will through vocal tones to control other players. It can be used
18:24:41.659 to effectively "force" an action by another player. Needless to say the higher your Voice, the more successful your Voice will become and once you
18:24:41.659 attain the highest ranks of Master you will find yourself with a considerable power at your disposal for influence. Success of Voice is measured
18:24:41.659 against the inherent level of your opponent and their skill in Voice. Against non-bards, therefore, you will find yourself having more success as they
18:24:41.659 will not realise that you are using The Voice against them.

18:24:41.659 NOTE: The "voice" tone of command will not work against those divinely protected, pacifist, deaf, alkar'd, held steadfast by canticle/enchanted
18:24:41.659 immobilisation, or through duellist or junior player shielding. It is ineffectual against certain animal forms, primarily the Werewolf and the Bear.

18:24:41.659 On Computer-Controlled Characters you can mimic the ORDER command with your Voice. If successful you will ORDER the CCC around almost as if it were
18:24:41.659 loyal to you. Voice uses its own form of equilibrium which is broken when other enchantments are used requiring normal equilibrium, but, conversely,
18:24:41.659 does not restrict your use of other equilibrium after issuing a Voice command.

18:24:41.659 Examples:
18:24:41.659 - Voice aragorn drop key
18:24:41.675 - Voice yossarian give potion to me
18:24:41.675 You make use of the Bard junior-apprenticeship.

18:24:41.690 You have the VOICE skill at Grand-Master level.
18:24:41.690 Type AB VOICE for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:24:41.690 -

18:24:43.188 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:24:43.188 -

18:24:45.204 in finer detail. They are available to all mortals.
18:24:45.204 Use ZOOM FERDINAND to progress your current chapter.
