18:25:12.595 Bardic abilities are largely non-lethal, except when used with the dramatic stigmata. Practice its use to understand how Bardic dramatics work.
18:25:12.595 Use DO BARDSTIGMATA to progress your current chapter.
18:25:12.595 - DO BARDSTIGMATA
18:25:15.788 Good!
18:25:15.788 The "BARDSTIGMATA" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
18:25:15.788 You elect to do the "BARDSTIGMATA experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.
18:25:15.788 -

18:25:17.508 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:25:17.508 -

18:25:19.720 Some skills require a separate step of preparation because you may wish to repeat them, such as CHANT in Charming, PERFORM in Dramatics, and SING in
18:25:19.720 SONGS. To execute a dramatic, you then ACT on your target.
18:25:19.720 Use HELP DRAMATICS to progress your current chapter.
18:25:19.720 - HELP DRAMATICS
18:25:22.836 Good!
18:25:22.836 Dramatics is a basic Bardic ability to use movements and acting to conjure enchantment and affect your surroundings. Dramatics only work while you are
18:25:22.836 visible, on targets who are able to see your efforts. Darkness obscures dramatic effect. Dramatics include, at later levels, hypnotism, trancing, and
18:25:22.836 are often used to supplement or prepare the Music and Songs skills. Many dramatics are vocal and thus require use of the performers voice or tongue to
18:25:22.836 complete; some are strenuous with specific physical requirements (or blocked by certain afflictions of the body). Most demand "breath" by dint of the
18:25:22.836 rigorously demanding actions - in the same way running around the land causes breathlessness, eventually building to stumbling. The dramatist must
18:25:22.836 husband his or her resources else the performance will end prematurely.
18:25:22.836 You make use of the Bard junior-apprenticeship.

18:25:22.836 Dramatics must overmatch the experience of a target in most offensive acts. Master Dramatics is able to reach Ordainable level, Legendary Dramatics
18:25:22.836 can best up to Ordainable level, Ultimate Dramatics can cope with anybody of Ordainable level and below while Crowned Dramatics can overcome
18:25:22.836 Ordainable and beyond.
18:25:22.836 -

18:25:26.068 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:25:26.068 -

18:25:26.350 Review the list of abilities available in Dramatics. Most of its abilities are afflictive and result in no damage to health or mana.
18:25:26.350 Use AB DRAMATICS to progress your current chapter.
18:25:26.350 - AB DRAMATICS
18:25:29.762 Good!
18:25:29.762 You make use of the Bard junior-apprenticeship.
18:25:29.762 Your current proficiency in Dramatics is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:25:29.762 "Hunger" The dramatic that induces hunger [Innate]
18:25:29.762 "Perform" Performing dramatic enchantment ready for the act [Innate]
18:25:29.762 "Relaxation" Relaxes some of an enemy's defences [Apprentice]
18:25:29.762 "Revelation" Causes your target to reveal information [Apprentice]
18:25:29.762 "Itch" To cause an enemy's movements to slow down enormously [Practitioner]
18:25:29.762 "Feign" To feign sleeping, meditation, or death [Competent]
18:25:29.762 "Invulnerability" Makes you appear invulnerable to enemy blows [Competent+50%]
18:25:29.762 "Deceased" Acting as if dead [Competent+50%]
18:25:29.762 "Mime" To fake actions to all of those around you [Respected]
18:25:29.762 "Feint" To feint movement in a specific direction [Respected]
18:25:29.762 "Blackheart" Induces the black-heart curse in a target [Respected+25%]
18:25:29.762 "Oratory" To give out experience to those around you [Respected+50%]
18:25:29.762 "Soliloquy" Speaking words of mana restoration [Respected+75%]
18:25:29.762 "Masque" To disguise yourself as something or somebody else [Renowned]
18:25:29.762 "Redemption" Causes a target to swear off evil deeds [Renowned+33%]
18:25:29.762 "Vertigo" Induces a fear of heights into your target [Renowned+66%]
18:25:29.762 "Trance" Sends a target into a trance, evoked by word [Master]
18:25:29.762 "Comedy" Cause your spirits to soar, regenerating lost health [Master+50%]
18:25:29.840 "Tapdance" Mesmeric footwork to hold an audience spellbound [Master+50%]
18:25:29.840 "Dialogue" To discover an item's location through interrogation [Master+75%]
18:25:29.840 "Parley" To cause your enemy to throw down their weapons [Grand-Master]
18:25:29.840 "Stigmata" Causes your target to bleed profusely [Grand-Master]
18:25:29.840 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:25:29.840 "Prayer" Forces a target to clasp their hands together [+60 lessons]
18:25:29.840 "Gullible" Forces a target to declare you a friend [+31 lessons]
18:25:29.840 "Antipathy" Hypnotises a target into declaring enemies [+122 lessons]
18:25:29.840 "Invincible" Makes a target perceive themself invulnerable [+243 lessons]
18:25:29.840 Type AB DRAMATICS with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB DRAMATICS HUNGER.
18:25:29.840 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:25:29.840 -

18:25:33.572 Dramatics are a complex interplay of afflictions. Alongside Thief, Ranger, and Seer, Bard is an affliction specialist who uses these crippling and
18:25:33.572 immobilising effects before swooping in for the kill.
18:25:33.572 -

18:25:34.809 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:25:34.809 -

18:25:43.322 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:25:43.322 -

18:25:44.104 The stigmata dramatic has some special considerations of its own and allows for the normally non-lethal Cry song of the Bard to be a killing blow. It
18:25:44.104 is a stock attack that does damage by profuse bleeding.
18:25:44.104 Use AB DRAMATICS STIGMATA to progress your current chapter.
18:25:44.104 - AB DRAMATICS STIGMATA
18:25:47.268 Good!
18:25:47.268 You make use of the Bard junior-apprenticeship.
18:25:47.268 HELP for the "STIGMATA" ability:

18:25:47.268 The "stigmata" ability is rated Grand-Master in the guild skill of Dramatics. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:25:47.268 Syntax: PERFORM STIGMATA, then ACT <target>.
18:25:47.268 Causes the target to start bleeding gradually. Each time you perform the dramatic stigmata, you will increase the target's bleeding. It is especially
18:25:47.268 effective on an opponent with haemophilia. The stigmata diagnoses as haemopholia in a target but should not be confused as the symptom; the cause is a
18:25:47.268 far deeper affliction and defies Healing and non-carnia doctoring to reverse.

18:25:47.268 NOTE: while it is possible for an opponent in battle to die from loss of blood, it will only be considered a direct kill by the Bard responsible for
18:25:47.268 the stigmata if death happens within three attack rounds of your most recent strike (and no violent damaging blow is landed by somebody else in
18:25:47.268 between).
18:25:47.268 -

18:25:51.072 Some special cases exist where performance also requires a delay. Since stigmata is lethal, it is one of them.
18:25:51.072 Use PERFORM STIGMATA to progress your current chapter.
18:25:51.072 -

18:25:53.055 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:25:53.055 - PERFORM STIGMATA
18:25:54.321 Good!
18:25:54.321 You make use of the Bard junior-apprenticeship.
18:25:54.321 You press your palms together with all of your strength to prepare the stigmata.
18:25:54.321 -

18:25:57.899 For a dramatic to be effective, the target must be able to see it. Use the stigmata on Ferninand to see it in action.
18:25:57.899 Use ACT FERDINAND to progress your current chapter.
18:25:57.899 - ACT FERDINAND

18:26:01.524 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:26:01.524 -

18:26:02.181 You have equilibrium.
18:26:02.181 -

18:26:04.604 In combination with Songs with an area-wide effect to shatter potions, heal, and stun, the Bard is a frightening enemy.
18:26:04.604 -

18:26:09.988 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:26:09.988 -

18:26:11.734 The limitless possibilities for group and solo combat mark the Bard as the most sophisticated and challenging profession in Avalon.
18:26:11.734 -

18:26:18.758 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:26:18.758 -

18:26:23.019 Good!

18:26:23.019 -

18:26:26.532 The Sorcerer is unique amongst those available for being patently evil and sadistic. Their wave after wave of demonic hordes and control of spirit and
18:26:26.532 blood place them as the most natural-born killer.

18:26:37.227 -

18:26:41.342 Select the Sorcerer profession to begin exploring its abilities.
18:26:41.342 Use SELECT SORCERER to progress your current chapter.
18:26:41.342 - SELECT SORCERER
18:26:44.496 Good!
18:26:44.496 You discard the Bard profession skill-set.
18:26:44.496 You take on the Sorcerer profession and gain its skill-set.
18:26:44.496 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.
18:26:44.496 You gain the skill of Charming at Grand-Master.
18:26:44.496 You gain the skill of Stealth at Grand-Master.
18:26:44.496 You gain the skill of Evocation at Grand-Master.
18:26:44.496 You gain the skill of Demonology at Grand-Master.
18:26:44.496 You gain the skill of Necromancy at Beginner.
18:26:44.496 -

18:26:45.199 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:26:45.199 -

18:26:47.980 The Sorcerer guild skills are Demonology, Evocation, Stealth, and Charming, and the specialisations of Necromancy and Thaumaturgy.
18:26:47.980 -

18:26:53.729 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:26:53.729 -

18:26:55.042 Demons comprise the bulk of a Sorcerer's attacking force, behind which he commands dark spirits to throttle and debilitate his enemies.
18:26:55.042 Use HELP DEMONOLOGY to progress your current chapter.
18:26:55.042 - HELP DEMONOLOGY
18:26:58.203 Good!
18:26:58.203 Demonology is a skill determining your power to control and tempt the demonic forces which exist in the lower planes of light and darkness. To summon
18:26:58.203 a demon you must create a gate to the other planes. This is done using the special cauldrons of demon summoning. Most of the Sorcerers (the
18:26:58.203 professional class most proficient in Demonlogy) hold portable cauldrons to enable them to summon their demonic entourage anywhere in the land.

18:26:58.203 Demons are tempted into the mortal realm by gold and blood - the two commodities most valuable in their foul nether-worldly abode. To bring forth a
18:26:58.203 demon you need to PUT <gold> in CAULDRON or if you prefer the blood-temptation, PUT <dead body> IN CAULDRON. Human bodies are the most valuable but
18:26:58.203 the demons will enjoy any corpse so long as it is fresh.

18:26:58.203 So long as you have enough gold or blood-equivalent put into the strange cauldron you may begin a summoning. To do this type INTONE followed by one of
18:26:58.203 the secret words known only to the demonologist. The cauldron will spring a flame whose colour is made by the word you chose - numerous words exist,
18:26:58.203 their use determining the loyalty purpose of the summoned demon. The final command after having intoned is SUMMON <demon name> selecting the name from
18:26:58.203 your AB DEMONOLOGY abilities list.

18:26:58.219 Type INTONE or SUMMON on their own to discover your proficiencies. You will also find that you can ORDER certain demons to regard specific players.
18:26:58.219 ORDER DEMON <player> is the syntax for this command, or ORDER ENTOURAGE <player> to order them all at once. Type CALL DEMONS to summon all of your
18:26:58.219 loyal demons, DEMONS to summarize your demonic entourage and TAME to tame wild demons. Demons are vulnerable to quarrel (arrow) runes but can be
18:26:58.219 strengthened by the bonding found in Evocation and Spiritualism.

18:26:58.219 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.

18:26:58.219 You have the DEMONOLOGY skill at Grand-Master level.
18:26:58.219 Type AB DEMONOLOGY for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:26:58.219 -

18:27:01.863 Review what demons are available at your level. Each demon provides a special function.
18:27:01.863 Use AB DEMONOLOGY to progress your current chapter.
18:27:01.863 -

18:27:02.520 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:27:02.520 - AB DEMONOLOGY
18:27:05.075 Good!
18:27:05.075 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.
18:27:05.075 Your current proficiency in Demonology is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:27:05.075 "Intone" Intoning to call the summoning flame over your demon cauldron [Beginner+50%]
18:27:05.075 "Calling" Calling your summoned demons to attend your entourage [Beginner+50%]
18:27:05.075 "Demonlist" Listing all loyal demon presence [Beginner+55%]
18:27:05.075 "Tempest" A whirling wind to blow your enemies about [Poor]
18:27:05.075 "Tempesting" Directing the tempest demon to action [Poor]
18:27:05.075 "Aura" Black battle-armour will emerge from the cauldron [Poor]
18:27:05.075 "Entourage" Summoning full entourages from the coffin-soil [Poor+50%]
18:27:05.075 "Haunt" A demon to suck away the mana of your enemies [Apprentice]
18:27:05.075 "Imp" An annoying demon to trip and torment your enemies [Practitioner]
18:27:05.075 "Steed" A demon steed upon which you may ride [Practitioner+50%]
18:27:05.075 "Servitor" The servitor protects demons from being warded [Competent]
18:27:05.075 "Leech" Leech demon to suck away food and drink [Competent+25%]
18:27:05.075 "Gate" The gate demon for the quick escape [Competent+50%]
18:27:05.075 "Seeker" A ball of malignant black liquid which attacks enemies [Respected]
18:27:05.075 "Demon" The horned demon, capable of attacking mage rituals [Respected+25%]
18:27:05.075 "Parasite" A green ball of liquid that sucks away health [Respected+50%]
18:27:05.075 "Possession" A spider-demon capable of injecting commands [Respected+75%]
18:27:05.122 "Sensor" The informative bug-eyed demon of locating [Renowned]
18:27:05.122 "Slime" The slime demon capable of enveloping your enemy [Renowned+33%]
18:27:05.122 "Wight" Wight demon to drain the effects of healing magic [Renowned+66%]
18:27:05.122 "Pestilence" Pestilence demon to spread disease and curses [Master]
18:27:05.122 "Persecute" Commanding a demonic entourage to commence persecution [Master]
18:27:05.122 "Pacify" Pacifying the demonic horde [Master]
18:27:05.122 "Heart" Encases your heart in crystal so you cannot be killed [Master+50%]
18:27:05.122 "Cauldron" Nobody knows what this means [Master+62%]
18:27:05.122 "Balrog" Summons a great demon and servant to the Demonologist [Grand-Master]
18:27:05.122 "Salamander" The salamander demon, explosively fecund and flaming [Grand-Master]
18:27:05.122 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:27:05.122 "Banisher" Summons a demon banisher to take back your demons [+75 lessons]
18:27:05.122 "Storm" The demonic storm, to strike lightning at an enemy [as above]
18:27:05.122 "Chain" Chains another demon to the Homonculus Orders transferred [as above]
18:27:05.122 "Search" Searches out your loyal Homonculus [as above]
18:27:05.122 Type AB DEMONOLOGY with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB DEMONOLOGY INTONE.
18:27:05.122 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:27:05.122 -

18:27:08.925 Begin the summoning process. You have been provided with a demon-summoning cauldron with sufficient gold, but normally these cauldrons are stocked by
18:27:08.925 tossing in the bodies of CCCs and other mortals slain in battle.
18:27:08.925 Use INTONE NAURLAMALANTARA to progress your current chapter.

18:27:43.589 Not all demons attack immediately and ordering them individually is tiresome. The persecute ability simplifies to one action against whom you unleash
18:27:43.589 your demons.

18:27:43.589 -

18:27:45.662 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:27:45.662 - AB DEMONOLOGY PERSECUTE
18:27:47.012 Good!
18:27:47.012 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.
18:27:47.012 HELP for the "PERSECUTE" ability:

18:27:47.012 The "persecute" ability is rated Master in the guild skill of Demonology. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:27:47.012 Syntax: PERSECUTE or PERSECUTE <target>.
18:27:47.012 The persecution is a combination attack, causing all the demons in your entourage (aside from the tempest) to act at the same time - against either
18:27:47.012 the target they had in mind already, when you type PERSECUTE on its own, or against the target specified when you enter the person's name e.g.
18:27:47.012 PERSECUTE BLODWYN. The persecution has certain advantages over the repeated ORDER ACT or ORDER ENTOURAGE versions, since it is designed to command an
18:27:47.012 entire group of demons and bypass many restrictions and/or afflictions that might otherwise prevent you from ordering.

18:27:47.012 NOTE: persecute does not command the full spectrum of demons into action and there are a few notable exceptions, for the sake of greater attack
18:27:47.012 potency, most notably the tempest demon.
18:27:47.012 -

18:27:50.692 Now PERSECUTE and set your Balrog on him. If you had more demons, they would all attack.
18:27:50.692 Use PERSECUTE FERDINAND to progress your current chapter.

18:28:29.818 Evocation like Spiritualism is comprised of calling on the spirits and bending them to your will.
18:28:29.818 Use HELP EVOCATION to progress your current chapter.
18:28:29.818 - HELP EVOCATION
18:28:33.134 Good!
18:28:33.134 Evocation is the magic of dark spirit summoning from the planes beyond Avalon. You can call spirits into the physical plane, order them to do your
18:28:33.134 bidding, and battle the Animists for control of the hidden world. Spirits can aid you, hinder your enemies, and help in the defeat of the light. See
18:28:33.134 the MAGICS command for a list of basic spirit invoking and marshalling commands As your skill rises, so will your proficiencies in both evocation
18:28:33.134 commanding and evocation magics. Type INVOKE ALL to invoke all seven spirits and, after equilibrium returns, CALL SPIRITS to bind them to your
18:28:33.134 entourage.

18:28:33.134 Examples:
18:28:33.134 - Invoke fire
18:28:33.134 - Invoke darkness
18:28:33.134 - Call spirits
18:28:33.150 - [Pause for equilibrium]
18:28:33.150 - Evoke blackhand calladan
18:28:33.150 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.

18:28:33.150 You have the EVOCATION skill at Grand-Master level.
18:28:33.150 Type AB EVOCATION for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:28:33.150 -

18:28:36.607 The Evocation skill contains a diverse array of abilities that allow the Sorcerer to keep the pressure under different conditions.
18:28:36.607 Use AB EVOCATION to progress your current chapter.
18:28:36.607 -

18:28:37.102 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:28:37.102 - AB EVOCATION
18:28:39.730 Good!
18:28:39.730 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.
18:28:39.730 Your current proficiency in Evocation is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:28:39.730 "Invoke" Invoking one or more of the seven spirits [Innate]
18:28:39.730 "Cancelling" Cancelling focal points of spiritual power [Beginner+50%]
18:28:39.730 "Reveal" Reveals concealed presences (spirits: E A) [Poor]
18:28:39.730 "Sense" Sensing players all over Avalon (spirits: E W D) [Apprentice]
18:28:39.730 "Walkwater" Walking on water (spirits: W) [Apprentice]
18:28:39.730 "Darkness" Magical darkness upon chamber (spirits: D) [Practitioner]
18:28:39.730 "Resist" No magical fire/cold damage (spirits: Fi W) [Practitioner]
18:28:39.730 "Cloak" No locate, summon, Farsight (spirits: A D) [Competent]
18:28:39.730 "War" Counteracts the Ritual of Peace (spirits: D Fi) [Competent]
18:28:39.730 "Bladebar" Prevents weapon wielding (spirits: E Fi W) [Competent+50%]
18:28:39.730 "Fear" Enemies run away and cannot enter (spirits: Fi A Fo) [Respected]
18:28:39.730 "Lead" Forces following (spirits: A D Fo) [Respected+25%]
18:28:39.730 "Stun" Stuns target (no actions) (spirits: Fi L) [Respected+50%]
18:28:39.730 "Gate" Opens a gate from target to you (spirits: E Fi W) [Respected+75%]
18:28:39.730 "Shards" Room struck with impact (spirits: E Fi D) [Renowned]
18:28:39.730 "Blood" Turns water into thick blood (spirits: W Fi D) [Master]
18:28:39.730 "Burning" Creating a momentary heat-surge (spirits: Fi D E L) [Master]
18:28:39.761 "Blackhand" Asphyxiation, draining (spirits: Fi D) [Master]
18:28:39.761 "Bonding" Bonding your spirits to you (spirits: All Spirits) [Master+62%]
18:28:39.761 "Absolution" Tears soul from the body (spirits: E Fi W D Fo Ai) [Grand-Master]
18:28:39.761 "Calling" To call your undead entourage (spirits: No spirits) [Grand-Master]
18:28:39.761 "Ichor" Noxious acid where blood once flowed (spirits: A W) [Grand-Master]
18:28:39.761 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:28:39.761 "Storm" Evokes an electrical storm (spirits: A W E) [+121 lessons]
18:28:39.761 "Disruption" Destroys metal, rots food, decays armour (spirits: r A W E Fi) [as above]
18:28:39.761 "Poison" Evokes a poison (spirits: E Fo W) [+61 lessons]
18:28:39.761 "Defoliation" Destroys forest and woodland presence (spirits: Fi Fo) [+182 lessons]
18:28:39.761 Type AB EVOCATION with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB EVOCATION INVOKE.
18:28:39.761 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:28:39.761 -

18:28:43.266 Should the enemy's mana fall too far, the Sorcerer can absolve their soul -- literally tear it from their enemy's body. Normaly it only works on an
18:28:43.266 opponent under half mana.
18:28:43.281 Use AB EVOCATION ABSOLUTION to progress your current chapter.
18:28:43.281 -

18:28:45.643 Ferdinand crosses his armoured arms in front of him to parry incoming blows.
18:28:45.659 - AB EVOCATION ABSOLUTION
18:28:46.440 Good!
18:28:46.440 You make use of the Sorcerer junior-apprenticeship.
18:28:46.440 HELP for the "ABSOLUTION" ability:

18:28:46.440 The "absolution" ability is rated Grand-Master in the guild skill of Evocation. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:28:46.440 Syntax: EVOKE ABSOLUTION <player>.
18:28:46.440 Spirits: Earth, Fire, Water, Air, Darkness and Forest.
18:28:46.440 Mana: 800.
18:28:46.440 The absolution is the mightiest of spiritual magics. It is only effective against a target whose mana has fallen below half, and - when enacted - will
18:28:46.440 tear their weakened soul from their body causing instant and total death.

18:29:34.680 The Seer profession manipulates the arcane magics of fate and mysticism and live in the shadows of Avalon.
18:29:34.680 -

18:29:42.469 The profession has guilds in all major cities: Mystics Guild of Mercinae, Seers of Thakria, Astrologers of Parrius, and Apostles of Silverfalls.
18:29:42.469 -

18:29:49.768 Select the Seer profession.

18:29:49.768 - SELECT SEER
18:29:53.794 Good!

18:29:53.794 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:29:53.794 You gain the skill of Farsight at Grand-Master.
18:29:53.794 You gain the skill of Charming at Grand-Master.
18:29:53.794 You gain the skill of Mysticism at Grand-Master.
18:29:53.794 You gain the skill of Stealth at Grand-Master.
18:29:53.794 You gain the skill of Fatalism at Grand-Master.
18:29:53.794 -

18:29:57.593 Seer guild skills are Mysticism, Fatalism, Farsight, Stealth, and Charming, with the specialisations of Oracle and True Mystic.
18:29:57.593 -

18:29:59.913 Ferdinand departs heading north.
18:29:59.913 The ghost of Ferdinand is enveloped by a cloudy gas for a moment. After a few seconds, the cloud disperses and Ferdinand is no longer a ghost.
18:29:59.913 -

18:30:04.571 Mysticism involves the use of waxen images of your target, which are magically bonded to share the same fate.
18:30:04.571 Use HELP MYSTICISM to progress your current chapter.
18:30:04.571 - HELP MYSTICISM
18:30:08.180 Good!
18:30:08.180 Using Mysticism, you can manipulate waxen images of players, first by BONDing them with the living player to get their individual feel, and then using
18:30:08.180 the IMAGE command to harm/help them at long range. At later levels you can even MOULD your own pieces of WAX into human effigies. To gain equilibrium,
18:30:08.180 you CHANT EQUILIBRIUM. Mental equilibrium is required when bonding and moulding images. Beyond Legendary there exists the power of puppet-mastery.
18:30:08.180 Type WAXLIST for a list of your waxes.
18:30:08.180 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.

18:30:08.180 You have the MYSTICISM skill at Grand-Master level.
18:30:08.180 Type AB MYSTICISM for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:30:08.180 -

18:30:12.090 Mysticism is often the primary focus for a Seer: enlarging their collection of waxes.
18:30:12.090 -

18:30:18.449 Use WAXLIST to progress your current chapter.

18:30:52.462 Each ability in Mysticism requires and uses a certain number of bonds on the waxen image.
18:30:52.462 Use AB MYSTICISM to progress your current chapter.
18:30:52.462 - AB MYSTICISM
18:30:55.907 Good!
18:30:55.907 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:30:55.907 Your current proficiency in Mysticism is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:30:55.907 "Waxlist" Reviewing your inventory of waxen images [Innate]
18:30:55.907 "Bonding" Bonding your waxen images, rendering familiarity [Innate]
18:30:55.907 "Examine" Perceiving an image's health and mana [Innate]
18:30:55.907 "Image" Using the waxen image powers [Innate]
18:30:55.907 "Pierce" Piercing a waxen image, causing pain [Poor]
18:30:55.907 "Moulding" Moulding wax into mystic images [Poor]
18:30:55.907 "Bleed" Causes a waxen image to bleed profusely [Apprentice]
18:30:55.907 "Crush" Crushing a waxen image to drain mana [Practitioner]
18:30:55.907 "Cripple" Crippling the legs of a waxen image [Competent]
18:30:55.907 "Curse" Passing curses through a waxen image [Competent]
18:30:55.907 "Shroud" Shrouding a waxen image against scenting [Competent+50%]
18:30:55.907 "Dullsense" Removes sight, hearing and sixth sense [Respected]
18:30:55.907 "Nimbus" Breaking spiritual and candescent defences [Respected+50%]
18:30:55.907 "Look" Look through the eyes of a waxen image [Respected+50%]
18:30:55.907 "Relaxation" Relaxes defences from an opponent [Respected+75%]
18:30:55.907 "Human" Forcing a waxen image to become human [Respected+75%]
18:30:55.907 "Burn" Burning an image to cause total death [Renowned]
18:30:55.907 "Truecripple" Fully crippling a waxen image [Renowned+33%]
18:30:55.907 "Twist" Twisting an image's sense of direction [Master]
18:30:55.938 "Dumb" Removes a waxen image's ability to speak [Master]
18:30:55.938 "Will" Willing an image to issue commands [Master]
18:30:55.938 "Protection" Bestowing divine protection upon a waxen image [Master+62%]
18:30:55.938 "Heads" The use of shrunken human heads [Grand-Master]
18:30:55.938 "Meld" Melding your mind with a waxen image [Grand-Master]
18:30:55.938 "Whirl" Whirling away spirits and candescence [Grand-Master]
18:30:55.938 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:30:55.938 "Revive" Revives a waxen image [+121 lessons]
18:30:55.938 "Disguise" Shrouding a waxen image in a disguise [as above]
18:30:55.938 "Create" Creating the first stage puppet [+61 lessons]
18:30:55.938 "Puppets" Telepathic communication with the mystic puppet-kin [+61 lessons]
18:30:55.938 Type AB MYSTICISM with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB MYSTICISM WAXLIST.
18:30:55.938 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:30:55.938 -

18:30:59.841 Read about the Burn ability.
18:30:59.841 Use AB MYSTICISM BURN to progress your current chapter.
18:30:59.841 -

18:31:02.227 You grow a little more calm.
18:31:02.227 - AB MYSTICISM BURN
18:31:03.001 Good!
18:31:03.001 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:31:03.001 HELP for the "BURN" ability:

18:31:03.001 The "burn" ability is rated Renowned in the guild skill of Mysticism. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:31:03.001 Syntax: IMAGE BURN.
18:31:03.001 Bonds: 60 minimum. Costs: 60.
18:31:03.001 Mana Used: 20
18:31:03.001 Assuming that you have access to fire this command will throw the waxen image into the fire. The wax will burn away and cause instant death to the
18:31:03.001 poor soul, stripping away the protections of the "olvar" herb and "resurrecting" elixir to - in almost all cases - guarantee a ride on the Ships of
18:31:03.001 Death for the unlucky victim.

18:31:03.001 NOTE: The mysticism "burn" cannot bypass certain death-defying countermeasures such as the power ritual. The crystal heart of the Sorcerer profession,
18:31:03.001 however IS vulnerable to your Mystic Burning and you will find it fully effective regardless of the immortalising countermeasures your undead foe has
18:31:03.001 chosen to employ.
18:31:03.017 -

18:31:06.507 You should have enough bonds to perform this ability now. You will need to wield the wax in your right hand, ready for burning. Let's make sure yare
18:31:06.507 wielding the waxen image.
18:31:06.507 Use WIELD RIGHT WAX to progress your current chapter.
18:31:06.507 - WIELD RIGHT WAX
18:31:09.993 Good!
18:31:09.993 You are now wielding a waxen figure in your right hand.
18:31:09.993 -

18:31:13.660 Image burning is the endgame of most Seer combat, where you destroy the waxen image in exchange for the life of the target. It goes through all
18:31:13.660 defences. It is the final word in combat.
18:31:13.660 -

18:31:17.444 -

18:31:24.297 is irreversible and absolute.
18:31:24.297 Use IMAGE BURN to progress your current chapter.

18:34:33.367 "NORTHWEST"
18:34:33.367 Amphitheatre back seats.
18:34:33.367 You are seated at the upper rear of the Amphitheatre curve of benches, spectating on the ring some thirty feet below you. Both behind and in front of
18:34:33.367 you the carved wooden benches ring the central circle, people bustling up and down the rows to obtain a view of the proceedings. Seated as you are,
18:34:33.367 you are able to examine the benches more closely; they are lovingly carved from soft willow, a worn pictorial drawn on the surface depicting countless
18:34:33.367 legends from Avalon of ages gone by. Underneath you is a myth which you recognise; it is the final inauguration of Tyranis, god of war, after the
18:34:33.367 success of the Divine War. A mage potters around aimlessly nearby.
18:34:33.367 The sky is alive with the day-time.
18:34:33.367 You notice exits southeast, northwest, above and below.
18:34:33.367 -

18:34:33.702 "NORTHWEST"
18:34:33.702 Behind the seats.
18:34:33.702 Row upon row of wooden benches arc around the Amphitheatre, encircling the central sand-covered ring with potential spectators. On active days the
18:34:33.702 Amphitheatre is a hive of activity, people jostling noisily with each other to gain a view of the action on the floor, while crowds are constantly
18:34:33.702 streaming out from the passage entrance and taking their seats amongst their friends and compatriots. Here you are at the very back of the benches, at
18:34:33.702 the highest point of the Amphitheatre able to look down on the entire scene. How much more of the World must the divinities see than mere mortals,
18:34:33.702 their vantage point being so much loftier? A mage potters around aimlessly nearby.
18:34:33.702 The sky is alive with the day-time.
18:34:33.702 You notice exits southeast, west and below.
18:34:33.702 -

18:34:35.100 "WEST"
18:34:35.100 Short passage.
18:34:35.100 You are just to the west of the end of this short passage where you can see quite clearly row after row of wooden benches which constitute the seating
18:34:35.100 for the grand amphitheatre of Mercinae. The hubbub from the crowds already assembled nearly drowns out your thoughts as you pass under the last
18:34:35.100 flaming oil dish on the side of the wall. As the passage opens out finally into the light again, you notice one last carving in the creamy stone wall;
18:34:35.100 an eagle's head, its beak opened wide in a gesture of defiance.
18:34:35.100 The sky is alive with the day-time.
18:34:35.100 You notice exits east and below.
18:34:35.100 -

18:34:36.209 "DOWN"
18:34:36.209 Short passage.
18:34:36.209 Underneath the bulky frame of the amphitheatre, this short stone passage leads up a steep slope to the seating areas visible at the end to the east.
18:34:36.209 The passage is lit by a number of wall bracketed plates containing flaming oil, and the floor is thick with sand and grit from the boots of the
18:34:36.209 spectators which pass beneath the ceiling painted with images of the divinities. An inscription on the wall beside you reads "May the wisdom of Astrea
18:34:36.209 guard you against ill, friend." which leaves you musing as to its ancient origin.
18:34:36.209 The sky is alive with the day-time.
18:34:36.209 You notice exits west and above.
18:34:36.209 -

18:34:37.156 "WEST"
18:34:37.156 Outside the amphitheatre.
18:34:37.156 Looming above you is the most enormous structure in Mercinae, the grand amphitheatre of King Atlas the Ancient. It is circular in shape, its walls
18:34:37.156 rise a staggering hundred feet into the air, pitted with countless mosaic and alcoves set with statues devoted to the Gods. Providing entrance to the
18:34:37.156 amphitheatre is a small door which leads through a narrow passage up, you assume, into the seating area beyond. Certainly this remarkable building is
18:34:37.156 one of the greatest wonders you have witnessed, a giant testimony to the skill of its creators many hundreds of years since passed away.
18:34:37.172 The sky is alive with the day-time.
18:34:37.172 You notice exits east and southwest.

18:34:57.785 The stone in Ilmarael near Path Entrance is conventionally held as the public seeing stone.
18:34:57.800 -

18:35:04.853 Farsight is a world unto itself of spheres of influence attached to each stone.
18:35:04.853 Use HELP FARSIGHT to progress your current chapter.
18:35:04.853 - HELP FARSIGHT
18:35:08.107 Good!
18:35:08.107 Farsight deals with your ability to use the seeing stones, to channel the power of the god of the stars through the seeing stone. The command
18:35:08.107 associated with this skill is FAR and you will need to be in the presence of a seeing stone to employ its vast array of far-reaching powers. Farsight,
18:35:08.107 of all Avalon skills, is intended for remote, safeguarded action and boasts the greatest number of individual abilities attached to the mastery of the
18:35:08.107 skill. These abilities, growing in power, can be channelled through the seeing stone; nullifications, telekenises, spying from some distant sanctuary,
18:35:08.107 the list is long. The seeing stones can be used to break wills, force actions, command sentients, and higher levels of Farsight enter a realm of
18:35:08.107 remote combats for dominance of the spheres of stone influence, the fate of entire cities resting in the lap of this mighty skill.
18:35:08.107 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.

18:35:08.107 You have the FARSIGHT skill at Grand-Master level.
18:35:08.107 Type AB FARSIGHT for a list of abilities according to your skill level.
18:35:08.107 -

18:35:11.733 Within a stone's sphere a seer can exact punishment or change local conditions from afar. They can even bond waxen images and curse their enemies from
18:35:11.733 a safe distance.
18:35:11.733 Use AB FARSIGHT to progress your current chapter.
18:35:11.733 - AB FARSIGHT
18:35:15.439 Good!
18:35:15.439 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:35:15.439 Your current proficiency in Farsight is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:35:15.439 "Look" Allows you to look through the seeing-stone [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Exits" Which directions can be progressed with your seeing stone [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Move" Move your seeing stone view in specific directions [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Drop" Telekinetically drop an object [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Case" Making use of CASE FAR to assess Farsight activity timings [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Inv" Gain an inventory of what is being held by your stone [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Examine" Use your seeing stone to examine specific items [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Get" Telekinetically pick up an object [Innate]
18:35:15.439 "Stones" Lists those seeing stones in use at any given time [Poor]
18:35:15.439 "Influence" Lists all locations influenced by your stone [Poor]
18:35:15.439 "Probe" Performs a probe on what you FAR GET [Apprentice]
18:35:15.439 "Darkness" Extinguishes all lights in the location [Apprentice]
18:35:15.439 "Face" Project your astral image through the seeing stone [Practitioner]
18:35:15.439 "Image" Projects the image of all text after FAR IMAGE [Practitioner]
18:35:15.439 "Items" Lists items in the focal location [Practitioner]
18:35:15.439 "Listen" Order the seeing stone to listen and view a location [Competent]
18:35:15.439 "Roof" Opening and closing the observatory roof [Competent]
18:35:15.439 "Light" Projects light into a focal location [Competent+50%]
18:35:15.439 "Banner" Executes the banner command on your stone's focal point [Competent+50%]
18:35:15.439 "Focus" Focus your seeing stone on specific items [Respected]
18:35:15.439 "Track" To look at runes of tracking [Respected]
18:35:15.439 "Survey" Surveying a location through the seeing stone [Respected]
18:35:15.439 "Map" Gaining birds-eye view of focal location surrounds as a MAP [Respected]
18:35:15.439 "Say" Project your voice through a seeing stone [Respected+25%]
18:35:15.439 "Detect" Like FAR LISTEN, detects movement and speech [Respected+50%]
18:35:15.439 "Follow" Enables your farsight focus to follow a player [Respected+50%]
18:35:15.439 "Shatter" Shatters an item by power of will [Respected+75%]
18:35:15.439 "Hurl" Hurl telekinetically held objects at things [Respected+75%]
18:35:15.439 "Push" Push a living being via the might of the seeing stone [Renowned]
18:35:15.439 "Allow" To restrict stone usage on a stone you have imprinted [Renowned+33%]
18:35:15.439 "Meditate" Passes mana through the palantir [Renowned+33%]
18:35:15.439 "Attack" Attempts to wrest a bonded location to your control [Renowned+66%]
18:35:15.439 "Curse" Allows you to send curses through a palantir [Renowned+66%]
18:35:15.439 "Netherworld" Details of the netherworld [Master]
18:35:15.439 "Owls" Review all of your owl-shaped tracker runes [Master]
18:35:15.439 "Project" Projecting your focal point quickly [Master]
18:35:15.439 "Soma" Billowing a soporific mist to your palantir focus [Master+31%]
18:35:15.470 "Watch" Watches a location, including detect, listen and sight [Master+31%]
18:35:15.470 "Traverse" Traverses from the seeing stone to the focal room [Master+31%]
18:35:15.470 "Concentrate" Opens up a channel so bardic songs can be sung through [Master+31%]
18:35:15.470 "Withdraw" To withdraw your seeing stone's bond [Master+62%]
18:35:15.470 "Free" Attempts to escape from locked Palantir [Grand-Master]
18:35:15.470 "Poltergeist" Poltergeist into Avalon from the netherworld [Grand-Master]
18:35:15.470 "Locale" Checking the locale information of your focal location [Grand-Master]
18:35:15.470 "Imprint" Imprints your image on a seeing stone [Grand-Master]
18:35:15.470 "Nullify" Use your might to nullify remote chants [+121 lessons]
18:35:15.470 "Command" Issue a remote order via the seeing stone [+60 lessons]
18:35:15.470 "Seize" Makes a permanent seizure of a location [+121 lessons]
18:35:15.470 "Pull" Pulls the focus of another seeing stone to your focal point [+121 lessons]
18:35:15.470 Type AB FARSIGHT with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB FARSIGHT LOOK.
18:35:15.470 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:35:15.470 -

18:35:18.994 Aside from moving room to room, the palantir can focus on a specific target in its sphere of influence.
18:35:18.994 Use AB FARSIGHT FOCUS to progress your current chapter.
18:35:18.994 - AB FARSIGHT FOCUS
18:35:22.205 Good!
18:35:22.205 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:35:22.205 HELP for the "FOCUS" ability:

18:35:22.205 The "focus" ability is rated Respected in the guild skill of Farsight. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:35:22.205 Syntax: FAR FOCUS <player> or FAR FOCUS <intelligent creature>
18:35:22.205 Mana Used: 25
18:35:22.205 Shifts the focus of the seeing stone to the target specified. The target must be within the sphere of influence of your palantir and the pyramid
18:35:22.205 diffusion rune is known to interfere with the focusing effort. The seeing stone penetrates most disguises and obfuscations but there are advanced
18:35:22.205 stealthy methods for evasion or - more common - confusing the focus so it turns back on itself. The owl-shaped rune is excellent for bypassing almost
18:35:22.205 all restrictions of distance and defence. Focus is broken by the "deflection" charm but only after it has locked onto its target location.
18:35:22.205 -

18:35:25.841 Use the stone to focus on Ferdinand's current location.
18:35:25.841 Use FAR FOCUS FERDINAND to progress your current chapter.
18:35:25.841 - FAR FOCUS FERDINAND
18:35:29.083 Good!
18:35:29.083 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.

18:35:35.837 Equilibrium Used (% of a Round): 0

18:35:49.139 - AB FARSIGHT CURSE
18:35:49.856 Good!
18:35:49.856 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:35:49.856 HELP for the "CURSE" ability:

18:35:49.856 The "curse" ability is rated Renowned+66% in the guild skill of Farsight. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:35:49.856 Syntax: FAR CURSE <target> <curse>.
18:35:49.856 Mana Used: 100
18:35:49.856 One of the iconic abilities of the Seer professional, the "Far Curse" draws upon your knowledge of Fatalism - combined with your prowess in Farsight
18:35:49.856 to deliver curses to a target within your seeing stone focus. Naturally, you must know the apposite ability in Fatalism to be able to curse a target
18:35:49.856 with it.

18:35:49.856 Farsight cursing is NOT effective against those divinely protected or of pacifist status, nor is it possible to initiate the curse-over-distance if
18:35:49.856 there is a "conquistador" exuding globestave in your location.

18:35:49.856 -

18:35:53.303 Review the curses and blessings available to you.
18:35:53.303 Use AB FATALISM to progress your current chapter.
18:35:53.303 - AB FATALISM
18:35:56.449 Good!
18:35:56.449 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:35:56.449 Your current proficiency in Fatalism is Grand-Master. This is a GUILD skill-set.
18:35:56.449 "Fortune" Reading the fatalist fortune of those around you [Innate]
18:35:56.449 "Items" You can pass curses and blessings to items [Innate]
18:35:56.449 "Nightmares" Projective foul images into the mind [Innate]
18:35:56.449 "Dreams" Wafting good dreams to a target [Innate]
18:35:56.449 "Empathy" Returning empathy with the spiritual world [Apprentice]
18:35:56.449 "Brighteye" Removing evil eye and restoring mana [Practitioner]
18:35:56.449 "Evileye" Misfortune, ill health and poor constitution [Practitioner]
18:35:56.449 "Badluck" Minor bad luck and lowering of defence [Competent]
18:35:56.449 "Goodluck" Removing the curse of bad luck [Competent]
18:35:56.449 "Poverty" Misfortune in matters of wealth [Competent+50%]
18:35:56.449 "Wealth" Restoring good fortune in wealth matters [Competent+50%]
18:35:56.449 "Memory" Restoring the memory to an amnesiac [Respected]
18:35:56.449 "Amnesia" Forgetting magics, spells, and illiteracy [Respected]
18:35:56.449 "Clumsiness" Inability to control ones limbs properly [Respected+25%]
18:35:56.449 "Dexterity" Removing the curse of clumsiness [Respected+25%]
18:35:56.449 "Haemophilia" Prevents blood from clotting [Respected+50%]
18:35:56.449 "Clotting" Blessing away the curse of haemophilia [Respected+50%]
18:35:56.449 "Sharpness" Casts aside confusion and befuddling [Respected+75%]
18:35:56.449 "Confusion" Befuddling of the mind - long term [Respected+75%]
18:35:56.449 "Vitality" Blessing of fine respiration and vigour [Renowned]
18:35:56.449 "Tapeworm" A tapeworm to make a victim hungry fast [Renowned]
18:35:56.449 "Heart" Removes the curse of a black heart [Renowned+33%]
18:35:56.449 "Stupidity" Inappropriate responses in a crisis [Renowned+66%]
18:35:56.449 "Curiosity" Removes stupidity [Renowned+66%]
18:35:56.449 "Warmth" Removes the curse of hypothermia [Master]
18:35:56.449 "Migraine" Splitting headache and vision blurring [Master]
18:35:56.449 "Headstrong" Cures the migraine headache [Master]
18:35:56.449 "Hypothermia" Instils a subnormal body temperature [Master]
18:35:56.449 "Dunce" Removes intellectual curiosity [Master+31%]
18:35:56.449 "Intelligence" Restores intellectual curiosity [Master+31%]
18:35:56.449 "Insomnia" Inability to go to sleep and rest [Master+62%]
18:35:56.449 "Sleeping" Helps the insomniac to rest [Master+62%]
18:35:56.465 "Anorexia" Gives your enemy anorexia [Grand-Master]
18:35:56.465 "Bulimia" Reverses anorexia or induces vomiting [Grand-Master]
18:35:56.465 "Blackdeath" A curse which afflicts the lungs [Grand-Master]
18:35:56.465 the following abilities will be attained next:
18:35:56.465 "Intolerance" Obnoxiousness and intolerance to helping [+75 lessons]
18:35:56.465 "Generosity" Dispels selfishness, restores common courtesy [as above]
18:35:56.465 "Slothful" Delayed actions, slow-motion curse [as above]
18:35:56.465 "Parasite" Unreasonable demands of allies [+77 lessons]
18:35:56.496 Type AB FATALISM with the ability "name" for detailed help e.g. AB FATALISM FORTUNE.
18:35:56.496 Abilities shown dark grey have yet to be attained and lessons needed are an approximation only.
18:35:56.496 -

18:36:00.394 The blackdeath curse is one of many afflictions that result in health loss.
18:36:00.394 Use AB FATALISM BLACKDEATH to progress your current chapter.
18:36:00.394 - AB FATALISM BLACKDEATH
18:36:03.638 Good!
18:36:03.638 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:36:03.638 HELP for the "BLACKDEATH" ability:

18:36:03.654 The "blackdeath" ability is rated Grand-Master in the guild skill of Fatalism. This ability is in your permanent repertoire.

18:36:03.654 Syntax : CURSE <sentient> BLACKDEATH
18:36:03.654 Mana Used: 100
18:36:03.654 This afflicts the poor recipient with the terrible disease of Blackdeath. It causes them to have frequent fits of bloody coughing, causing a steady
18:36:03.654 loss in health. This disease will wear off after a long period of time however.

18:36:03.654 NOTE: Blackdeath is a silent curse; the victim will not be made aware that you have afflicted them.
18:36:03.654 -

18:36:07.161 With your target in the focal point, now use the seeing stone to curse him with the black death.
18:36:07.161 Use FAR CURSE FERDINAND BLACKDEATH to progress your current chapter.
18:36:07.161 - FAR CURSE FERDINAND BLACKDEATH

18:36:10.627
18:36:10.627 EXCELLENT!
18:36:10.627

18:36:10.627 Your mosaic gains colour as you gazed through a seeing stone. Your legend grows.
18:36:10.627 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:36:10.627 You make use of the Seer junior-apprenticeship.
18:36:10.627 You summon the demon of disease to plague Ferdinand with the Black Death.
18:36:10.627 The "blackdeath" uses 100 mana.
18:36:10.627 -

18:36:12.037 You open your eyes having established equilibrium.

18:36:14.011 The three major skills of the Seer are synergistic and it takes practice to use them together well.
18:36:14.011 -

18:36:30.624 -

18:36:35.718 Don't forget you can continue to use SELECT <profession> to dip in and out of their skills all the way until you finish novicehood and choose to
18:36:35.718 become a guild apprentice.
18:36:35.718 -

18:36:46.485 To conclude your guided novicehood, we need to bring you up to speed on the guilds and great cities you'll encounter in your Avalon life...
18:36:46.501 Use DO HELPFOUNDING to progress your current chapter.
18:36:46.501 - DO HELPFOUNDING
18:36:49.872 Good!
18:36:49.872 The "HELPFOUNDING" experience must be completed by dint of your own action.
18:36:49.872 You elect to do the "HELPFOUNDING experience and summon support to aid you in its completion.
18:36:49.872 -

18:36:53.395 Establishing a real presence in Avalon requires resources, comrades, and friends. This is your city.
18:36:53.411 -

18:37:00.432 Whatever guild you choose, you can always change, but changing city is a deep betrayal once you have become established and fashioned friends and
18:37:00.432 allies and accepted a place in the city-state hierarchy.
18:37:00.432 -

18:37:10.999 You will need equipment, allies, friends, teachers, resources, and sometimes places to gather or hide or ready for the fray. These are all found in
18:37:10.999 your homeland city. Everyone new to Avalon is born in one of the great cities.
18:37:10.999 -

18:37:21.626 The great cities of Avalon are Mercinae, Thakria, Parrius and Silverfalls. Mercinae is the most ancient and holds the honour of being the first city
18:37:21.626 of players in the gaming world. Established October 1989.
18:37:21.626 -

18:37:22.220 As the Sun-ship dips below the horizon, the Even-tide approaches.
18:37:22.220 -

18:37:32.158 We ask you to focus a little here; just for the next minute. Learn about the cities, their founding ideals and what they have come to embody. Choice
18:37:32.158 of city is vastly important.
18:37:32.158 Use HELP FOUNDING to progress your current chapter.
18:37:32.158 - HELP FOUNDING
18:37:35.320 Good!
18:37:35.335 Avalon has been "inhabited" by its players for many decades (in 'real world' terms) and many centuries of the Avalon calendar. The first Avalonian
18:37:35.335 "newborn" came into the city of Alqualonde (Mercinae) in the year 800. Avalon's calendar marks time from the Divine War, a legendary event shortended
18:37:35.335 to "aDW" on Avalon dates, so 1250 aDW means 1250 years after the Divine War.

18:37:35.335 Mercinae was Avalon's first player-populated city and initially it encompassed all player types, all alignments, all outlooks. This was not intended
18:37:35.335 to last and soon a schism occurred - naturally but also 'as per design' - where those wanting to kill (and dominate others) left Mercinae to found
18:37:35.335 Thakria. This created the modern dichotomy as it stands between Mercinae and Thakria. The addition of Parrius as "city of freedom" completed the
18:37:35.335 original trinity. Springdale and Silverfalls are not part of the founding design but nonetheless both have a distinct idealism and culture.

18:37:35.335 Mercinae
18:37:35.335 Began as Alqualonde as Avalon's first modern era city, populated by the refugees from ruined Ilmarael (a city destroyed in the Divine War).
18:37:35.335 Named Mycenae briefly in honour of the Classical allusions found throughout the city but then updated to Mercinae in the 9th Century.

18:37:35.335 Mercinae is the "good" city. Its founding ideals are all about Justice and Light and Altruism and fighting those who would seek to murder, or spread
18:37:35.335 evil and darkness. Mercinae exists to protect the weak from the strong wheresoever it may be required. Mercinae is a city of peace over war, of
18:37:35.335 striving to make all Avalonians live in a just and illuminated state of fellowship.

18:37:35.335 Thakria
18:37:35.335 Named Thebes for a time, after its creation, as a counterpoint to Mycenae but was retitled Thakria by its Sorcerer founders by the time the first
18:37:35.335 Thakria-born citizens had come of age.

18:37:35.335 Parrius
18:37:35.335 Began its existence as Pyraeus for a short time, following the precedent of the Greek city-names but was Parrius before its founder had handed the
18:37:35.335 reigns to the first generation of Parrian-born citizens once they came of age.

18:37:35.335 In a world split between good and evil, light and dark, the stark choice between Mercinaen or Thakrian ideals the creation of Parrius filled a clear
18:37:35.335 need: somewhere for those who believed in the individual as shades of good and evil, for those whose did not want to be tied to Light or Dark but
18:37:35.335 instead believed in the three timeless ideals of Liberty, Equality, Fraternity. In Parrius all Parrians would be free. In Parrius all Parrians would
18:37:35.335 be equal. In Parrius all Parrians would be brothers and sisters - and therein lies the rub, for the pirate does not suffer his brother to go into any
18:37:35.335 fight alone.

18:37:35.335 The old rule of thumb is simple: in Thakria it takes but few to bring the city willingly to the field of conquest, in Mercinae it takes a united
18:37:35.335 majority to bring its people to battle but in Parrius it needs just one to start a war.

18:37:35.335 Silverfalls and Springdale
18:37:35.335 Springdale was built by the will of Andromeda and the toil of her followers at the time. It was to be a city for the dreamer, for the individual
18:37:35.335 unfettered and often uninterested in such concepts as Good and Evil and Freedom: because all who dream are unchained and dreams cannot be defined by
18:37:35.335 Light or Dark.

18:37:35.335 It was the unique and important vision of the City of Dreams caused it to become reality in Avalon and become included in evolved vision of Avalon -
18:37:35.335 as a continent of four city-personalities instead of three.

18:37:35.335 But Springdale was conquered by Thakria and though it went against the divine vision, the ideal of a player-driven history prevailed: so Thakria razed
18:37:35.335 Springdale to the ground. Silverfalls was founded by many of the Springdalian refugees though many remained citiless wanderers, dreaming their dreams
18:37:35.335 in exile.

18:37:35.382 The most abhorrent trait in early Avalon life is moral cowardice and the cities are well-defined precisely to encourage juniors to make a genuine
18:37:35.382 choice that fits their character. Do not be Thakrian if you do not seek to dominate and subjegate. Do not be Mercinaen if you will not take the fight
18:37:35.382 to those who stand against justice and light and goodness. Be not Parrian unless you place individualism and freedom as rights to be protected. Be not
18:37:35.382 Silverfallian unless you cherish its absence of moral code and know its existence is the dream made real for those tired of good and evil and the
18:37:35.382 duties of revolution.

18:37:35.382 Mercinae of Justice, Light, Good and Altruism. Thakria of Relentless Excellence, Passion, Evil, and Domination. Parrius of Freedom, Individualism,
18:37:35.382 Fraternity and Equality. Springdale and Silverfalls of Dreams, Hope, Despair and the Unknown Future.
18:37:35.382 -


18:37:35.382
18:37:35.382 EXCELLENT!
18:37:35.382

18:37:35.382 Your mosaic gains colour as you learned about cities. Your legend grows.
18:37:35.382 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:37:35.460 -

18:37:38.962 Cities are entirely governed and defined by the players (citizens). Everyone begins with a birth city but to change citizenship it needs charm and
18:37:38.962 persuasion. Be respectful to city leaders. They wield great power and responsibility.
18:37:38.962 -

18:37:49.830 If you must change city for your guild choice, you will need to find a high-ranking citizen from the city you want to join. And get it done quickly,
18:37:49.830 early and without a fanfare.
18:37:49.830 -

18:38:00.075 Avalon will be more intense if you play well the role you choose to pursue and that includes loves, loyalties and hatreds. Cleave unto your homeland
18:38:00.075 city. Be fiercely attached to your guild.
18:38:00.075 -

18:38:10.661 Guilds are run, ruled and defined by the players (members). Many are open about recruiting apprentices but some insist on youngsters proving their
18:38:10.661 mettle before admission.
18:38:10.661 -

18:38:21.431 Keep in mind: although a bunch of guilds may be of the same profession, sharing the same skills and abilities, they may be totally at odds in
18:38:21.431 alignment, politics and goals. Don't rush choosing where to begin your apprenticeship.
18:38:21.431 -

18:38:31.882 You can read more about each guild by checking HELP <guild>, such as HELP KNIGHTS for the Knights Guild of Mercinae, the oldest guild in the world.
18:38:31.882 And don't forget about SELECT <profession> to sample abilities from the skills of a particular class.
18:38:31.882 -

18:38:39.945 Use the novice channel (NN) and WHO or SENIORS to find someone who can help you.
18:38:39.945 -

18:38:47.529 First you must make contact with a real player - a guide - a guild tutor - an aide in the public relations ministry of your city or another great city
18:38:47.529 (depending on your outlook).
18:38:47.529 -

18:38:58.328 Ask on the novice channel to find somebody agreeable with whom to speak. It may also be someone who's able to assist you in choosing a guild.
18:38:58.328 Use NN WHO WANTS TO RECEIVE A TELL FROM ME? to progress your current chapter.
18:38:58.344 - NN WHO WANTS TO RECEIVE A TELL FROM ME?
18:39:01.862 Good!
18:39:01.862 You novice-call from Thakria: "WHO WANTS TO RECEIVE A TELL FROM ME?"
18:39:01.862 -

18:39:05.512 Remember you can also type CITIZENS or WHO to get a list of fellow city-mates or players active online, to help choose a target for your tell and
18:39:05.512 future requests for help (or challenge to a duel!).
18:39:05.512 -

18:39:06.013 Ninjawarrior novice-calls: "Me."
18:39:06.013 -

18:39:13.489 Phoenixx novice-calls: "I will."
18:39:13.489 -

18:39:16.012 Tells are the most common way to contact someone privately. The long form of the command is TELL <player> <message>, e.g. TELL LLEU HELLO! will send
18:39:16.012 "HELLO!" to Lleu.
18:39:16.012 -

18:39:26.554 It is also possible to abbreviate tells: LLEU HELLO will do the same, as would LLE HELLO. You can abbreviate down to 3 characters and gods will always
18:39:26.554 match first, as in GEN HI will always send a tell to Genesis.
18:39:26.570 -

18:39:27.179 Phoenixx novice-calls: "Why the caps lock though?"
18:39:27.179 -

18:39:37.075 Send a tell to someone online and responsive, perhaps somebody who'd replied to your NN message. Where you see <player> this is Avalon notation
18:39:37.075 meaning 'include player name' e.g. TELL LLEU HELLO!
18:39:37.075 Use TELL <PLAYER> WHERE CAN WE MEET? to progress your current chapter.
18:39:37.075 - TELL <PLAYER> WHERE CAN WE MEET?

18:39:40.263
18:39:40.263 EXCELLENT!
18:39:40.263

18:39:40.263 Your mosaic gains colour as you communicated via tells. Your legend grows.
18:39:40.263 Chapter experience gains you +2 lessons.
18:39:40.263 A puzzled look spreads across your face as you realise that you are talking to nobody.
18:39:40.263 Type HELP COMMUNICATION if you need info on talking to folks, or calling out to your guild, city, friends, etc.
18:39:40.263 -

18:39:43.782 It is possible to become self-sufficient fairly quickly in Avalon but the early steps are MUCH more quickly navigated with one or more helpful guides
18:39:43.782 to answer questions and point out the fastest route forward.
18:39:43.782 -

18:39:55.436 Guilds and cities are both replete with guides. These are players who are either so high ranked to be part of the guild or city power structure or,
18:39:55.436 more often, people who've made public their interest in helping youngsters.
18:39:55.436 -

18:40:05.981 Check out the GUIDES command and you'll see it lists available player guides, along with the person's guild, city and profession. The colour of their
18:40:05.981 name denotes their standing in reputation.
18:40:05.981 Use GUIDES to progress your current chapter.

18:40:35.607 you need to put the name of the player you are greeting e.g. GREET PALADIUS to greet a player named Paladius (providing he is in your location).

18:52:39.983 Ninjawarrior says, "Pretty good."
18:52:39.983 - look
18:52:42.128 Room of the stars.
18:52:42.143 This brilliant wing of the library is dome topped and magnifies the stars from the sky to get a better collective look at them in this observatory.
18:52:42.143 Special runes are carved into the walls that cause the constellation on the ceiling to change properly with time and to protect them from outside
18:52:42.143 forces. A thick web of stars floats about including a celestial spider crawling among them. Stone pillars support the grand design, wooden benches
18:52:42.143 provide seating while one ponders and enjoys this beautiful display of time and space. Tomes decorate a small bookcase nearby, subjects from star
18:52:42.143 layout to travel and time. Titles like 'Avalon Night Sky' and 'Travelling by the Constellation Genesis' are among them. Many scares of combat can be
18:52:42.143 seen throughout this room, it is rumoured that a high percentage of all personal battles will stumble upon this wing of the library. Scorch marks,
18:52:42.143 cleave gashes, and many other actions have caused much damage here and only the tough have survived. Ninjawarrior is here, hovering effortlessly above
18:52:42.143 the ground, surrounded by a splendid aura. She wields a crystal rapier. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A large statue stands here,
18:52:42.143 its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Elmaethor, god of the stars. The remnants of an enormous statue have fallen here. An
18:52:42.143 opaque pod sits here, the surface of its impervious skin pulsing with a strange ethereal hum. A leatherbound tome set with the symbol of the star lies
18:52:42.143 here. A tightly wound ball of thread has been discarded here. A large crystal seeing stone has been set here, pulsating like a white heart emanating
18:52:42.143 light. A white bearded oracle sits cross-legged and meditative nearby. A spiritual mist hangs in the air behind Someone like gossamer cloaking. A
18:52:42.143 golden aura of returning surrounds Someone. An adolescent falcon preens nearby, its fledgling maturity betrayed in a confident stare and a growing
18:52:42.143 sharpness about the talons. There is a globe-stave here, its crystal orb emanating a soft lambent whiteness.
18:52:42.159 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
18:52:42.159 You notice a single exit south.
18:52:42.159 - greet Ninjawarrior
18:53:00.732 You greet Ninjawarrior with a smile.

18:53:05.896 This chapter needs you to have: (Experience Name)

18:56:05.127 Ninjawarrior places her hands on her hips and intimates a pointed "Hmm!".
18:56:05.127 - look
18:56:27.638 Room of the stars.
18:56:27.684 This brilliant wing of the library is dome topped and magnifies the stars from the sky to get a better collective look at them in this observatory.
18:56:27.684 Special runes are carved into the walls that cause the constellation on the ceiling to change properly with time and to protect them from outside
18:56:27.684 forces. A thick web of stars floats about including a celestial spider crawling among them. Stone pillars support the grand design, wooden benches
18:56:27.684 provide seating while one ponders and enjoys this beautiful display of time and space. Tomes decorate a small bookcase nearby, subjects from star
18:56:27.684 layout to travel and time. Titles like 'Avalon Night Sky' and 'Travelling by the Constellation Genesis' are among them. Many scares of combat can be
18:56:27.684 seen throughout this room, it is rumoured that a high percentage of all personal battles will stumble upon this wing of the library. Scorch marks,
18:56:27.684 cleave gashes, and many other actions have caused much damage here and only the tough have survived. Ninjawarrior is here, hovering effortlessly above
18:56:27.684 the ground, surrounded by a splendid aura. She wields a crystal rapier. The remains of festooning linger about the locale. A large statue stands here,
18:56:27.684 its pedestal adorned with offerings. It depicts the likeness of Elmaethor, god of the stars. The remnants of an enormous statue have fallen here. An
18:56:27.684 opaque pod sits here, the surface of its impervious skin pulsing with a strange ethereal hum. A large crystal seeing stone has been set here,
18:56:27.684 pulsating like a white heart emanating light. A white bearded oracle sits cross-legged and meditative nearby. A spiritual mist hangs in the air behind
18:56:27.684 Someone like gossamer cloaking. A golden aura of returning surrounds Someone. An adolescent falcon preens nearby, its fledgling maturity betrayed in a
18:56:27.684 confident stare and a growing sharpness about the talons. There is a globe-stave here, its crystal orb emanating a soft lambent whiteness. A
18:56:27.684 leatherbound tome set with the symbol of the star lies here. A tightly wound ball of thread has been discarded here.
18:56:27.684 The sky is dark, night covers Avalon.
18:56:27.684 You notice a single exit south.
18:56:27.684 - greet Ninjawarrior

19:04:33.112 Get usesd to engaging with the written word. Avalon is the largest, most intricate challenge in computer gaming. It is not like other games. That said
19:04:33.112 , though, it can't be boiled down into a little crib-sheet.
